h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0816^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^b^me sutaṃ...pe0... mallesu viharatī^eb^ti pāthikasuttaṃ. tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā. ^b^mallesu viharatī^eb^ti mallā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena ``mallā''ti vuccati, tasmiṃ mallesu janapade. ``anupiyaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo''ti ^b^anupiya^eb^nti evaṃnāmako mallānaṃ janapadassa eko nigamo, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ chāyūdakasampanne vanasaṇḍe viharatīti attho. anopiyantipi pāṭho. ^b^pāvisī^eb^ti paviṭṭho. bhagavā pana na tāva paviṭṭho, pavisissāmīti nikkhantattā pana pāvisīti vutto. yathā kiṃ, yathā ``gāmaṃ gamissāmī''ti nikkhanto puriso taṃ gāmaṃ apattopi ``kuhiṃ itthannāmo''ti ^a^V3.0002^ea^ vutte ``gāmaṃ gato''ti vuccati, evaṃ. ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti gāmasamīpe ṭhatvā sūriyaṃ olokentassa etadahosi. ^b^atippago kho^eb^ti ativiya pago kho, na tāva kulesu yāgubhattaṃ niṭṭhitanti. kiṃ pana bhagavā kālaṃ ajānitvā nikkhantoti? na ajānitvā. paccūsakāleyeva hi bhagavā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā lokaṃ volokento ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ bhaggavagottaṃ channaparibbājakaṃ disvā ``ajjāhaṃ imassa paribbājakassa mayā pubbe katakāraṇaṃ samāharitvā dhammaṃ kathessāmi, sā dhammakathā ^a^M3.0002^ea^ assa mayi pasādappaṭilābhavasena saphalā bhavissatī''ti ñatvāva paribbājakārāmaṃ pavisitukāmo atippagova nikkhami. tasmā tattha pavisitukāmatāya evaṃ cittaṃ uppādesi.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0817^ea^ bhagavantaṃ disvā mānathaddhataṃ akatvā satthāraṃ paccuggantvā etaṃ ^b^etu kho, bhante^eb^tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. ^b^imaṃ pariyāya^eb^nti imaṃ vāraṃ, ajja imaṃ āgamanavāranti attho. kiṃ pana bhagavā pubbepi tattha gatapubboti? na gatapubbo, lokasamudācāravasena pana evamāha. lokiyā hi cirassaṃ āgatampi anāgatapubbampi manāpajātikaṃ āgataṃ disvā ``kuto bhavaṃ āgato, cirassaṃ bhavaṃ āgato, kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo ñāto, kiṃ maggamūḷhosī''tiādīni vadanti. tasmā ayampi lokasamudācāravasena evamāhāti veditabbo. ^b^idamāsana^eb^nti attano nisinnāsanaṃ papphoṭetvā sampādetvā dadamāno evamāha. ^b^sunakkhatto licchaviputto^eb^ti sunakkhatto nāma licchavirājaputto. so kira tassa gihisahāyo hoti, kālena kālaṃ tassa santikaṃ gacchati. ^b^paccakkhāto^eb^ti ``paccakkhāmi dānāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ na dānāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ uddissa viharissāmī''ti evaṃ paṭiakkhāto nissaṭṭho pariccatto.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhagavantaṃ uddissā^eb^ti bhagavā me satthā ``bhagavato ahaṃ ovādaṃ paṭikaromī''ti evaṃ apadisitvā. ^b^ko santo kaṃ paccācikkhasī^eb^ti yācako vā yācitakaṃ paccācikkheyya, yācitako vā yācakaṃ. tvaṃ pana neva yācako na yācitako, evaṃ sante, moghapurisa, ko santo ko samāno kaṃ paccācikkhasīti dasseti. ^b^passa moghapurisā^eb^ti passa tucchapurisa. ^b^yāvañca te idaṃ aparaddha^eb^nti yattakaṃ idaṃ tava aparaddhaṃ, yattako te aparādho tattako dosoti evāhaṃ bhaggava tassa dosaṃ āropesinti dasseti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ^b^uttarimanussadhammā^eb^ti pañcasīladasasīlasaṅkhātā manussadhammāuttari. ^b^iddhipāṭihāriya^eb^nti iddhibhūtaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ. ^b^kate vā^eb^ti katamhi vā. ^b^yassatthāyā^eb^ti yassa dukkhakkhayassa atthāya. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^V3.0003^ea^ ^b^niyyāti takkarassā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0003^ea^ so dhammo takkarassa yathā mayā dhammo desito, tathā kārakassa sammā paṭipannassa puggalassa sabbavaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya amatanibbānasacchikiriyāya ^a^P3.0818^ea^ gacchati, na gacchati, saṃvattati, na saṃvattatīti pucchati. ^b^tatra sunakkhattā^eb^ti tasmiṃ sunakkhatta mayā desite dhamme takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya saṃvattamāne kiṃ uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ kataṃ karissati, ko tena katena attho. tasmiñhi katepi akatepi mama sāsanassa parihāni natthi, devamanussānañhi amatanibbānasampāpanatthāya ahaṃ pāramiyo pūresiṃ, na pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāyāti pāṭihāriyassa niratthakataṃ dassetvā ``passa, moghapurisā''ti dutiyaṃ dosaṃ āropesi.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ^b^aggañña^eb^nti lokapaññattiṃ. ``idaṃ nāma lokassa agga''nti evaṃ jānitabbampi aggaṃ mariyādaṃ na taṃ paññapetīti vadati. sesamettha anantaravādānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekapariyāyena kho^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā āraddhaṃ. sunakkhatto kira ``bhagavato guṇaṃ makkhessāmi, ``dosaṃ paññapessāmī''ti ettakaṃ vippalapitvā bhagavato kathaṃ suṇanto appatiṭṭho niravo aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha bhagavā -- ``sunakkhatta, evaṃ tvaṃ makkhibhāve ṭhito sayameva garahaṃ pāpuṇissasī''ti makkhibhāve ādīnavadassanatthaṃ ^b^anekapariyāyenā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^anekapariyāyenā^eb^ti anekakāraṇena. ^b^vajjigāme^eb^ti vajjirājānaṃ gāme, vesālīnagare ^b^no visahī^eb^ti nāsakkhi. ^b^so avisahanto^eb^ti so sunakkhatto yassa pubbe tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa mukhaṃ nappahoti, so dāni teneva mukhena avaṇṇaṃ katheti, addhā avisahanto asakkonto brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ attano bālatāya avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā hīnāyāvatto. buddho pana subuddhova, dhammo svākkhātova, saṅgho suppaṭipannova. evaṃ tīṇi ratanāni thomentā manussā tuyheva dosaṃ dassessantīti. ^b^iti kho te^eb^ti evaṃ kho te, sunakkhatta, vattāro bhavissanti. tato evaṃ dose uppanne satthā atītānāgate appaṭihatañāṇo, mayhaṃ evaṃ doso uppajjissatīti jānantopi puretaraṃ na kathesīti vattuṃ na lacchasīti dasseti. ^b^apakkamevā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0004^ea^ apakkamiyeva, apakkanto vā cutoti attho. ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^P3.0819^ea^ ^b^taṃ āpāyiko^eb^ti yathā apāye nibbattanāraho satto apakkameyya, evameva apakkamīti attho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekamidāha^eb^nti ^a^V3.0004^ea^ iminā kiṃ dasseti? idaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ na karotīti ca aggaññaṃ na paññapetīti ca. tattha ``aggaññaṃ na paññapetī''ti idaṃ padaṃ suttapariyosāne dassessati. ``pāṭihāriyaṃ na karotī''ti imassa pana padassa anusandhidassanavasena ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.

[03] tattha ^b^ekamidāha^eb^nti ekasmiṃ ahaṃ. ^b^samaya^eb^nti samaye, ekasmiṃ kāle ahanti attho. ^b^thūlūsū^eb^ti thūlū nāma janapado, tattha viharāmi. ^b^uttarakā nāmā^eb^ti itthiliṅgavasena uttarakāti evaṃnāmako thūlūnaṃ janapadassa nigamo, taṃ nigamaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^acelo^eb^ti naggo. ^b^korakkhattiyo^eb^ti antovaṅkapādo khattiyo. ^b^kukkuravatiko^eb^ti samādinnakukkuravato sunakho viya ghāyitvā khādati, uddhanantare nipajjati, aññampi sunakhakiriyameva karoti. ^b^catukkuṇḍiko^eb^ti catusaṅghaṭṭito dve jāṇūni dve ca kappare bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā vicarati. ^b^chamānikiṇṇa^eb^nti bhūmiyaṃ nikiṇṇaṃ pakkhittaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^bhakkhasa^eb^nti bhakkhaṃ yaṃkiñci khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ. ^b^mukhenevā^eb^ti hatthena aparāmasitvā khādanīyaṃ mukheneva khādati, bhojanīyampi mukheneva bhuñjati. ^b^sādhurūpo^eb^ti sundararūpo. ^b^ayaṃ samaṇo^eb^ti ayaṃ arahataṃ samaṇo ekoti. tattha ^b^vatā^eb^ti patthanatthe nipāto. evaṃ kirassa patthanā ahosi ``iminā samaṇena sadiso añño samaṇo nāma natthi, ayañhi appicchatāya vatthaṃ na nivāseti, `esa papañco'ti maññamāno bhikkhābhājanampi na pariharati, chamānikiṇṇameva khādati, ayaṃ samaṇo nāma. mayaṃ pana kiṃ samaṇā''ti? evaṃ sabbaññubuddhassa pacchato carantova imaṃ pāpakaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkesi.

[03] ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0820^ea^ bhagavā kira cintesi ``ayaṃ sunakkhatto pāpajjhāsayo, kiṃ nu imaṃ disvā cintesī''ti? athevaṃ cintento tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā ``ayaṃ moghapuriso mādisassa sabbaññuno pacchato āgacchanto ^a^M3.0005^ea^ acelaṃ arahāti maññati, idheva dānāyaṃ bālo niggahaṃ arahatī''ti anivattitvāva etaṃ ^b^tvampi nāmā^eb^tiādivacanamavoca. tattha ^b^tvampi nāmā^eb^ti garahatthe pikāro. garahanto hi naṃ bhagavā ``tvampi nāmā''ti āha. ``tvampi nāma evaṃ hīnajjhāsayo, ahaṃ samaṇo sakyaputtiyoti evaṃ paṭijānissasī''ti ayañhettha adhippāyo. ^b^kiṃ pana maṃ, bhante^eb^ti mayhaṃ, bhante, kiṃ gārayhaṃ disvā bhagavā ``evamāhā''ti pucchati. athassa bhagavā ācikkhanto ``nanu te''tiādimāha. ^b^maccharāyatī^eb^ti ``mā aññassa ^a^V3.0005^ea^ arahattaṃ hotū''ti kiṃ bhagavā evaṃ arahattassa maccharāyatīti pucchati. ^b^na kho aha^eb^nti ahaṃ, moghapurisa, sadevakassa lokassa arahattappaṭilābhameva paccāsīsāmi, etadatthameva me bahūni dukkarāni karontena pāramiyo pūritā, na kho ahaṃ, moghapurisa, arahattassa maccharāyāmi. ^b^pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigata^eb^nti na arahantaṃ arahāti, arahante ca anarahantoti evaṃ tassa diṭṭhi uppannā. taṃ sandhāya ``pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigata''nti āha. ^b^yaṃ kho panā^eb^ti yaṃ etaṃ acelaṃ evaṃ maññasi. ^b^sattamaṃ divasa^eb^nti sattame divase. ^b^alasakenā^eb^ti alasakabyādhinā. ^b^kālaṅkarissatī^eb^ti uddhumātaudaro marissati.

[03] ^b^kālakañcikā^eb^ti tesaṃ asurānaṃ nāmaṃ. tesaṃ kira tigāvuto attabhāvo appamaṃsalohito purāṇapaṇṇasadiso kakkaṭakānaṃ viya akkhīni nikkhamitvā matthake tiṭṭhanti, mukhaṃ sūcipāsakasadisaṃ matthakasmiṃyeva hoti, tena oṇamitvā gocaraṃ gaṇhanti. ^b^bīraṇatthambake^eb^ti bīraṇatiṇatthambo tasmiṃ susāne atthi, tasmā taṃ bīraṇatthambakanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhagavati ettakaṃ vatvā tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya caritvā vihāraṃ gate vihārā nikkhamitvā upasaṅkami. ^b^yena tva^eb^nti yena kāraṇena tvaṃ. yasmāpi bhagavatā byākato, tasmāti attho. ^b^mattaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0821^ea^ ^b^matta^eb^nti pamāṇayuttaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ. ``mantā mantā''tipi pāṭho, paññāya upaparikkhitvā upaparikkhitvāti attho. ^b^yathā samaṇassa gotamassā^eb^ti yathā samaṇassa gotamassa micchā vacanaṃ assa, tathā kareyyāsīti āha. evaṃ vutte acelo sunakho viya uddhanaṭṭhāne nipanno sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā akkhīni ummīletvā olokento kiṃ kathesi ``samaṇo nāma ^a^M3.0006^ea^ gotamo amhākaṃ verī visabhāgo, samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya mayaṃ sūriye uggate khajjopanakā viya jātā. samaṇo gotamo amhe, evaṃ vācaṃ vadeyya aññathā vā. verino pana kathā nāma tacchā na hoti, gaccha tvaṃ ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī''ti vatvā punadeva nipajji.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekadvīhikāyā^eb^ti ekaṃ dveti vatvā gaṇesi. ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti yathā asaddahamāno koci gaṇeyya, evaṃ gaṇesi. ekadivasañca tikkhattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā eko divaso atīto, dve divasā atītāti ārocesi. ^b^sattamaṃ divasa^eb^nti so kira sunakkhattassa vacanaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ nirāhārova ahosi. athassa sattame divase eko upaṭṭhāko ``amhākaṃ kulūpakasamaṇassa ajja sattamo divaso gehaṃ anāgacchantassa aphāsu nu kho jāta''nti sūkaramaṃsaṃ pacāpetvā bhattamādāya gantvā purato bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipi. acelo disvā cintesi ``samaṇassa gotamassa kathā ^a^V3.0006^ea^ tacchā vā atacchā vā hotu, āhāraṃ pana khāditvā suhitassa me maraṇampi sumaraṇa''nti dve hatthe jaṇṇukāni ca bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā kucchipūraṃ bhuñji. so rattibhāge jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto alasakena kālamakāsi. sacepi hi so ``na bhuñjeyya''nti cinteyya, tathāpi taṃ divasaṃ bhuñjitvā alasakena kālaṃ kareyya. advejjhavacanā hi tathāgatāti.

[03] ^b^bīraṇatthambake^eb^ti titthiyā kira ``kālaṅkato korakkhattiyo''ti sutvā divasāni gaṇetvā idaṃ tāva saccaṃ jātaṃ, idāni naṃ aññattha chaḍḍetvā ``musāvādena samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ niggaṇhissāmā''ti gantvā tassa sarīraṃ valliyā bandhitvā ākaḍḍhantā ``ettha chaḍḍessāma, ettha chaḍḍessāmā''ti gacchanti. gatagataṭṭhānaṃ aṅgaṇameva hoti. te kaḍḍhamānā bīraṇatthambakasusānaṃyeva gantvā susānabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``aññattha chaḍḍessāmā''ti ākaḍḍhiṃsu. atha ^a^P3.0822^ea^ nesaṃ valli chijjittha, pacchā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. te tatova pakkantā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``bīraṇatthambake susāne chaḍḍesu''nti.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti kasmā upasaṅkami? so kira cintesi ``avasesaṃ tāva samaṇassa gotamassa vacanaṃ sameti, matassa pana uṭṭhāya aññena saddhiṃ kathanaṃ nāma natthi, handāhaṃ gantvā pucchāmi. sace katheti, sundaraṃ. no ^a^M3.0007^ea^ ce katheti, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī''ti iminā kāraṇena upasaṅkami. ^b^ākoṭesī^eb^ti pahari. ^b^jānāmi āvuso^eb^ti matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā kathetuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi, idaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti? buddhānubhāvena. bhagavā kira korakkhattiyaṃ asurayonito ānetvā sarīre adhimocetvā kathāpesi. tameva vā sarīraṃ kathāpesi, acinteyyo hi buddhavisayo.
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatheva taṃ vipāka^eb^nti tassa vacanassa vipākaṃ tatheva, udāhu noti liṅgavipallāso kato, tatheva so vipākoti attho. keci pana ``vipakka''ntipi paṭhanti, nibbattanti attho.

[03] ettha ṭhatvā pāṭihāriyāni samānetabbāni. sabbāneva hetāni pañca pāṭihāriyāni honti. ``sattame divase marissatī''ti vuttaṃ, so tatheva mato, idaṃ paṭhamaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ. ``alasakenā''ti vuttaṃ, alasakeneva mato, idaṃ dutiyaṃ. ``kālakañcikesu nibbattissatī''ti vuttaṃ, tattheva nibbatto, idaṃ tatiyaṃ. ``bīraṇatthambake susāne chaḍḍessantī''ti vuttaṃ, tattheva chaḍḍito ^a^V3.0007^ea^, idaṃ catutthaṃ. ``nibbattaṭṭhānato āgantvā sunakkhattena saddhiṃ kathessatī''ti vutto, so kathesiyeva, idaṃ pañcamaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaḷāramaṭṭako^eb^ti nikkhantadantamattako. nāmameva vā tassetaṃ. ^b^lābhaggappatto^eb^ti lābhaggaṃ patto, aggalābhaṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yasaggappatto^eb^ti yasaggaṃ aggaparivāraṃ patto. ^b^vatapadānī^eb^ti vatāniyeva, vatakoṭṭhāsā vā. ^b^samattānī^eb^ti gahitāni. ^b^samādinnānī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^puratthimena vesāli^eb^nti vesālito avidūre puratthimāya disāya. ^b^cetiya^eb^nti ^a^P3.0823^ea^ yakkhacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena acelako^eb^ti bhagavato vattaṃ katvā yena acelo kaḷāramaṭṭako tenupasaṅkami. ^b^pañhaṃ apucchī^eb^ti gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. ^b^na sampāyāsī^eb^ti na sammā ñāṇagatiyā pāyāsi, andho viya visamaṭṭhāne tattha tattheva pakkhali. neva ādiṃ, na pariyosānamaddasa. atha ^a^M3.0008^ea^ vā ``na sampāyāsī''ti na sampādesi, sampādetvā kathetuṃ nāsakkhi. ^b^asampāyanto^eb^ti kabarakkhīni parivattetvā olokento ``asikkhitakassa santike vuṭṭhosi, anokāsepi pabbajito pañhaṃ pucchanto vicarasi, apehi mā etasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhāsī''ti vadanto. ^b^kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātvākāsī^eb^ti kuppanākāraṃ kopaṃ, dussanākāraṃ dosaṃ, atuṭṭhākārabhūtaṃ domanassasaṅkhātaṃ appaccayañca pākaṭamakāsi. ^b^āsādimhase^eb^ti āsādiyimha ghaṭṭayimha. ^b^mā vata no ahosī^eb^ti aho vata me na bhaveyya. maṃ vata no ahosītipi pāṭho. tattha ^b^ma^eb^nti sāmivacanatthe upayogavacanaṃ, ahosi vata nu mamāti attho. evañca pana cintetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā ``khamatha me, bhante''ti taṃ khamāpesi. sopi ito paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ nāma na pucchissasīti. āma na pucchissāmīti. yadi evaṃ gaccha, khamāmi teti taṃ uyyojesi.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^parihito^eb^ti paridahito nivatthavattho. ^b^sānucāriko^eb^ti anucārikā vuccati bhariyā, saha anucārikāya sānucāriko, taṃ taṃ brahmacariyaṃ pahāya sabhariyoti attho. ^b^odanakummāsa^eb^nti surāmaṃsato atirekaṃ odanampi kummāsampi bhuñjamāno. ^b^yasā nihīno^eb^ti yaṃ lābhaggayasaggaṃ patto, tato parihīno hutvā. ``kataṃ hoti uttarimanussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriya''nti idha sattavatapadātikkamavasena satta pāṭihāriyāni veditabbāni.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ^b^pāthikaputto^eb^ti ^a^V3.0008^ea^ pāthikassa putto. ^b^ñāṇavādenā^eb^ti ñāṇavādena saddhiṃ. ^b^upaḍḍhapatha^eb^nti ^a^P3.0824^ea^ yojanaṃ ce, no antare bhaveyya, gotamo aḍḍhayojanaṃ, ahaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ. esa nayo aḍḍhayojanādīsu. ekapadavārampi atikkamma gacchato jayo bhavissati, anāgacchato parājayoti. ^b^te tatthā^eb^ti te mayaṃ tattha samāgataṭṭhāne. ^b^taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇāha^eb^nti tato tato diguṇaṃ diguṇaṃ ahaṃ karissāmi, bhagavatā saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ asamatthabhāvaṃ jānantopi ``uttamapurisena saddhiṃ paṭṭhapetvā asakkuṇantassāpi pāsaṃso hotī''ti ñatvā evamāha. nagaravāsinopi ^a^M3.0009^ea^ taṃ sutvā ``asamattho nāma evaṃ na gajjati, addhā ayampi arahā bhavissatī''ti tassa mahantaṃ sakkāramakaṃsu.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ``sunakkhatto kira pāthikaputto evaṃ vadatī''ti assosi. athassa hīnajjhāsayattā hīnadassanāya cittaṃ udapādi.

[03] so bhagavato vattaṃ katvā bhagavati gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe pāthikaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchi ``tumhe kira evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kathethā''ti? ``āma, kathemā''ti. yadi evaṃ ``mā bhāyittha vissatthā punappunaṃ evaṃ vadatha, ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhāko, tassa visayaṃ vijānāmi, tumhehi saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissati, ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa kathetvā bhayaṃ uppādetvā taṃ aññato gahetvā gamissāmi, tumhe mā bhāyitthā''ti taṃ assāsetvā bhagavato santikaṃ gato. tena vuttaṃ ``yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamī''ti. ^b^taṃ vāca^eb^ntiādīsu ``ahaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhīti vicariṃ, abhūtaṃ me kathitaṃ nāhaṃ buddho''ti vadanto taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma. raho nisīditvā cintayamāno ``ahaṃ `ettakaṃ kālaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhī'ti vicariṃ, ito dāni paṭṭhāya nāhaṃ buddho''ti cintayanto taṃ cittaṃ pajahati nāma. ``ahaṃ `ettakaṃ kālaṃ abuddhova samāno buddhomhī'ti pāpakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā vicariṃ, ito dāni paṭṭhāya imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahāmī''ti pajahanto taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati nāma. evaṃ akaronto pana taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvāti vuccati. ^b^vipateyyā^eb^ti bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ viya gīvato pateyya, sattadhā vā pana phaleyya.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ^b^rakkhateta^eb^nti ^a^P3.0825^ea^ rakkhatu etaṃ. ^b^ekaṃsenā^eb^ti nippariyāyena. ^b^odhāritā^eb^ti bhāsitā. ^b^acelo^eb^ ^a^V3.0009^ea^ ^b^ca, bhante, pāthikaputto^eb^ti evaṃ ekaṃsena bhagavato vācāya odhāritāya sace acelo pāthikaputto. ^b^virūparūpenā^eb^ti vigatarūpena vigacchitasabhāvena rūpena attano rūpaṃ pahāya adissamānena kāyena. sīhabyagghādivasena vā vividharūpena sammukhībhāvaṃ āgaccheyya. ^b^tadassa bhagavato musā^eb^ti evaṃ sante bhagavato taṃ vacanaṃ musā bhaveyyāti musāvādena niggaṇhāti. ṭhapetvā kira etaṃ na aññena bhagavā musāvādena niggahitapubboti.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvayagāminī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0010^ea^ sarūpena atthibhāvaṃ, atthena natthibhāvanti evaṃ dvayagāminī. alikatucchanipphalavācāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajitopi nāma licchavīnaṃ senāpatī^eb^ti so kira bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi, so kālamakāsi. athassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā manussā pāthikaputtaṃ pucchiṃsu ``kuhiṃ nibbatto senāpatī''ti? so āha -- ``mahāniraye nibbatto''ti. idañca pana vatvā puna āha ``tumhākaṃ senāpati mama santikaṃ āgamma ahaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanamakatvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā niraye nibbattomhī''ti paroditthāti. ^b^tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāyā^eb^ti ettha ``pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthāyā''ti kasmā na vadati? abhāvā. sammukhībhāvopi hissa tena saddhiṃ natthi, kuto pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ, tasmā tathā avatvā ``divāvihārāyā''ti āha.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ^b^gahapatinecayikā^eb^ti gahapati mahāsālā. tesañhi mahādhanadhaññanicayo, tasmā ``necayikā''ti vuccanti. ^b^anekasahassā^eb^ti sahassehipi aparimāṇagaṇanā. evaṃ mahatiṃ kira parisaṃ ṭhapetvā sunakkhattaṃ añño sannipātetuṃ samattho natthi. teneva bhagavā ettakaṃ kālaṃ sunakkhattaṃ gahetvā vicari.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhaya^eb^nti cittutrāsabhayaṃ. ^b^chambhitatta^eb^nti sakalasarīracalanaṃ. ^b^lomahaṃso^eb^ti lomānaṃ uddhaggabhāvo. so kira cintesi -- ``ahaṃ ^a^P3.0826^ea^ atimahantaṃ kathaṃ kathetvā sadevake loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ paṭiviruddho, mayhaṃ kho panabbhantare arahattaṃ vā pāṭihāriyakaraṇahetu vā natthi, samaṇo pana gotamo pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, athassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano `tvaṃ dāni pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto kasmā attano pamāṇamajānitvā loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ paṭimallo hutvā gajjasī'ti kaṭṭhaleḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhessatī''ti. tenassa mahājanasannipātañceva ^a^V3.0010^ea^ tena bhagavato ca āgamanaṃ sutvā bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā udapādi. so tato dukkhā muccitukāmo tindukakhāṇukaparibbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi. tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atha kho bhagavā^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M3.0011^ea^. tattha ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ upasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā pana dūraṃ aḍḍhayojanantaraṃ paribbājakārāmaṃ paviṭṭho. tatthapi cittassādaṃ alabhamāno antantena āvijjhitvā ārāmapaccante ekaṃ gahanaṭṭhānaṃ upadhāretvā pāsāṇaphalake nisīdi. atha bhagavā cintesi -- ``sace ayaṃ bālo kassacideva kathaṃ gahetvā idhāgaccheyya, mā nassatu bālo''ti ``nisinnapāsāṇaphalakaṃ tassa sarīre allīnaṃ hotū''ti adhiṭṭhāsi. saha adhiṭṭhānacittena taṃ tassa sarīre allīyi. so mahāaddubandhanabaddho viya chinnapādo viya ca ahosi.

[03] ^b^assosī^eb^ti ito cito ca pāthikaputtaṃ pariyesamānā parisā tassa anupadaṃ gantvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ ñatvā āgatena aññatarena purisena ``tumhe kaṃ pariyesathā''ti vutte pāthikaputtanti. so ``tindukakhāṇukaparibbājakārāme nisinno''ti vuttavacanena assosi.
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃsappatī^eb^ti osīdati. tattheva sañcarati. ^b^pāvaḷā^eb^ vuccati ānisadaṭṭhikā.
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ^b^parābhūtarūpo^eb^ti parājitarūpo, vinaṭṭharūpo vā.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ^b^goyugehī^eb^ti goyuttehi satamattehi vā sahassamattehi vā yugehi. ^b^āviñcheyyāmā^eb^ti ākaḍḍheyyāma. ^b^chijjeyyu^eb^nti chindeyyuṃ. pāthikaputto ^a^P3.0827^ea^ vā bandhaṭṭhāne chijjeyya.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ^b^dārupattikantevāsī^eb^ti dārupattikassa antevāsī. tassa kira etadahosi ``tiṭṭhatu tāva pāṭihāriyaṃ, samaṇo gotamo `acelo pāthikaputto āsanāpi na vuṭṭhahissatī'ti āha. handāhaṃ gantvā yena kenaci upāyena taṃ āsanā vuṭṭhāpemi. ettāvatā ca samaṇassa gotamassa parājayo bhavissatī''ti. tasmā evamāha.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīhassā^eb^ti cattāro sīhā tiṇasīho ca kāḷasīho ca paṇḍusīho ca kesarasīho ca. tesaṃ catunnaṃ sīhānaṃ kesarasīho aggataṃ gato, so idhādhippeto. ^b^migarañño^eb^ti sabbacatuppadānaṃ rañño. ^b^āsaya^eb^nti nivāsaṃ. ^b^sīhanāda^eb^nti abhītanādaṃ. ^b^gocarāya^eb^ ^a^M3.0012^ea^ ^b^pakkameyya^eb^nti āhāratthāya pakkameyyaṃ. ^b^varaṃ vara^eb^nti uttamuttamaṃ, thūlaṃ thūlanti attho. ^b^mudumaṃsānī^eb^ti mudūni maṃsāni ^a^V3.0011^ea^. ``madhumaṃsānī''tipi pāṭho, madhuramaṃsānīti attho. ^b^ajjhupeyya^eb^nti upagaccheyyaṃ. ^b^sīhanādaṃ naditvā^eb^ti ye dubbalā pāṇā, te palāyantūti attano sūrabhāvasannissitena kāruññena naditvā.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ^b^vighāsasaṃvaḍḍho^eb^ti vighāsena saṃvaḍḍho, vighāsaṃ bhakkhitā tirittamaṃsaṃ khāditvā vaḍḍhito. ^b^ditto^eb^ti dappito thūlasarīro. ^b^balavā^eb^ti balasampanno. ^b^etadahosī^eb^ti kasmā ahosi? asmimānadosena.

[03] tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā -- ekadivasaṃ kira so sīho gocarato nivattamāno taṃ siṅgālaṃ bhayena palāyamānaṃ disvā kāruññajāto hutvā ``vayasa, mā bhāyi, tiṭṭha ko nāma tva''nti āha. jambuko nāmāhaṃ sāmīti. vayasa, jambuka, ito paṭṭhāya maṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ sakkhissasīti. upaṭṭhahissāmīti. so tato paṭṭhāya upaṭṭhāti. sīho gocarato āgacchanto mahantaṃ mahantaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ āharati. so taṃ khāditvā avidūre pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vasati. so katipāhaccayeneva thūlasarīro mahākhandho jāto. atha naṃ sīho avoca -- ``vayasa, jambuka, mama vijambhanakāle avidūre ṭhatvā `viroca sāmī'ti vattuṃ sakkhissasī''ti. sakkomi sāmīti. so tassa vijambhanakāle tathā karoti ^a^P3.0828^ea^. tena sīhassa atireko asmimāno hoti.

[03] athekadivasaṃ jarasiṅgālo udakasoṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto attano chāyaṃ olokento addasa attano thūlasarīratañceva mahākhandhatañca. disvā `jarasiṅgālosmī'ti manaṃ akatvā ``ahampi sīho jāto''ti maññi. tato attanāva attānaṃ etadavoca -- ``vayasa, jambuka, yuttaṃ nāma tava iminā attabhāvena parassa ucchiṭṭhamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ, kiṃ tvaṃ puriso na hosi, sīhassāpi cattāro pādā dve dāṭhā dve kaṇṇā ekaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ, tavapi sabbaṃ tatheva, kevalaṃ tava kesarabhāramattameva natthī''ti. tassevaṃ cintayato asmimāno vaḍḍhi. athassa tena asmimānadosena etaṃ ``ko cāha''ntiādi maññitamahosi. tattha ^b^ko cāha^eb^nti ahaṃ ko, sīho migarājā ko, na me ñāti, na sāmiko, kimahaṃ ^a^M3.0013^ea^ tassa nipaccakāraṃ karomīti adhippāyo. ^b^siṅgālakaṃyevā^eb^ti siṅgālaravameva. ^b^bheraṇḍakaṃyevā^eb^ti appiyāmanāpasaddameva. ^b^ke ca chave siṅgāle^eb^ti ko ca lāmako siṅgālo. ^b^ke pana sīhanāde^eb^ti ko pana sīhanādo siṅgālassa ca sīhanādassa ca ko sambandhoti adhippāyo. ^b^sugatāpadānesū^eb^ti sugatalakkhaṇesu. sugatassa sāsanasambhūtāsu tīsu sikkhāsu. kathaṃ panesa tattha jīvati? etassa hi cattāro paccaye dadamānā ^a^V3.0012^ea^ sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sambuddhānaṃ demāti denti, tena esa abuddho samāno buddhānaṃ niyāmitapaccaye paribhuñjanto sugatāpadānesu jīvati nāma. ^b^sugatātirittānī^eb^ti tesaṃ kira bhojanāni dadamānā buddhānañca buddhasāvakānañca datvā pacchā avasesaṃ sāyanhasamaye denti. evamesa sugatātirittāni bhuñjati nāma. ^b^tathāgate^eb^ti tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ āsādetabbaṃ ghaṭṭayitabbaṃ. atha vā ``tathāgate''tiādīni upayogabahuvacanāneva. ^b^āsādetabba^eb^nti idampi bahuvacanameva ekavacanaṃ viya vuttaṃ. ^b^āsādanā^eb^ti ahaṃ buddhena saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmīti ghaṭṭanā.
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^samekkhiyānā^eb^ti samekkhitvā, maññitvāti attho. ^b^amaññī^eb^ti puna amaññittha ^b^kotthū^eb^ti ^a^P3.0829^ea^ siṅgālo.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ^b^attānaṃ vighāse samekkhiyā^eb^ti soṇḍiyaṃ ucchiṭṭhodake thūlaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā. ^b^yāva attānaṃ na passatī^eb^ti yāva ahaṃ sīhavighāsasaṃvaḍḍhitako jarasiṅgāloti evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ na passati. ^bbyagghoti ^b^maññatī^eb^ti sīhohamasmīti maññati, sīhena vā samānabalo byagghoyeva ahanti maññati.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhutvāna bheke^eb^ti āvāṭamaṇḍūke khāditvā. ^b^khalamūsikāyo^eb^ti khalesu mūsikāyo ca khāditvā. ^b^kaṭasīsu khittāni ca koṇapānī^eb^ti susānesu chaḍḍitakuṇapāni ca khāditvā. ^b^mahāvane^eb^ti mahante vanasmiṃ. ^b^suññavane^eb^ti tucchavane. ^b^vivaḍḍho^eb^ti vaḍḍhito. ^b^tatheva so siṅgālakaṃ anadī^eb^ti evaṃ saṃvaḍḍhopi migarājāhamasmīti maññitvāpi yathā pubbe dubbalasiṅgālakāle, tatheva so siṅgālaravaṃyeva aravīti ^a^M3.0014^ea^. imāyapi gāthāya bhekādīni bhutvā vaḍḍhitasiṅgālo viya lābhasakkāragiddho tvanti pāthikaputtameva ghaṭṭesi.
[03] ^b^nāgehī^eb^ti hatthīhi. ^b^mahābandhanā^eb^ti mahatā kilesabandhanā mocetvā. ^b^mahāviduggā^eb^ti mahāviduggaṃ nāma cattāro oghā. tato uddharitvā nibbānathale patiṭṭhapetvā.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ iti ``bhagavā ettakena kathāmaggena pāṭihāriyaṃ na karotī''ti padassa anusandhiṃ dassetvā idāni ``na aggaññaṃ paññāpetī''ti imassa anusandhiṃ dassento ^b^aggaññañcāha^eb^nti desanaṃ ^a^V3.0013^ea^ ārabhi. tattha ^b^aggaññañcāha^eb^nti ahaṃ, bhaggava, aggaññañca pajānāmi lokuppatticariyavaṃsañca. ^b^tañca pajānāmī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ aggaññameva, tañca aggaññaṃ pajānāmi. tato ca uttaritaraṃ sīlasamādhito paṭṭhāya yāva sabbaññutaññāṇā pajānāmi. ^b^tañca pajānaṃ na parāmasāmī^eb^ti tañca pajānantopi ahaṃ idaṃ nāma pajānāmīti taṇhādiṭṭhimānavasena na parāmasāmi. natthi tathāgatassa parāmāsoti dīpeti. ^b^paccattaññeva^eb^ ^a^P3.0830^ea^ ^b^nibbuti viditā^eb^ti attanāyeva attani kilesanibbānaṃ viditaṃ. ^b^yadabhijānaṃ tathāgato^eb^ti yaṃ kilesanibbānaṃ jānanto tathāgato. ^b^no anayaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti aviditanibbānā titthiyā viya anayaṃ dukkhaṃ byasanaṃ nāpajjati.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ idāni yaṃ taṃ titthiyā aggaññaṃ paññapenti, taṃ dassento ^b^santi bhaggavā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^issarakuttaṃ brahmakutta^eb^nti issarakataṃ brahmakataṃ, issaranimmitaṃ brahmanimmitanti attho. brahmā eva hi ettha ādhipaccabhāvena issaroti veditabbo. ^b^ācariyaka^eb^nti ācariyabhāvaṃ ācariyavādaṃ. tattha ācariyavādo aggaññaṃ. aggaññaṃ pana ettha desitanti katvā so aggaññaṃ tveva vutto. ^b^kathaṃ vihitaka^eb^nti kena vihitaṃ kinti vihitaṃ. sesaṃ brahmajāle vitthāritanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^khiḍḍāpadosika^eb^nti khiḍḍāpadosikamūlaṃ.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ^b^asatā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0015^ea^ avijjamānena, asaṃvijjamānaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^tucchā^eb^ti tucchena antosāravirahitena. ^b^musā^eb^ti musāvādena. ^b^abhūtenā^eb^ti bhūtatthavirahitena. ^b^abbhācikkhantī^eb^ti abhiācikkhanti. ^b^viparīto^eb^ti viparītasañño viparītacitto. ^b^bhikkhavo cā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ samaṇo gotamoyeva, ye ca assa anusiṭṭhiṃ karonti, te bhikkhū ca viparītā. atha yaṃ sandhāya viparītoti vadanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^samaṇo gotamo^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^subhaṃ vimokkha^eb^nti vaṇṇakasiṇaṃ. ^b^asubhantvevā^eb^ti subhañca asubhañca sabbaṃ asubhanti evaṃ pajānāti. ^b^subhantveva tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti subhanti eva ca tasmiṃ samaye pajānāti, na asubhaṃ. ^b^bhikkhavo cā^eb^ti ye te evaṃ vadanti, tesaṃ bhikkhavo ca antevāsikasamaṇā viparītā. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti samattho paṭibalo.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ^b^dukkaraṃ kho^eb^ti ayaṃ paribbājako yadidaṃ ``evaṃpasanno ahaṃ, bhante''tiādimāha, taṃ sāṭheyyena kohaññena āha. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ ettakaṃ ^a^P3.0831^ea^ dhammakathaṃ ^a^V3.0014^ea^ kathesi, tamahaṃ sutvāpi pabbajituṃ na sakkomi, mayā etassa sāsanaṃ paṭipannasadisena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. tato so sāṭheyyena kohaññena evamāha. tenassa bhagavā mammaṃ ghaṭṭento viya ``dukkaraṃ kho etaṃ, bhaggava tayā aññadiṭṭhikenā''tiādimāha. taṃ poṭṭhapādasutte vuttatthameva. ^b^sādhukamanurakkhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu anurakkha.

[03] iti bhagavā pasādamattānurakkhaṇe paribbājakaṃ niyojesi. sopi evaṃ mahantaṃ suttantaṃ sutvāpi nāsakkhi kilesakkhayaṃ kātuṃ. desanā panassa āyatiṃ vāsanāya paccayo ahosi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] pāthikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0015^ea^ ^a^M3.0016^ea^ ^a^P3.0832^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti udumbarikasuttaṃ. tatrāyamapubbapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^paribbājako^eb^ti channaparibbājako. ^b^udumbarikāya paribbājakārāme^eb^ti udumbarikāya deviyā santake paribbājakārāme. ^b^sandhāno^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ayaṃ pana mahānubhāvo parivāretvā vicarantānaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ aggapuriso anāgāmī bhagavatā mahāparisamajjhe evaṃ saṃvaṇṇito --

[02] ``chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato sandhāno gahapati tathāgate niṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme iriyati. katamehi chahi? buddhe aveccappasādena dhamme aveccappasādena saṅghe aveccappasādena ariyena sīlena ariyena ñāṇena ariyāya vimuttiyā. imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi aṅgehi samannāgato sandhāno gahapati tathāgate niṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme iriyatī''ti (a0 ni0 6.120-139).

[03] so pātoyeva uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya pubbaṇhasamaye buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhikkhūsu vihāraṃ gatesu ghare khuddakamahallakānaṃ dārakānaṃ saddena ubbāḷho satthu santike ``dhammaṃ sossāmī''ti nikkhanto. tena vuttaṃ ^b^divā divassa rājagahā nikkhamī^eb^ti. tattha ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassa divā nāma majjhanhātikkamo, tasmiṃ divasassāpi divābhūte atikkantamatte majjhanhike nikkhamīti attho. ^b^paṭisallīno^eb^ti tato tato rūpādigocarato cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā nilīno jhānaratisevanāvasena ekībhāvaṃ gato. ^b^manobhāvanīyāna^eb^nti manavaḍḍhakānaṃ. ye ca āvajjato manasikaroto cittaṃ vinīvaraṇaṃ hoti unnamati vaḍḍhati.
[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ^b^unnādiniyā^eb^tiādīni poṭṭhapādasutte vitthāritanayeneva veditabbāni.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0016^ea^ ^a^M3.0017^ea^ ^a^P3.0833^ea^ yattakā. ^b^ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataro^eb^ti ayaṃ tesaṃ abbhantaro eko sāvako, bhagavato kira sāvakā gihianāgāminoyeva pañcasatā rājagahe paṭivasanti. yesaṃ ekekassa pañca pañca upāsakasatāni parivārā, te sandhāya ``ayaṃ tesaṃ aññataro''ti āha. ^b^appeva nāmā^eb^ti tassa upasaṅkamanaṃ patthayamāno āha. patthanākāraṇaṃ pana poṭṭhapādasutte vuttameva.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti āgacchanto antarāmaggeyeva tesaṃ kathāya sutattā etaṃ ^b^aññathā kho ime^eb^tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^aññatitthiyā^eb^ti dassanenapi ākappenapi kuttenapi ācārenapi vihārenapi iriyāpathenapi aññe titthiyāti aññatitthiyā. ^b^saṅgamma samāgammā^eb^ti saṅgantvā samāgantvā rāsi hutvā nisinnaṭṭhāne. ^b^araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññavanapatthāni gāmūpacārato muttāni dūrasenāsanāni. ^b^pantānī^eb^ti dūratarāni manussūpacāravirahitāni. ^b^appasaddānī^eb^ti vihārūpacārena gacchato addhikajanassapi saddena mandasaddāni. ^b^appanigghosānī^eb^ti avibhāvitatthena nigghosena mandanigghosāni. ^b^vijanavātānī^eb^ti antosañcārino janassa vātena vigatavātāni. ^b^manussarāhasseyyakānī^eb^ti manussānaṃ rahassakaraṇassa yuttāni anucchavikāni. ^b^paṭisallānasāruppānī^eb^ti ekībhāvassa anurūpāni. iti sandhāno gahapati ``aho mama satthā yo evarūpāni senāsanāni paṭisevatī''ti añjaliṃ paggayha uttamaṅge sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā imaṃ udānaṃ udānento nisīdi.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ vutte^eb^ti evaṃ sandhānena gahapatinā udānaṃ udānentena vutte. nigrodho paribbājako ayaṃ gahapati mama santike nisinnopi attano satthāraṃyeva thometi ukkaṃsati, amhe pana atthītipi na maññati, etasmiṃ uppannakopaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa upari pātessāmīti sandhānaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca.

[03] ^b^yagghe^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. ^b^jāneyyāsī^eb^ti bujjheyyāsi passeyyāsi. ^b^kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapatī^eb^ti kena kāraṇena kena ^a^P3.0834^ea^ puggalena saddhiṃ samaṇo gotamo sallapati vadati bhāsati. kiṃ ^a^M3.0018^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``yadi kiñci sallāpakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, yadi vā koci samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ sallāpatthiko gaccheyya, sallapeyya, na pana kāraṇaṃ atthi, na tassa santikaṃ koci gacchati, svāyaṃ kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapati, asallapanto kathaṃ unnādī bhavissatī''ti.

[03] ^b^sākaccha^eb^nti saṃsandanaṃ. ^b^paññāveyyattiya^eb^nti uttarapaccuttaranayena ñāṇabyattabhāvaṃ. ^b^suññāgārahatā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0017^ea^ suññāgāresu naṭṭhā, samaṇena hi gotamena bodhimūle appamattikā paññā adhigatā, sāpissa suññāgāresu ekakassa nisīdato naṭṭhā. yadi pana mayaṃ viya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ katvā nisīdeyya, nāssa paññā nasseyyāti dasseti. ^b^aparisāvacaro^eb^ti avisāradattā parisaṃ otarituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^nālaṃ sallāpāyā^eb^ti na samattho sallāpaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^antamantānevā^eb^ti koci maṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyāti pañhābhīto antamantāneva pantasenāsanāni sevati. ^b^gokāṇā^eb^ti ekakkhihatā kāṇagāvī. sā kira pariyantacārinī hoti, antamantāneva sevati. sā kira kāṇakkhibhāvena vanantābhimukhīpi na sakkoti bhavituṃ. kasmā? yasmā pattena vā sākhāya vā kaṇṭakena vā pahārassa bhāyati. gunnaṃ abhimukhīpi na sakkoti bhavituṃ. kasmā? yasmā siṅgena vā kaṇṇena vā vālena vā pahārassa bhāyati. ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. ^b^saṃsādeyyāmā^eb^ti ekapañhapucchaneneva saṃsādanaṃ visādamāpannaṃ kareyyāma. ^b^tucchakumbhīva na^eb^nti rittaghaṭaṃ viya naṃ. ^b^orodheyyāmā^eb^ti vinandheyyāma. pūritaghaṭo hi ito cito ca parivattetvā na suvinandhanīyo hoti. rittako yathāruci parivattetvā sakkā hoti vinandhituṃ, evameva hatapaññatāya rittakumbhisadisaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vādavinandhanena samantā vinandhissāmāti vadati.

[03] iti paribbājako satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ nalāṭamaṇḍalaṃ apassanto dasabalassa parammukhā attano balaṃ dīpento asambhinnaṃ khattiyakumāraṃ jātiyā ghaṭṭayanto caṇḍālaputto viya asambhinnakesarasīhaṃ ^a^P3.0835^ea^ migarājānaṃ thāmena ghaṭṭento jarasiṅgālo viya ca nānappakāraṃ tucchagajjitaṃ gajji. upāsakopi cintesi ``ayaṃ paribbājako ati viya gajjati, avīciphusanatthāya pādaṃ, bhavaggaggahaṇatthāya hatthaṃ pasārayanto viya niratthakaṃ vāyamati. sace me satthā imaṃ ṭhānamāgaccheyya, imassa paribbājakassa ^a^M3.0019^ea^ yāva bhavaggā ussitaṃ mānaddhajaṃ ṭhānasova opāteyyā''ti.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ bhagavāpi tesaṃ taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ assosiyeva. tena vuttaṃ ``assosi kho imaṃ kathāsallāpa''nti.

[03] ^b^sumāgadhāyā^eb^ti sumāgadhā nāma pokkharaṇī, yassā tīre nisinno aññataro puriso padumanāḷantarehi asurabhavanaṃ pavisantaṃ asurasenaṃ addasa. ^b^moranivāpo^eb^ti nivāpo vuccati bhattaṃ, yattha morānaṃ abhayena saddhiṃ nivāpo dinno, taṃ ṭhānanti attho. ^b^abbhokāse^eb^ti aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne. ^b^assāsapattā^eb^ti tuṭṭhipattā somanassapattā. ^b^ajjhāsaya^eb^nti uttamanissayabhūtaṃ. ^b^ādibrahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^V3.0018^ea^ purāṇabrahmacariyasaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``ko nāma so, bhante, dhammo yena bhagavatā sāvakā vinītā ajjhāsayādibrahmacariyabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ pūretvā arahattādhigamavasena assāsapattā paṭijānantī''ti.
[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ^b^vippakatā^eb^ti mamāgamanapaccayā aniṭṭhitā, va hutvā ṭhitā, kathehi, ahametaṃ niṭṭhapetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassemīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ^b^dujjānaṃ kho^eb^ti bhagavā paribbājakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``ayaṃ paribbājako mayā sāvakānaṃ desetabbaṃ dhammaṃ tehi pūretabbaṃ paṭipattiṃ pucchati, sacassāhaṃ āditova taṃ kathessāmi, kathitampi naṃ na jānissati, ayaṃ pana vīriyena pāpajigucchanavādo, handāhaṃ etasseva visaye pañhaṃ pucchāpetvā puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhiyā niratthakabhāvaṃ dassemi. atha pacchā imaṃ pañhaṃ byākarissāmī''ti cintetvā ^b^dujjānaṃ kho^eb^ etantiādimāha. tattha ^b^sake ācariyake^eb^ti attano ācariyavāde. ^b^adhijegucche^eb^ti vīriyena pāpajigucchanabhāve. ^b^kathaṃ santā^eb^ti kathaṃ bhūtā. ^b^tapojigucchā^eb^ti vīriyena pāpajigucchā pāpavivajjanā. ^b^paripuṇṇā^eb^ti parisuddhā. ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0836^ea^ ^b^aparipuṇṇā^eb^ti kathaṃ aparisuddhā hotīti evaṃ pucchāti. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo nāma.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ^b^appasadde^eb^ ^a^M3.0020^ea^ ^b^katvā^eb^ti nirave appasadde katvā. so kira cintesi -- ``samaṇo gotamo ekaṃ pañhampi na katheti, sallāpakathāpissa atibahukā natthi, ime pana ādito paṭṭhāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ anuvattanti ceva pasaṃsanti ca, handāhaṃ ime nissadde katvā sayaṃ kathemī''ti. so tathā akāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``appasadde katvā''ti. ``tapojigucchavādā''tiādīsu tapojigucchaṃ vadāma, manasāpi tameva sārato gahetvā vicarāma, kāyenapimhā tameva allīnā, nānappakārakaṃ attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharāmāti attho.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ^b^tapassī^eb^ti tapanissitako. ``acelako''tiādīni sīhanāde (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.393) ^a^V3.0019^ea^ vitthāritanayeneva veditabbāni. ^b^tapaṃ samādiyatī^eb^ti acelakabhāvādikaṃ tapaṃ sammā ādiyati, daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti. ^b^attamano hotī^eb^ti ko añño mayā sadiso imasmiṃ tape atthīti tuṭṭhamano hoti. ^b^paripuṇṇasaṅkappo^eb^ti alamettāvatāti evaṃ pariyositasaṅkappo, idañca titthiyānaṃ vasena āgataṃ. sāsanāvacarenāpi pana dīpetabbaṃ. ekacco hi dhutaṅgaṃ samādiyati, so teneva dhutaṅgena ko añño mayā sadiso dhutaṅgadharoti attamano hoti paripuṇṇasaṅkappo. ^b^tapassino upakkileso hotī^eb^ti duvidhassāpetassa tapassino ayaṃ upakkileso hoti. ettāvatāyaṃ tapo upakkileso hotīti vadāmi.
[03] ^b^attānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti ``ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti attānaṃ ukkaṃsati ukkhipati. ^b^paraṃ vambhetī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ na mādiso''ti paraṃ saṃhāreti avakkhipati.

[03] ^b^majjatī^eb^ti mānamadakaraṇena majjati. ^b^mucchatī^eb^ti mucchito hoti gadhito ajjhāpanno. ^b^pamādamāpajjatī^eb^ti etadeva sāranti pamādamāpajjati. sāsane pabbajitopi dhutaṅgasuddhiko hoti, na kammaṭṭhānasuddhiko. dhutaṅgameva arahattaṃ viya sārato pacceti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ^b^lābhasakkārasiloka^eb^nti ^a^M3.0021^ea^ ettha cattāro paccayā labbhantīti ^a^P3.0837^ea^ lābhā, teyeva suṭṭhu katvā paṭisaṅkharitvā laddhā sakkāro, vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ siloko. ^b^abhinibbattetī^eb^ti acelakādibhāvaṃ terasadhutaṅgasamādānaṃ vā nissāya mahālābho uppajjati, tasmā ``abhinibbattetī''ti vutto. sesamettha purimavāranayeneva duvidhassāpi tapassino vasena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ^b^vodāsaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti dvebhāgaṃ āpajjati, dve bhāge karoti. ^b^khamatī^eb^ti ruccati. ^b^nakkhamatī^eb^ti na ruccati. ^b^sāpekkho pajahatī^eb^ti sataṇho pajahati. kathaṃ? pātova khīrabhattaṃ bhutto hoti. athassa maṃsabhojanaṃ upaneti. tassa evaṃ hoti ``idāni evarūpaṃ kadā labhissāma, sace jāneyyāma, pātova khīrabhattaṃ na bhuñjeyyāma, kiṃ mayā sakkā kātuṃ, gaccha bho, tvameva bhuñjā''ti jīvitaṃ pariccajanto viya sāpekkho pajahati. ^b^gadhito^eb^ti gedhajāto. ^b^mucchito^eb^ti balavataṇhāya mucchito saṃmuṭṭhassatī hutvā. ^b^ajjhāpanno^eb^ti āmise atilaggo, ``bhuñjissatha, āvuso''ti dhammanimantanamattampi akatvā mahante mahante kabaḷe karoti. ^b^anādīnavadassāvī^eb^tiādīnavamattampi na passati. ^b^anissaraṇapañño^eb^ti idha mattaññutānissaraṇapaccavekkhaṇaparibhogamattampi ^a^V3.0020^ea^ na karoti. ^b^lābhasakkārasilokanikantihetū^eb^ti lābhādīsu taṇhāhetu.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃbhakkhetī^eb^ti saṃkhādati. ^b^asanivicakka^eb^nti vicakkasaṇṭhānā asaniyeva. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``asanivicakkaṃ imassa dantakūṭaṃ mūlabījādīsu na kiñci na saṃbhuñjati. atha ca pana naṃ samaṇappavādena samaṇoti sañjānantī''ti. evaṃ apasādeti avakkhipati. idaṃ titthiyavasena āgataṃ. bhikkhuvasena panettha ayaṃ yojanā, attanā dhutaṅgadharo hoti, so aññaṃ evaṃ apasādeti ``kiṃ samaṇā nāma ime samaṇamhāti vadanti, dhutaṅgamattampi natthi, uddesabhattādīni pariyesantā paccayabāhullikā vicarantī''ti. ^b^lūkhājīvi^eb^nti acelakādivasena vā dhutaṅgavasena vā lūkhājīviṃ. ^b^issāmacchariya^eb^nti parassa sakkārādisampattikhīyanalakkhaṇaṃ ^a^P3.0838^ea^ issaṃ, sakkārādikaraṇākkhamanalakkhaṇaṃ macchariyañca.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ^b^āpāthakanisādī^eb^ ^a^M3.0022^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti manussānaṃ āpāthe dassanaṭṭhāne nisīdati. yattha te passanti, tattha ṭhito vaggulivataṃ carati, pañcātapaṃ tappati, ekapādena tiṭṭhati, sūriyaṃ namassati. sāsane pabbajitopi samādinnadhutaṅgo sabbarattiṃ sayitvā manussānaṃ cakkhupathe tapaṃ karoti, mahāsāyanheyeva cīvarakuṭiṃ karoti, sūriye uggate paṭisaṃharati, manussānaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā cīvaraṃ matthake ṭhapetvā caṅkamaṃ otarati, sammuñjaniṃ gahetvā vihāraṅgaṇaṃ sammajjati.

[03] ^b^attāna^eb^nti attano guṇaṃ ^b^adassayamāno^eb^ti ettha a-kāro nipātamattaṃ, dassayamānoti attho. ^b^idampi me tapasmi^eb^nti idampi kammaṃ mameva tapasmiṃ, paccatte vā bhummaṃ, idampi mama tapoti attho. so hi asukasmiṃ ṭhāne acelako atthi muttācārotiādīni sutvā amhākaṃ esa tapo, amhākaṃ so antevāsikotiādīni bhaṇati. asukasmiṃ vā pana ṭhāne paṃsukūliko bhikkhu atthītiādīni sutvā amhākaṃ esa tapo, amhākaṃ so antevāsikotiādīni bhaṇati.

[03] ^b^kiñcidevā^eb^ti kiñci vajjaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vā. ^b^paṭicchannaṃ sevatī^eb^ti yathā aññe na jānanti, evaṃ sevati. ^b^akkhamamānaṃ āha khamatī^eb^ti aruccamānaṃyeva ruccati meti vadati. attanā kataṃ atimahantampi vajjaṃ appamattakaṃ katvā paññapeti, parena kataṃ dukkaṭamattaṃ vītikkamampi pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dasseti. ^b^anuññeyya^eb^nti anujānitabbaṃ anumoditabbaṃ.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^kodhano^eb^ ^a^V3.0021^ea^ ^b^hoti upanāhī^eb^ti kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena, verāppaṭinissaggalakkhaṇena upanāhena ca samannāgato. ^b^makkhī hoti paḷāsī^eb^ti paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena, yugaggāhalakkhaṇena paḷāsena ca samannāgato.

[03] ^b^issukī hoti maccharī^eb^ti parasakkārādīsu usūyanalakkhaṇāya issāya, āvāsakulalābhavaṇṇadhammesu maccharāyanalakkhaṇena pañcavidhamaccherena ca samannāgato hoti. ^b^saṭho hoti māyāvī^eb^ti kerāṭikalakkhaṇena sāṭheyyena, katappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya ca samannāgato ^a^M3.0023^ea^ hoti. ^b^thaddho^eb^ ^a^P3.0839^ea^ ^b^hoti atimānī^eb^ti nissinehanikkaruṇathaddhalakkhaṇena thambhena, atikkamitvā maññanalakkhaṇena atimānena ca samannāgato hoti. ^b^pāpiccho hotī^eb^ti asantasambhāvanapatthanalakkhaṇāya pāpicchatāya samannāgato hoti. ^b^pāpikāna^eb^nti tāsaṃyeva lāmakānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gato. ^b^micchādiṭṭhiko^eb^ti natthi dinnantiādinayappavattāya ayāthāvadiṭṭhiyā upeto. ^b^antaggāhikāyā^eb^ti sāyeva diṭṭhi ucchedantassa gahitattā ``antaggāhikā''ti vuccati, tāya samannāgatoti attho. ^b^sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī^eb^tiādīsu sayaṃ diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhimeva parāmasati gahetvā vadatīti ^b^sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī.^eb^ ādhānaṃ vuccati daḷhaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ, tathā katvā gaṇhātīti ^b^ādhānaggāhī.^eb^ ariṭṭho viya na sakkā hoti paṭinissajjāpetunti ^b^duppaṭinissaggī. yadime^eb^ti yadi ime.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ^b^idha, nigrodha, tapassī^eb^ti evaṃ bhagavā aññatitthiyehi gahitaladdhiṃ tesaṃ rakkhitaṃ tapaṃ sabbameva saṃkiliṭṭhanti upakkilesapāḷiṃ dassetvā idāni parisuddhapāḷidassanatthaṃ desanamārabhanto ^b^idha, nigrodhā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ``na attamano''tiādīni vuttavipakkhavaseneva veditabbāni. sabbavāresu ca lūkhatapassino ceva dhutaṅgadharassa ca vasena yojanā veditabbā. ^b^evaṃ so tasmiṃ ṭhāne parisuddho hotī^eb^ti evaṃ so tena na attamanatā na paripuṇṇasaṅkappabhāvasaṅkhātena kāraṇena parisuddho nirupakkileso hoti, uttari vāyamamāno kammaṭṭhānasuddhiko hutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^addhā kho, bhante^eb^ti bhante evaṃ sante ekaṃseneva vīriyena pāpajigucchanavādo parisuddho hotīti anujānāti. ito parañca aggabhāvaṃ vā sārabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto ^b^aggappattā sārappattā cā^eb^ti āha. athassa bhagavā sārappattabhāvaṃ paṭisedhento ^b^na kho nigrodhā^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V3.0022^ea^. ^b^papaṭikappattā hotī^eb^ti sāravato rukkhassa sāraṃ phegguṃ tacañca atikkamma bahipapaṭikasadisā hotīti dasseti.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ^b^aggaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0024^ea^ ^a^P3.0840^ea^ ^b^pāpetū^eb^ti desanāvasena aggaṃ pāpetvā desetu, sāraṃ pāpetvā desetūti dasabalaṃ yācati. ^b^cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ti catubbidhena saṃvarena pihito. ^b^na pāṇaṃ atipātetī^eb^ti pāṇaṃ na hanati. ^b^na bhāvitamāsīsatī^eb^ti bhāvitaṃ nāma tesaṃ saññāya pañca kāmaguṇā, te na āsīsati na sevatīti attho.

[03] ^b^aduṃ cassa hotī^eb^ti etañcassa idāni vuccamānaṃ ``so abhiharatī''tiādilakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^tapassitāyā^eb^ti tapassibhāvena hoti. tattha ^b^so abhiharatī^eb^ti so taṃ sīlaṃ abhiharati, uparūpari vaḍḍheti. sīlaṃ me paripuṇṇaṃ, tapo āraddho, alamettāvatāti na vīriyaṃ vissajjeti. ^b^no hīnāyāvattatī^eb^ti hīnāya gihibhāvatthāya na āvattati. sīlato uttari visesādhigamatthāya vīriyaṃ karotiyeva, evaṃ karonto so vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati. ``arañña''ntiādīni sāmaññaphale (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.216) vitthāritāneva. ``mettāsahagatenā''tiādīni visuddhimagge vaṇṇitāni. ^b^tacappattā^eb^ti papaṭikato abbhantaraṃ tacaṃ pattā. ^b^phegguppattā^eb^ti tacato abbhantaraṃ phegguṃ pattā, pheggusadisā hotīti attho.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ``ettāvatā, kho nigrodha, tapojigucchā aggappattā ca hoti sārappattā cā''ti idaṃ bhagavā titthiyānaṃ vasenāha. titthiyānañhi lābhasakkāro rukkhassa sākhāpalāsasadiso. pañcasīlamattakaṃ papaṭikasadisaṃ. aṭṭhasamāpattimattaṃ tacasadisaṃ. pubbenivāsañāṇāvasānā abhiññā pheggusadisā. dibbacakkhuṃ panete arahattanti gahetvā vicaranti. tena nesaṃ taṃ rukkhassa sārasadisaṃ. sāsane pana lābhasakkāro sākhāpalāsasadiso. sīlasampadā papaṭikasadisā. jhānasamāpattiyo tacasadisā. lokiyābhiññā pheggusadisā. maggaphalaṃ sāro. iti bhagavatā attano sāsanaṃ onatavinataphalabhārabharitarukkhūpamāya upamitaṃ. so desanākusalatāya tato tacasārasampattito mama sāsanaṃ uttaritarañceva paṇītatarañca, taṃ tuvaṃ kadā jānissasīti ^a^P3.0841^ea^ attanodesanāya visesabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ``iti kho nigrodhā''ti desanaṃ ārabhi ^a^M3.0025^ea^. ^b^te paribbājakā^eb^ti te tassa parivārā tiṃsasatasaṅkhyā paribbājakā. ^b^ettha mayaṃ anassāmā^eb^ti ettha acelakapāḷiādīsu, idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``amhākaṃ acelakapāḷimattampi natthi ^a^V3.0023^ea^, kuto parisuddhapāḷi. amhākaṃ parisuddhapāḷimattampi natthi, kuto cātuyāmasaṃvarādīni. cātuyāmasaṃvaropi natthi, kuto araññavāsādīni. araññavāsopi natthi, kuto nīvaraṇappahānādīni. nīvaraṇappahānampi natthi, kuto brahmavihārādīni. brahmavihāramattampi natthi, kuto pubbenivāsādīni. pubbenivāsañāṇamattampi natthi, kuto amhākaṃ dibbacakkhu. ettha mayaṃ sāacariyakā naṭṭhā''ti. ^b^ito bhiyyo uttaritara^eb^nti ito dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamato bhiyyo aññaṃ uttaritaraṃ visesādhigamaṃ mayaṃ sutivasenāpi na jānāmāti vadanti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha nigrodhaṃ paribbājaka^eb^nti evaṃ kirassa ahosi ``ime paribbājakā idāni bhagavato bhāsitaṃ sussūsanti, iminā ca nigrodhena bhagavato parammukhā kakkhaḷaṃ durāsadavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, idāni ayampi sotukāmo jāto, kālo dāni me imassa mānaddhajaṃ nipātetvā bhagavato sāsanaṃ ukkhipitu''nti. atha nigrodhaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavoca. aparampissa ahosi ``ayaṃ mayi akathente satthāraṃ na khamāpessati, tadassa anāgate ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattissati, mayā pana kathite khamāpessati, tadassa bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā''ti. atha nigrodhaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavoca. ^b^aparisāvacaraṃ pana naṃ karothā^eb^ti ettha ^b^panā^eb^ti nipāto, atha naṃ aparisāvacaraṃ karothāti attho. ``aparisāvacareta''ntipi pāṭho, aparisāvacaraṃ vā etaṃ karotha, gokāṇādīnaṃ vā aññataranti attho.

[03] ^b^gokāṇa^eb^nti etthāpi gokāṇaṃ pariyantacāriniṃ viya karothāti attho. ^b^tuṇhībhūto^eb^ti tuṇhībhāvaṃ upagato. ^b^maṅkubhūto^eb^ti nittejataṃ āpanno. ^b^pattakkhandho^eb^ti onatagīvo. ^b^adhomukho^eb^ti heṭṭhāmukho.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ^b^buddho^eb^ ^a^M3.0026^ea^ ^a^P3.0842^ea^ ^b^so bhagavā bodhāyā^eb^ti sayaṃ buddho sattānampi catusaccabodhatthāya dhammaṃ deseti. ^b^danto^eb^ti cakkhutopi danto...pe0... manatopi danto. ^b^damathāyā^eb^ti aññesampi damanatthāya eva, na vādatthāya. ^b^santo^eb^ti rāgasantatāya santo, dosamohasantatāya sabba akusalasabbābhisaṅkhārasantatāya santo. ^b^samathāyā^eb^ti mahājanassa rāgādisamanatthāya dhammaṃ deseti. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti cattāro oghe tiṇṇo. ^b^taraṇāyā^eb^ti mahājanassa oghanittharaṇatthāya. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. ^b^parinibbānāyā^eb^ti mahājanassāpi sabbakilesaparinibbānatthāya dhammaṃ deseti.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ^b^accayo^eb^tiādīni ^a^V3.0024^ea^ sāmaññaphale (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.250) vuttāni. ^b^ujujātiko^eb^ti kāyavaṅkādivirahito ujusabhāvo. ^b^ahamanusāsāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ anusāsāmi, dhammaṃ assa desemi. ^b^sattāha^eb^nti sattadivasāni, idaṃ sabbampi bhagavā dandhapaññaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāyāha asaṭho pana amāyāvī ujujātiko taṃmuhutteneva arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkhissati. iti bhagavā ``asaṭha''ntiādivacanena saṭho hi vaṅkavaṅko, mayāpi na sakkā anusāsitunti dīpento paribbājakaṃ pādesu gahetvā mahāmerupādatale viya khipittha. kasmā? ayañhi atisaṭho, kuṭilacitto satthari evaṃ kathentepi buddhadhammasaṅghesu nādhimuccati, adhimuccanatthāya sotaṃ na odahati, kohaññe ṭhito satthāraṃ khamāpeti. tasmā bhagavā tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā ``etu viññū puriso asaṭho''tiādimāha. saṭhaṃ panāhaṃ anusāsituṃ na sakkomīti.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ^b^antevāsikamyatā^eb^ti antevāsikamyatāya, amhe antevāsike icchanto. ^b^evamāhā^eb^ti ``etu viññupuriso''tiādimāha. ^b^yo eva vo ācariyo^eb^ti yo eva tumhākaṃ pakatiyā ācariyo. ^b^uddesā no cāvetukāmo^eb^ti attano anusāsaniṃ gāhāpetvā amhe amhākaṃ uddesato cāvetukāmo. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P3.0843^ea^ ^b^eva vo uddeso hotū^eb^ti yo tumhākaṃ pakatiyā uddeso, so tumhākaṃyeva hotu ^a^M3.0027^ea^, na mayaṃ tumhākaṃ uddesena atthikā. ^b^ājīvā^eb^ti ājīvato. ^b^akusalasaṅkhātā^eb^ti akusalāti koṭṭhāsaṃ pattā. ^b^akusalā dhammā^eb^ti dvādasa akusalacittuppādadhammā taṇhāyeva vā visesena. sā hi punabbhavakaraṇato ``ponobbhavikā''ti vuttā. ^b^sadarathā^eb^ti kilesadarathasampayuttā. ^b^jātijarāmaraṇiyā^eb^ti jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ paccayabhūtā. ^b^saṃkilesikā dhammā^eb^ti dvādasa akusalacittuppādā. ^b^vodāniyā^eb^ti, samathavipassanā dhammā. te hi satte vodāpenti, tasmā ``vodāniyā''ti vuccanti. ^b^paññāpāripūri^eb^nti maggapaññāpāripūriṃ. ^b^vepullattañcā^eb^ti phalapaññāvepullataṃ, ubhopi vā etāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``tato tumhe maggapaññañceva phalapaññañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā''ti. evaṃ bhagavā paribbājake ārabbha attano ovādānusāsaniyā phalaṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathā taṃ mārenā^eb^ti yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittā nisīdanti evameva tuṇhībhūtā...pe0... appaṭibhānā nisinnā.

[03] māro ^a^V3.0025^ea^ kira satthā ativiya gajjanto buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā imesaṃ paribbājakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, kadāci dhammābhisamayo bhaveyya, handāhaṃ pariyuṭṭhāmīti so tesaṃ cittāni pariyuṭṭhāsi. appahīnavipallāsānañhi cittaṃ mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ hoti. tepi mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittā thaddhaṅgapaccaṅgā viya tuṇhī appaṭibhānā nisīdiṃsu. atha satthā ime paribbājakā ativiya niravā hutvā nisinnā, kiṃ nu khoti āvajjanto mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ aññāsi. sace pana tesaṃ maggaphaluppattihetu bhaveyya, māraṃ paṭibāhitvāpi bhagavā dhammaṃ deseyya, so pana tesaṃ natthi. ``sabbepi me tucchapurisā''ti aññāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``atha kho bhagavato etadahosi sabbepi me moghapurisā''tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^phuṭṭhā pāpimatā^eb^ti pāpimatā mārena phuṭṭhā. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yesu nāma. ^b^aññāṇatthampī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0844^ea^ jānanatthampi. ^b^kiṃ karissati sattāho^eb^ti samaṇena gotamena paricchinnasattāho amhākaṃ kiṃ karissati. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ``samaṇena gotamena `sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati sattāha'nti vuttaṃ, so sattāho amhākaṃ kiṃ apphāsukaṃ karissati. ^a^M3.0028^ea^ handa mayaṃ sattāhabbhantare etaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikātuṃ sakkā, na sakkāti aññāṇatthampi brahmacariyaṃ carissāmā''ti. atha vā jānāma tāvassa dhammanti ekadivase ekavāraṃ aññāṇatthampi etesaṃ cittaṃ nuppannaṃ, sattāho pana etesaṃ kusītānaṃ kiṃ karissati, kiṃ sakkhissanti te sattāhaṃ pūretunti ayamettha adhippāyo. ^b^sīhanāda^eb^nti paravādabhindanaṃ sakavādasamussāpanañca abhītanādaṃ naditvā. ^b^paccupaṭṭhāsī^eb^ti patiṭṭhito. ^b^tāvadevā^eb^ti tasmiññeva khaṇe. ^b^rājagahaṃ pāvisī^eb^ti rājagahameva paviṭṭho. tesaṃ pana paribbājakānaṃ kiñcāpi idaṃ suttantaṃ sutvā viseso na nibbatto, āyatiṃ pana nesaṃ vāsanāya paccayo bhavissatīti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] udumbarikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0026^ea^ ^a^M3.0029^ea^ ^a^P3.0845^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti cakkavattisuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^mātulāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake nagare. taṃ nagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā avidūre vanasaṇḍe viharati. ``tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesī''ti ettha ayamanupubbikathā --

[03] bhagavā kira imassa suttassa samuṭṭhānasamaye paccūsakāle mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento imāya anāgatavaṃsadīpikāya suttantakathāya mātulanagaravāsīnaṃ caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā pātova vīsatibhikkhusahassaparivāro mātulanagaraṃ sampatto. mātulanagaravāsino khattiyā ``bhagavā āgato''ti sutvā paccuggamma dasabalaṃ nimantetvā mahāsakkārena nagaraṃ pavesetvā nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidhāya bhagavantaṃ mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. bhagavā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne imesaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmi, ayaṃ padeso sambādho, manussānaṃ ṭhātuṃ vā nisīdituṃ vā okāso na bhavissati, mahatā kho pana samāgamena bhavitabba''nti.

[03] atha rājakulānaṃ bhattānumodanaṃ akatvāva pattaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhami. manussā cintayiṃsu -- ``satthā amhākaṃ anumodanampi akatvā gacchati, addhā bhattaggaṃ amanāpaṃ ahosi, buddhānaṃ nāma na sakkā cittaṃ gahetuṃ, buddhehi saddhiṃ vissāsakaraṇaṃ nāma samussitaphaṇaṃ āsīvisaṃ gīvāya gahaṇasadisaṃ hoti; etha bho, tathāgataṃ khamāpessāmā''ti. sakalanagaravāsino bhagavatā saheva nikkhantā. bhagavā gacchantova magadhakkhette ṭhitaṃ sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ sandacchāyaṃ karīsamattabhūmipatthaṭaṃ ekaṃ mātularukkhaṃ disvā imasmiṃ rukkhamūle ^a^V3.0027^ea^ nisīditvā dhamme desiyamāne ``mahājanassa ^a^P3.0846^ea^ ṭhānanisajjanokāso bhavissatī''ti. nivattitvā ^a^M3.0030^ea^ maggā okkamma rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattheraṃ olokesi. thero olokitasaññāya eva ``satthā nisīditukāmo''ti ñatvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ paññapetvā adāsi. nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. athassa purato manussā nisīdiṃsu. ubhosu passesu pacchato ca bhikkhusaṅgho, ākāse devatā aṭṭhaṃsu, evaṃ mahāparisamajjhagato tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi.

[03] ^b^te bhikkhū^eb^ti tatra upaviṭṭhā dhammappaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū. ^b^attadīpā^eb^ti attānaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gatiṃ parāyaṇaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharathāti attho. ^b^attasaraṇā^eb^ti idaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^anaññasaraṇā^eb^ti idaṃ aññasaraṇapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ. na hi añño aññassa saraṇaṃ hoti, aññassa vāyāmena aññassa asujjhanato. vuttampi cetaṃ ``attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā''ti (dha0 pa0 160). tenāha ``anaññasaraṇā''ti. ko panettha attā nāma, lokiyalokuttaro dhammo. tenāha -- ``dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā''ti. ``kāye kāyānupassī''tiādīni mahāsatipaṭṭhāne vitthāritāni.

[03] ^b^gocare^eb^ti carituṃ yuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^sake^eb^ti attano santake. ^b^pettike visaye^eb^ti pitito āgatavisaye. ^b^carata^eb^nti carantānaṃ. ``caranta''ntipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^na lacchatī^eb^ti na labhissati na passissati. ^b^māro^eb^ti devaputtamāropi, maccumāropi, kilesamāropi. ^b^otāra^eb^nti randhaṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ. ayaṃ panattho leḍḍuṭṭhānato nikkhamma toraṇe nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapantaṃ lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ gahetvā. pakkhandasenasakuṇavatthunā dīpetabbo. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṃ paridevasi `mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṃ appapuññā, ye ^a^P3.0847^ea^ mayaṃ agocare carimha paravisaye, sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye, na myāyaṃ sakuṇagghi alaṃ abhavissa yadidaṃ yuddhāyā'ti. ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayoti? yadidaṃ ^a^M3.0031^ea^ naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṃ leḍḍuṭṭhānanti. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ pamuñci gaccha kho tvaṃ lāpa, tatrapi gantvā na mokkhasīti.

[02] atha kho ^a^V3.0028^ea^, bhikkhave, lāpo sakuṇo naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇaṃ leḍḍuṭṭhānaṃ gantvā mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā sakuṇagghiṃ vadamāno aṭṭhāsi ``ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghī''ti. atha kho sā, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi sake bale apatthaddhā sake bale asaṃvadamānā ubho pakkhe sannayha lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā. yadā kho, bhikkhave, aññāsi lāpo sakuṇo bahuāgatā kho myāyaṃ sakuṇagghīti, atha kho tasseva leḍḍussa antaraṃ paccupādi. atha kho, bhikkhave, sakuṇagghi tattheva uraṃ paccatāḷesi. evañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.

[02] tasmātiha, bhikkhave, mā agocare carittha paravisaye, agocare, bhikkhave, carataṃ paravisaye lacchati māro otāraṃ, lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ. ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo, yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā. katame pañca? cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, ghānaviññeyyā gandhā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo.

[02] gocare, bhikkhave, caratha...pe0... na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ. ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. katame cattāro? idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ; vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ; citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ; dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ -- ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayoti (saṃ0 ni0 5.371).

[03] ^b^kusalāna^eb^nti anavajjalakkhaṇānaṃ. ^b^samādānahetū^eb^ti samādāya vattanahetu. ^b^evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0029^ea^ evaṃ idaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ puññaphalaṃ vaḍḍhati, puññaphalanti ca uparūpari puññampi puññavipākopi veditabbo.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M3.0032^ea^ ^b^duvidhaṃ kusalaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0848^ea^ vaṭṭagāmī ca vivaṭṭagāmī ca. tattha vaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ nāma mātāpitūnaṃ puttadhītāsu puttadhītānañca mātāpitūsu sinehavasena mudumaddavacittaṃ. vivaṭṭagāmikusalaṃ nāma ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''tiādibhedā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā. tesu vaṭṭagāmipuññassa pariyosānaṃ manussaloke cakkavattisirīvibhavo. vivaṭṭagāmikusalassa maggaphalanibbānasampatti. tattha vivaṭṭagāmikusalassa vipākaṃ suttapariyosāne dassessati.

[03] idha pana vaṭṭagāmikusalassa vipākadassanatthaṃ, bhikkhave, yadā puttadhītaro mātāpitūnaṃ ovāde na aṭṭhaṃsu, tadā āyunāpi vaṇṇenāpi issariyenāpi parihāyiṃsu. yadā pana aṭṭhaṃsu, tadā vaḍḍhiṃsūti vatvā vaṭṭagāmikusalānusandhivasena ``bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave''ti desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha cakkavattītiādīni mahāpadāne (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.33) vitthāritāneva.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ^b^osakkita^eb^nti īsakampi avasakkitaṃ. ^b^ṭhānā cuta^eb^nti sabbaso ṭhānā apagataṃ. taṃ kira cakkaratanaṃ antepuradvāre akkhāhataṃ viya vehāsaṃ aṭṭhāsi. athassa ubhosu passesu dve khadiratthambhe nikhaṇitvā cakkaratanamatthake nemiabhimukhaṃ ekaṃ suttakaṃ bandhiṃsu. adhobhāgepi nemiabhimukhaṃ ekaṃ bandhiṃsu. tesu uparimasuttato appamattakampi ogataṃ cakkaratanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti, heṭṭhā suttassa ṭhānaṃ uparimakoṭiyā atikkantagataṃ ṭhānā cutaṃ nāma hoti, tadetaṃ atibalavadose sati evaṃ hoti. suttamattampi ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattaṃ vā bhaṭṭhaṃ ṭhānā cutameva hoti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ``osakkitaṃ ṭhānā cuta''nti.

[03] ^b^atha me āroceyyāsī^eb^ti tāta, tvaṃ ajja ādiṃ katvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ cakkaratanassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha, evaṃ gacchanto yadā cakkaratanaṃ īsakampi osakkitaṃ ṭhānā cutaṃ passasi, atha mayhaṃ ācikkheyyāsi. jīvitañhi me tava hatthe nikkhittanti. ^b^addasā^eb^ti appamatto divasassa tikkhattuṃ gantvā olokento ekadivasaṃ addasa.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha^eb^ ^a^M3.0033^ea^ ^b^kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti bhikkhave, atha rājā daḷhanemi ``cakkaratanaṃ osakkita''nti ^a^V3.0030^ea^ sutvā uppannabalavadomanasso ``na dāni mayā ciraṃ jīvitabbaṃ bhavissati, appāvasesaṃ me āyu, na me dāni kāme paribhuñjanakālo, pabbajjākālo me ^a^P3.0849^ea^ idānī''ti roditvā paridevitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ āmantāpetvā etadavoca. ^b^samuddapariyanta^eb^nti parikkhittaekasamuddapariyantameva. idaṃ hissa kulasantakaṃ. cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ pana puññiddhivasena nibbattaṃ, na taṃ sakkā dātuṃ. kulasantakaṃ pana niyyātento ``samuddapariyanta''nti āha. ^b^kesamassu^eb^nti tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajantāpi hi paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārenti. tato paṭṭhāya parūḷhakese bandhitvā vicaranti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``kesamassuṃ ohāretvā''ti.

[03] ^b^kāsāyānī^eb^ti kasāyarasapītāni. ādito evaṃ katvā pacchā vakkalānipi dhārenti. ^b^pabbajī^eb^ti pabbajito. pabbajitvā ca attano maṅgalavanuyyāneyeva vasi. ^b^rājisimhī^eb^ti rājaīsimhi. brāhmaṇapabbajitā hi ``brāhmaṇisayo''ti vuccanti. setacchattaṃ pana pahāya rājapabbajitā rājisayoti. ^b^antaradhāyī^eb^ti antarahitaṃ nibbutadīpasikhā viya abhāvaṃ upagataṃ. ^b^paṭisaṃvedesī^eb^ti kandanto paridevanto jānāpesi. ^b^pettika^eb^nti pitito āgataṃ dāyajjaṃ na hoti, na sakkā kusītena hīnavīriyena dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattantena pāpuṇituṃ. attano pana sukataṃ kammaṃ nissāya dasavidhaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ vā cakkavattivattaṃ pūrentenevetaṃ pattabbanti dīpeti. atha naṃ vattapaṭipattiyaṃ codento ``iṅgha tva''ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^ariye^eb^ti niddose. ^b^cakkavattivatte^eb^ti cakkavattīnaṃ vatte.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhamma^eb^nti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ. ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā. ^b^dhammaṃ sakkaronto^eb^ti yathā kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti, evametaṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaṃ garuṃ karonto^eb^ti tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā taṃ garuṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaṃ mānento^eb^ti tameva dhammaṃ piyañca bhāvanīyañca katvā viharanto. ^b^dhammaṃ pūjento^eb^ti taṃ apadisitvā gandhamālādipūjanenassa pūjaṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0850^ea^ ^b^apacayamāno^eb^ti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi nīcavuttitaṃ karonto. ^b^dhammaddhajo^eb^ ^a^M3.0034^ea^ ^b^dhammaketū^eb^ti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā ketumiva ca ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho. ^b^dhammādhipateyyo^eb^ti dhammādhipatibhūto āgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo hutvā. ^b^dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahassū^eb^ti dhammo assā atthīti dhammikā, rakkhā ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti ^a^V3.0031^ea^. tattha ``paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.385) vacanato khantiādayo rakkhā. vuttañhetaṃ ``kathañca, bhikkhave, paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati. khantiyā avihiṃsāya mettacittatā anuddayatā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.385). nivāsanapārupanagehādīnaṃ nivāraṇā āvaraṇaṃ, corādiupaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ gopāyanā gutti, taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu saṃvidahassu pavattaya ṭhapehīti attho. idāni yattha sā saṃvidahitabbā, taṃ dassento ^b^antojanasmi^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- antojanasaṅkhātaṃ tava puttadāraṃ sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhapehi, vatthagandhamālādīni cassa dehi, sabbopaddave cassa nivārehi. ^b^balakāyā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ayaṃ pana viseso -- balakāyo kālaṃ anatikkamitvā bhattavetanasampadānenapi anuggahetabbo. abhisittakhattiyā bhadrassājāneyyādiratanasampadānenapi upasaṅgaṇhitabbā. anuyantakhattiyā tesaṃ anurūpayānavāhanasampadānenapi paritosetabbā. brāhmaṇā annapānavatthādinā deyyadhammena. gahapatikā bhattabījanaṅgalaphālabalibaddādisampadānena. tathā nigamavāsino negamā, janapadavāsino ca jānapadā. samitapāpabāhitapāpā samaṇabrāhmaṇā samaṇaparikkhārasampadānena sakkātabbā. migapakkhino abhayadānena samassāsetabbā.

[03] ^b^vijite^eb^ti attano āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne. ^b^adhammakāro^eb^ti adhammakiriyā. ^b^mā pavattitthā^eb^ti yathā nappavattati, tathā naṃ paṭipādehīti attho. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti samitapāpabāhitapāpā. ^b^madappamādā^eb^ ^a^P3.0851^ea^ ^b^paṭiviratā^eb^ti navavidhā mānamadā, pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossajjanasaṅkhātā pamādā ca paṭiviratā. ^b^khantisoracce niviṭṭhā^eb^ti adhivāsanakhantiyañca suratabhāve ca patiṭṭhitā. ^b^ekamattāna^eb^nti attano rāgādīnaṃ damanādīhi ekamattānaṃ damenti samenti parinibbāpentīti vuccanti. ^b^kālena kāla^eb^nti kāle kāle ^a^M3.0035^ea^. ^b^abhinivajjeyyāsī^eb^ti gūthaṃ viya visaṃ viya aggiṃ viya ca suṭṭhu vajjeyyāsi. ^b^samādāyā^eb^ti surabhikusumadāmaṃ viya amataṃ viya ca sammā ādāya pavatteyyāsi.

[03] idha ṭhatvā vattaṃ samānetabbaṃ. antojanasmiṃ balakāyepi ekaṃ, khattiyesu ekaṃ, anuyantesu ekaṃ, brāhmaṇagahapatikesu ekaṃ, negamajānapadesu ekaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ekaṃ, migapakkhīsu ekaṃ, adhammakārappaṭikkhepo ekaṃ, adhanānaṃ dhanānuppadānaṃ ekaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhapucchanaṃ ekanti evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ hoti. gahapatike pana pakkhijāte ca visuṃ katvā gaṇentassa dvādasavidhaṃ hoti. pubbe avuttaṃ vā gaṇentena adhammarāgassa ca visamalobhassa ^a^V3.0032^ea^ ca pahānavasena dvādasavidhaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^idaṃ kho tāta ta^eb^nti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ dvādasavidhañca ariyacakkavattivattaṃ nāma. ^b^vattamānassā^eb^ti pūretvā vattamānassa. ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^tiādi mahāsudassane vuttaṃ.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ^b^samatenā^eb^ti attano matiyā. ^b^suda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^pasāsatī^eb^ti anusāsati. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- porāṇakaṃ rājavaṃsaṃ rājapaveṇiṃ rājadhammaṃ pahāya attano matimatte ṭhatvā janapadaṃ anusāsatīti. evamayaṃ maghadevavaṃsassa kaḷārajanako viya daḷhanemivaṃsassa upacchedako antimapuriso hutvā uppanno. ^b^pubbenāpara^eb^nti pubbakālena sadisā hutvā aparakālaṃ. ^b^janapadā na pabbantī^eb^ti na vaḍḍhanti. ^b^yathā taṃ pubbakāna^eb^nti yathā pubbakānaṃ rājūnaṃ pubbe ca pacchā ca sadisāyeva hutvā pabbiṃsu, tathā na pabbanti. katthaci suññā honti hataviluttā, telamadhuphāṇitādīsu ^a^P3.0852^ea^ ceva yāgubhattādīsu ca ojāpi parihāyitthāti attho.

[03] ^b^amaccā pārisajjā^eb^ti amaccā ceva parisāvacarā ca. ^b^gaṇakamahāmattā^eb^ti acchiddakādipāṭhagaṇakā ceva mahāamaccā ca. ^b^anīkaṭṭhā^eb^ti hatthiācariyādayo. ^b^dovārikā^eb^ti dvārarakkhino. ^b^mantassājīvino^eb^ti mantā vuccati paññā, taṃ nissayaṃ katvā ye jīvanti paṇḍitā mahāmattā, tesaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ^b^no^eb^ ^a^M3.0036^ea^ ^b^ca kho adhanāna^eb^nti balavalobhattā pana adhanānaṃ daliddamanussānaṃ dhanaṃ nānuppadāsi. ^b^nānuppadiyamāne^eb^ti ananuppadiyamāne, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^dāliddiya^eb^nti daliddabhāvo. ^b^attanā ca jīvāhī^eb^ti sayañca jīvaṃ yāpehīti attho. ^b^uddhaggika^eb^ntiādīsu uparūparibhūmīsu phaladānavasena uddhamaggamassāti uddhaggikā. saggassa hitā tatrupapattijananatoti sovaggikā. nibbattaṭṭhāne sukho vipāko assāti sukhavipākā. suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ dasannaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato saggasaṃvattanikā. evarūpaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dānaṃ patiṭṭhapetīti attho.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ^b^pavaḍḍhissatī^eb^ti vaḍḍhissati bahuṃ bhavissati. ^b^sunisedhaṃ nisedheyya^eb^nti suṭṭhu nisiddhaṃ nisedheyyaṃ. ^b^mūlaghacca^eb^nti mūlahataṃ. ^b^kharassarenā^eb^ti pharusasaddena. ^b^paṇavenā^eb^ti vajjhabheriyā.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīsāni^eb^ ^a^V3.0033^ea^ ^b^nesaṃ chindissāmā^eb^ti yesaṃ antamaso mūlakamuṭṭhimpi harissāma, tesaṃ tatheva sīsāni chindissāma, yathā koci haṭabhāvampi na jānissati, amhākaṃ dāni kimettha rājāpi evaṃ uṭṭhāya paraṃ māretīti ayaṃ nesaṃ adhippāyo. ^b^upakkamiṃsū^eb^ti ārabhiṃsu. ^b^panthaduhana^eb^nti panthaghātaṃ, panthe ṭhatvā corakammaṃ.
[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ^b^na hi, devā^eb^ti so kira cintesi -- ``ayaṃ rājā saccaṃ devāti mukhapaṭiññāya dinnāya mārāpeti, handāhaṃ musāvādaṃ karomī''ti, maraṇabhayā ``na hi devā''ti avoca.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekida^eb^nti ^a^P3.0853^ea^ ettha ^b^ida^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, eke sattāti attho. ^b^cāritta^eb^nti micchācāraṃ. ^b^abhijjhābyāpādā^eb^ti abhijjhā ca byāpādo ca. ^b^micchādiṭṭhī^eb^ti natthi dinnantiādikā antaggāhikā paccanīkadiṭṭhi.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhammarāgo^eb^ti mātā mātucchā pitucchā mātulānītiādike ayuttaṭṭhāne rāgo. ^b^visamalobho^eb^ti paribhogayuttesupi ṭhānesu atibalavalobho. ^b^micchādhammo^eb^ti purisānaṃ purisesu itthīnañca itthīsu chandarāgo.

[03] ^b^amatteyyatā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M3.0037^ea^ mātu hito matteyyo, tassa bhāvo matteyyatā, mātari sammā paṭipattiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. tassā abhāvo ceva tappaṭipakkhatā ca amatteyyatā. ^b^apetteyyatā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^na kule jeṭṭhāpacāyitā^eb^ti kule jeṭṭhānaṃ apacitiyā nīcavuttiyā akaraṇabhāvo.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ imesa^eb^nti yasmiṃ samaye imesaṃ. ^b^alaṃpateyyā^eb^ti patino dātuṃ yuttā. ^b^imāni rasānī^eb^ti imāni loke aggarasāni. ^b^atibyādippissantī^eb^ti ativiya dippissanti, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^kusalantipi na bhavissatī^eb^ti kusalanti nāmampi na bhavissati, paññattimattampi na paññāyissatīti attho. ^b^pujjā ca bhavissanti pāsaṃsā cā^eb^ti pūjārahā ca bhavissanti pasaṃsārahā ca. tadā kira manussā ``asukena nāma mātā pahatā, pitā pahato, samaṇabrāhmaṇā jīvitā voropitā, kule jeṭṭhānaṃ atthibhāvampi na jānāti, aho puriso''ti tameva pūjessanti ceva pasaṃsissanti ca.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V3.0034^ea^ ^b^bhavissati mātāti vā^eb^ti ayaṃ mayhaṃ mātāti garucittaṃ na bhavissati. gehe mātugāmaṃ viya nānāvidhaṃ asabbhikathaṃ kathayamānā agāravupacārena upasaṅkamissanti. ^b^mātucchā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ettha ca ^b^mātucchā^eb^ti mātubhaginī. ^b^mātulānī^eb^ti mātulabhariyā. ^b^ācariyabhariyā^eb^ti sippāyatanāni sikkhāpakassa ācariyassa bhariyā. ^b^garūnaṃ dārā^eb^ti cūḷapitumahāpituādīnaṃ bhariyā. ^b^sambheda^eb^nti ^a^P3.0854^ea^ missībhāvaṃ, mariyādabhedaṃ vā.

[03] ^b^tibbo āghāto paccupaṭṭhito bhavissatī^eb^ti balavakopo punappunaṃ uppattivasena paccupaṭṭhito bhavissati. aparāni dve etasseva vevacanāni. kopo hi cittaṃ āghātetīti ^b^āghāto.^eb^ attano ca parassa ca hitasukhaṃ byāpādetīti ^b^byāpādo.^eb^ manopadūsanato ^b^manopadoso^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^tibbaṃ vadhakacitta^eb^nti piyamānassāpi paraṃ māraṇatthāya vadhakacittaṃ. tassa vatthuṃ dassetuṃ ^b^mātupi puttamhī^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^māgavikassā^eb^ti migaluddakassa.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthantarakappo^eb^ti ^a^M3.0038^ea^ satthena antarakappo. saṃvaṭṭakappaṃ appatvā antarāva lokavināso. antarakappo ca nāmesa dubbhikkhantarakappo rogantarakappo satthantarakappoti tividho. tattha lobhussadāya pajāya dubbhikkhantarakappo hoti. mohussadāya rogantarakappo. dosussadāya satthantarakappo. tattha dubbhikkhantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena pettivisaye upapajjanti. kasmā? āhāranikantiyā balavattā. rogantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena sagge nibbattanti kasmā? tesañhi ``aho vataññesaṃ sattānaṃ evarūpo rogo na bhaveyyā''ti mettacittaṃ uppajjatīti. satthantarakappena naṭṭhā yebhuyyena niraye upapajjanti. kasmā? aññamaññaṃ balavāghātatāya.

[03] ^b^migasañña^eb^nti ``ayaṃ migo, ayaṃ migo''ti saññaṃ. ^b^tiṇhāni satthāni hatthesu pātubhavissantī^eb^ti tesaṃ kira hatthena phuṭṭhamattaṃ yaṃkiñci antamaso tiṇapaṇṇaṃ upādāya āvudhameva bhavissati. ^b^mā ca mayaṃ kañcī^eb^ti mayaṃ kañci ekapurisampi jīvitā mā voropayimha. ^b^mā ca amhe kocī^eb^ti amhepi koci ekapuriso jīvitā mā voropayittha. ^b^yaṃnūna maya^eb^nti ayaṃ lokavināso paccupaṭṭhito, na sakkā dvīhi ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitehi jīvitaṃ laddhunti maññamānā evaṃ cintayiṃsu. ^b^vanagahana^eb^nti vanasaṅkhātehi tiṇagumbalatādīhi gahanaṃ duppavesaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^rukkhagahana^eb^nti rukkhehi gahanaṃ duppavesaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^nadīvidugga^eb^nti ^a^P3.0855^ea^ nadīnaṃ antaradīpādīsu duggamanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^pabbatavisama^eb^nti pabbatehi visamaṃ, pabbatesupi vā visamaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^sabhāgāyissantī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0035^ea^ yathā ahaṃ jīvāmi diṭṭhā bho sattā, tvampi tathā jīvasīti evaṃ sammodanakathāya attanā sabhāge karissanti.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyata^eb^nti mahantaṃ. ^b^pāṇātipātā virameyyāmā^eb^ti pāṇātipātato osakkeyyāma. pāṇātipātaṃ virameyyāmātipi sajjhāyanti, tattha pāṇātipātaṃ pajaheyyāmāti attho. ^b^vīsativassāyukā^eb^ti mātāpitaro ^a^M3.0039^ea^ pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā, puttā kasmā vīsativassāyukā ahesunti khettavisuddhiyā. tesañhi mātāpitaro sīlavanto jātā. iti sīlagabbhe vaḍḍhitattā imāya khettavisuddhiyā dīghāyukā ahesuṃ. ye panettha kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattā, te attanova sīlasampattiyā dīghāyukā ahesuṃ.
[03] ^b^assāmā^eb^ti bhaveyyāma. ^b^cattārīsavassāyukā^eb^tiādayo koṭṭhāsā adinnādānādīhi paṭiviratānaṃ vasena veditabbā.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ^b^icchā^eb^ti mayhaṃ bhattaṃ dethāti evaṃ uppajjanakataṇhā. ^b^anasana^eb^nti na asanaṃ avipphārikabhāvo kāyālasiyaṃ, bhattaṃ bhuttānaṃ bhattasammadapaccayā nipajjitukāmatājanako kāyadubbalabhāvoti attho. ^b^jarā^eb^ti pākaṭajarā. ^b^kukkuṭasampātikā^eb^ti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhato uppatitvā itaragāmassa chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasampāto. etāsu atthīti kukkuṭasampātikā. ``kukkuṭasampādikā''tipi pāṭho, gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasampādo etāsu atthīti attho. ubhayampetaṃ ghananivāsataṃyeva dīpeti. ^b^avīci maññe phuṭo bhavissatī^eb^ti avīcimahānirayo viya nirantarapūrito bhavissati.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``asītivassasahassāyukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ^b^metteyyo^eb^ nāma bhagavā loke uppajjissatī''ti na vaḍḍhamānakavasena vuttaṃ. na hi buddhā vaḍḍhamāne āyumhi nibbattanti, hāyamāne pana nibbattanti. tasmā yadā taṃ āyu vaḍḍhitvā ^a^P3.0856^ea^ asaṅkheyyataṃ patvā puna hāyamānaṃ asītivassasahassakāle ṭhassati, tadā uppajjissatīti attho. ^b^pariharissatī^eb^ti idaṃ pana parivāretvā ^a^V3.0036^ea^ vicarantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^yūpo^eb^ti pāsādo. ^b^raññā mahāpanādena kārāpito^eb^ti raññā hetubhūtena tassatthāya sakkena devarājena vissakammadevaputtaṃ pesetvā kārāpito. pubbe kira dve pitāputtā naḷakārā paccekabuddhassa naḷehi ca udumbarehi ^a^M3.0040^ea^ ca paṇṇasālaṃ kārāpetvā taṃ tattha vāsāpetvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃsu. te kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattā. tesu pitā devalokeyeva aṭṭhāsi. putto devalokā cavitvā surucissa rañño deviyā sumedhāya kucchismiṃ nibbatto. mahāpanādo nāma kumāro ahosi. so aparabhāge chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahāpanādo nāma rājā jāto. athassa puññānubhāvena sakko devarājā vissakammadevaputtaṃ rañño pāsādaṃ karohīti pahiṇi so tassa pāsādaṃ nimmini pañcavīsatiyojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ satabhūmakaṃ. yaṃ sandhāya jātake vuttaṃ --
[21] ``panādo nāma so rājā, yassa yūpo suvaṇṇayo.
[22] tiriyaṃ soḷasubbedho, uddhamāhu sahassadhā..
[21] sahassakaṇḍo satageṇḍu, dhajālu haritāmayo.
[22] anaccuṃ tattha gandhabbā, cha sahassāni sattadhā..
[21] evametaṃ tadā āsi, yathā bhāsasi bhaddaji.
[22] sakko ahaṃ tadā āsiṃ, veyyāvaccakaro tavā''ti.. (jā0 5.3.42).

[03] so rājā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. tasmiṃ devaloke nibbatte so pāsādo mahāgaṅgāya anusotaṃ pati. tassa dhurasopānasammukhaṭṭhāne payāgapatiṭṭhānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitaṃ. thupikāsammukhaṭṭhāne koṭigāmo nāma. aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle so naḷakāradevaputto devalokato cavitvā manussapathe bhaddajiseṭṭhi nāma hutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. so nāvāya gaṅgātaraṇadivase bhikkhusaṅghassa taṃ pāsādaṃ dassetīti vatthu vitthāretabbaṃ. kasmā panesa pāsādo na antarahitoti? itarassa ānubhāvā. tena saddhiṃ ^a^P3.0857^ea^ puññaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattakulaputto anāgate saṅkho nāma rājā bhavissati. tassa paribhogatthāya so pāsādo uṭṭhahissati, tasmā na antarahitoti.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ^b^ussāpetvā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0041^ea^ taṃ pāsādaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^ajjhāvasitvā^eb^ti tattha vasitvā. ^b^taṃ datvā vissajjitvā^eb^ti taṃ pāsādaṃ dānavasena datvā nirapekkho pariccāgavasena ca vissajjitvā. kassa ^a^V3.0037^ea^ ca evaṃ datvāti? samaṇādīnaṃ. tenāha -- ``samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ dānaṃ datvā''ti. kathaṃ pana so ekaṃ pāsādaṃ bahūnaṃ dassatīti? evaṃ kirassa cittaṃ uppajjissati ``ayaṃ pāsādo vippakiriyatū''ti. so khaṇḍakhaṇḍaso vippakirissati. so taṃ alaggamānova hutvā ``yo yattakaṃ icchati, so tattakaṃ gaṇhatū''ti dānavasena vissajjissati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``dānaṃ datvā metteyyassa bhagavato...pe0... viharissatī''ti. ettakena bhagavā vaṭṭagāmikusalassa anusandhiṃ dasseti.
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ idāni vivaṭṭagāmikusalassa anusandhiṃ dassento puna ^b^attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharathā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ^b^idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno āyusmi^eb^nti bhikkhave yaṃ vo ahaṃ āyunāpi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ, tattha idaṃ bhikkhuno āyusmiṃ idaṃ āyukāraṇanti attho. tasmā tumhehi āyunā vaḍḍhitukāmehi ime cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇasmi^eb^nti yaṃ vo ahaṃ vaṇṇenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ, idaṃ tattha vaṇṇakāraṇaṃ. sīlavato hi avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vasena sarīravaṇṇopi kittivasena guṇavaṇṇopi vaḍḍhati. tasmā tumhehi vaṇṇena vaḍḍhitukāmehi sīlasampannehi bhavitabbanti dasseti.

[03] ^b^sukhasmi^eb^nti yaṃ vo ahaṃ sukhenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ, idaṃ tattha vivekajaṃ pītisukhādinānappakārakaṃ jhānasukhaṃ. tasmā tumhehi sukhena vaḍḍhitukāmehi imāni cattāri jhānāni bhāvetabbāni.

[03] ^b^bhogasmi^eb^nti yaṃ vo ahaṃ bhogenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ, ayaṃ so appamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ appaṭikūlatāvaho sukhasayanādi ekādasānisaṃso sabbadisāvipphāritabrahmavihārabhogo. tasmā tumhehi bhogena vaḍḍhitukāmehi ime brahmavihārā bhāvetabbā.

[03] ^b^balasmi^eb^nti ^a^M3.0042^ea^ yaṃ vo ahaṃ balenapi vaḍḍhissathāti avocaṃ, idaṃ ^a^P3.0858^ea^ āsavakkhayapariyosāne uppannaṃ ^a^V3.0038^ea^ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ. tasmā tumhehi balena vaḍḍhitukāmehi arahattappattiyā yogo karaṇīyo.

[03] ^b^yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, mārabala^eb^nti yathā idaṃ devaputtamāramaccumārakilesamārānaṃ balaṃ duppasahaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ, evaṃ aññaṃ loke ekabalampi na samanupassāmi. tampi balaṃ idameva arahattaphalaṃ pasahati abhibhavati ajjhottharati. tasmā ettheva yogo karaṇīyoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^evamidaṃ puñña^eb^nti evaṃ idaṃ lokuttarapuññampi yāva āsavakkhayā pavaḍḍhatīti vivaṭṭagāmikusalānusandhiṃ niṭṭhapento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi. suttapariyosāne vīsati bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsūti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] cakkavattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0859^ea^ ^a^V3.0039^ea^ ^a^M3.0043^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti aggaññasuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ anupubbikathā. atīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusatasahassassa dānaṃ datvā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā ``anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī''ti patthanaṃ akāsi. sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. jātakāle tassā visākhāti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. sā yadā bhagavā bhaddiyanagaraṃ āgamāsi, tadā pañcadāsisatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.

[03] aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā. tattha naṃ migāraseṭṭhi mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. tasmā migāramātāti vuccati. patikulaṃ gacchantiyā cassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi. tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu, muttānaṃ ekādasa nāḷiyo, pavāḷassa dvāvīsati nāḷiyo, maṇīnaṃ tettiṃsa nāḷiyo. iti etehi ca aññehi ca sattahi ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati. pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva naṃ itthī dhāretuṃ sakkoti. sā aparabhāge dasabalassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā hutvā taṃ pasādhanaṃ vissajjetvā navahi koṭīhi bhagavato vihāraṃ kārayamānā karīsamatte bhūmibhāge pāsādaṃ kāresi ^a^P3.0860^ea^. tassa uparibhūmiyaṃ pañca gabbhasatāni honti, heṭṭhimabhūmiyaṃ pañcāti gabbhasahassappaṭimaṇḍito ahosi. sā ``suddhapāsādova na sobhatī''ti taṃ parivāretvā pañca duvaḍḍhagehasatāni, pañca cūḷapāsādasatāni ^a^V3.0040^ea^, pañca dīghasālasatāni ca kārāpesi. vihāramaho catūhi māsehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.

[03] mātugāmattabhāve ^a^M3.0044^ea^ ṭhitāya visākhāya viya aññissā buddhasāsane dhanapariccāgo nāma natthi, purisattabhāve ṭhitassa anāthapiṇḍikassa viya aññassāti. so hi catupaṇṇāsakoṭiyo vissajjetvā sāvatthiyā dakkhiṇabhāge anurādhapurassa mahāvihārasadise ṭhāne jetavanamahāvihāraṃ nāma kāresi. visākhā sāvatthiyā pācīnabhāge uttaradeviyā vihārasadise ṭhāne pubbārāmaṃ nāma kāresi. bhagavā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ anukampāya sāvatthiṃ nissāya viharanto imesu dvīsu vihāresu nibaddhavāsaṃ vasi. ekaṃ antovassaṃ jetavane vasati, ekaṃ pubbārāme. tasmiṃ samaye pana bhagavā pubbārāme viharati. tena vuttaṃ ``pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde''ti.

[03] ^b^vāseṭṭhabhāradvājā^eb^ti vāseṭṭho ca sāmaṇero bhāradvājo ca. ^b^bhikkhūsu parivasantī^eb^ti te neva titthiyaparivāsaṃ vasanti, na āpattiparivāsaṃ. aparipuṇṇavassattā pana bhikkhubhāvaṃ patthayamānā vasanti. tenevāha ``bhikkhubhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamānā''ti. ubhopi hete udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattā, cattālīsa cattālīsa koṭivibhavā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū majjhimanikāye ^b^vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ^eb^ sutvā saraṇaṃ gatā, ^b^tevijjasuttaṃ^eb^ sutvā pabbajitvā imasmiṃ kāle bhikkhubhāvaṃ ākaṅkhamānā parivasanti. ^b^abbhokāse caṅkamatī^eb^ti uttaradakkhiṇena āyatassa pāsādassa puratthimadisābhāge pāsādacchāyāyaṃ yantarajjūhi ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ ratanasatubbedhaṃ suvaṇṇāgghikaṃ viya anilapathe vidhāvantīhi chabbaṇṇāhi buddharasmīhi sobhamāno aparāparaṃ caṅkamati.
