[02] aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. yadi, mahārāja, dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, ``aggo buddho''ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhaveyya, ``jeṭṭho buddho''ti, seṭṭho buddhoti, visiṭṭho buddhoti, uttamo buddhoti, pavaro buddhoti, asamo buddhoti ^a^M3.0087^ea^, asamasamo buddhoti, appaṭimo buddhoti, appaṭibhāgo buddhoti, appaṭipuggalo ^a^P3.0903^ea^ buddhoti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhaveyya. imampi kho tvaṃ, mahārāja, kāraṇaṃ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.

[02] apica kho, mahārāja, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sabhāvapakati esā, yaṃ ekoyeva buddho loke uppajjati. kasmā kāraṇā? mahantatāya sabbaññubuddhaguṇānaṃ, yaṃ aññampi, mahārāja, mahantaṃ hoti, taṃ ekaṃyeva hoti. pathavī, mahārāja, mahantī, sā ekāyeva. sāgaro mahanto, so ekoyeva. sineru girirājā mahanto, so ekoyeva. ākāso mahanto, so ekoyeva. sakko mahanto, so ekoyeva. māro mahanto ^a^V3.0078^ea^, so ekoyeva. mahābrahmā mahanto, so ekoyeva. tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho mahanto, so ekoyeva lokasmiṃ. yattha te uppajjanti, tattha aññesaṃ okāso na hoti. tasmā, mahārāja, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ekoyeva loke uppajjatīti. sukathito, bhante nāgasena, pañho opammehi kāraṇehīti (mi0 pa0 5.1.1).
[03] ^b^dhammassa cānudhamma^eb^nti navavidhassa lokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ. ^b^sahadhammiko^eb^ti sakāraṇo. ^b^vādānuvādo^eb^ti vādoyeva.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyasmā udāyī^eb^ti tayo therā udāyī nāma -- lāḷudāyī, kāḷudāyī, mahāudāyīti. idha mahāudāyī adhippeto. tassa kira imaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā suṇantassa abbhantare pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā pādapiṭṭhito sīsamatthakaṃ gacchati, sīsamatthakato pādapiṭṭhiṃ āgacchati, ubhato paṭṭhāya majjhaṃ otarati, majjhato paṭṭhāya ubhato gacchati. so nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭasarīro balavasomanassena dasabalassa guṇaṃ kathento ^b^acchariyaṃ bhante^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^appicchatā^eb^ti nittaṇhatā. ^b^santuṭṭhitā^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu tīhākārehi ^a^M3.0088^ea^ santoso. ^b^sallekhatā^eb^ti sabbakilesānaṃ sallikhitabhāvo. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo nāma. ^b^na attānaṃ pātukarissatī^eb^ti attano guṇe na āvi karissati. ^b^paṭākaṃ parihareyyu^eb^nti ``ko amhehi sadiso atthī''ti vadantā paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nāḷandaṃ vicareyyuṃ.

[03] ^b^passa^eb^ ^a^P3.0904^ea^ ^b^kho tvaṃ, udāyi, tathāgatassa appicchatā^eb^ti passa udāyi yādisī tathāgatassa appicchatāti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto āha. kiṃ pana bhagavā neva attānaṃ pātukaroti, na attano guṇaṃ kathetīti ce? na, na katheti. appicchatādīhi kathetabbaṃ, cīvarādihetuṃ na katheti. tenevāha -- ``passa kho tvaṃ, udāyi, tathāgatassa appicchatā''tiādi. bujjhanakasattaṃ pana āgamma veneyyavasena katheti. yathāha --
[21] ``na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, natthi me paṭipuggalo''ti.. (mahāva0 11).
[03] evaṃ ^a^V3.0079^ea^ tathāgatassa guṇadīpikā bahū gāthāpi suttantāpi vitthāretabbā.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhikkhaṇaṃ bhāseyyāsī^eb^ti punappunaṃ bhāseyyāsi. pubbaṇhasamaye me kathitanti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha. ajja vā me kathitanti mā paradivasādīsu na kathayitthāti attho. ^b^pavedesī^eb^ti kathesi. ^b^imassa veyyākaraṇassā^eb^ti niggāthakattā idaṃ suttaṃ ``veyyākaraṇa''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^adhivacana^eb^nti nāmaṃ. idaṃ pana ``iti hida''nti paṭṭhāya padaṃ saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] sampasādanīyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0080^ea^ ^a^M3.0089^ea^ ^a^P3.0905^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti pāsādikasuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^vedhaññā nāma sakyā^eb^ti dhanumhi katasikkhā vedhaññanāmakā eke sakyā. ^b^tesaṃ ambavane pāsāde^eb^ti tesaṃ ambavane sippaṃ uggaṇhatthāya kato dīghapāsādo atthi, tattha viharati. ^b^adhunā kālaṅkato^eb^ti sampati kālaṅkato. ^b^dvedhikajātā^eb^ti dvejjhajātā, dvebhāgā jātā. ^b^bhaṇḍanādīsu^eb^ bhaṇḍanaṃ pubbabhāgakalaho, taṃ daṇḍādānādivasena paṇṇattivītikkamavasena ca vaḍḍhitaṃ ^b^kalaho.^eb^ ``na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī''tiādinā nayena viruddhavacanaṃ ^b^vivādo. vitudantā^eb^ti vijjhantā. ^b^sahitaṃ me^eb^ti mama vacanaṃ atthasañhitaṃ. ^b^adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvatta^eb^nti yaṃ tava adhiciṇṇaṃ cirakālāsevanavasena paguṇaṃ, taṃ mama vādaṃ āgamma nivattaṃ. ^b^āropito te vādo^eb^ti tuyhaṃ upari mayā doso āropito. ^b^cara vādappamokkhāyā^eb^ti bhattapuṭaṃ ādāya taṃ taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vādappamokkhatthāya uttari pariyesamāno vicara. ^b^nibbeṭhehi vā^eb^ti atha vā mayā āropitadosato attānaṃ mocehi. ^b^sace pahosī^eb^ti sace sakkosi. ^b^vadhoyevā^eb^ti maraṇameva. ^b^nāṭaputtiyesū^eb^ti nāṭaputtassa antevāsikesu. ^b^nibbinnarūpā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhitasabhāvā abhivādanādīnipi na karonti. ^b^virattarūpā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0906^ea^ vigatapemā. ^b^paṭivānarūpā^eb^ti tesaṃ sakkaccakiriyato nivattanasabhāvā. ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti yathā durakkhātādisabhāve dhammavinaye nibbinnavirattappaṭivānarūpehi bhavitabbaṃ, tatheva jātāti attho. ^b^durakkhāte^eb^ti dukkathite. ^b^duppavedite^eb^ti duviññāpite. ^b^anupasamasaṃvattanike^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ upasamaṃ kātuṃ asamatthe. ^b^bhinnathūpe^eb^ti bhindappatiṭṭhe. ettha hi nāṭaputtova nesaṃ patiṭṭhaṭṭhena thūpo. so pana bhinno mato. tena vuttaṃ ``bhinnathūpe''ti. ^b^appaṭisaraṇe^eb^ti tasseva abhāvena paṭisaraṇavirahite.

[03] nanu cāyaṃ nāṭaputto nāḷandavāsiko, so kasmā pāvāyaṃ kālaṅkatoti? so kira upālinā ^a^V3.0081^ea^ gahapatinā paṭividdhasaccena dasahi ^a^M3.0090^ea^ gāthāhi bhāsite buddhaguṇe sutvā uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ chaḍḍesi. atha naṃ aphāsukaṃ gahetvā pāvaṃ agamaṃsu. so tattha kālamakāsi. kālaṃ kurumāno ca cintesi -- ``mama laddhi aniyyānikā sāravirahitā, mayaṃ tāva naṭṭhā, avasesajanopi mā apāyapūrako ahosi, sace panāhaṃ `mama sāsanaṃ aniyyānika'nti vakkhāmi, na saddahissanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ dvepi jane na ekanīhārena uggaṇhāpeyyaṃ, te mamaccayena aññamaññaṃ vivadissanti, satthā taṃ vivādaṃ paṭicca ekaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathessati, tato te sāsanassa mahantabhāvaṃ jānissantī''ti.

[03] atha naṃ eko antevāsiko upasaṅkamitvā āha -- ``bhante tumhe dubbalā, mayhampi imasmiṃ dhamme sāraṃ ācikkhatha, ācariyappamāṇa''nti. ``āvuso, tvaṃ mamaccayena sassatanti gaṇheyyāsī''ti. aparopi upasaṅkami, taṃ ucchedaṃ gaṇhāpesi. evaṃ dvepi jane ekaladdhike akatvā bahū nānānīhārena uggaṇhāpetvā kālamakāsi. te tassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā sannipatitvā aññamaññaṃ pucchiṃsu -- ``kassāvuso, ācariyo sāraṃ ācikkhī''ti? eko uṭṭhahitvā mayhanti āha. kiṃ ācikkhīti? sassatanti. aparo taṃ paṭibāhitvā ``mayhaṃ sāraṃ ācikkhī''ti āha. evaṃ sabbe ``mayhaṃ sāraṃ ācikkhi, ahaṃ jeṭṭhako''ti aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā akkose ceva paribhāse ca hatthapādappahārādīni ^a^P3.0907^ea^ ca pavattetvā ekamaggena dve agacchantā nānādisāsu pakkamiṃsu.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho cundo samaṇuddeso^eb^ti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko. taṃ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle ``cundo samaṇuddeso''ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṃsu. tena vuttaṃ -- ``cundo samaṇuddeso''ti.

[03] ``pāvāyaṃ vassaṃvuṭṭho yena sāmagāmo, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamī''ti kasmā upasaṅkami? nāṭaputte kira kālaṅkate jambudīpe manussā tattha tattha kathaṃ pavattayiṃsu ``nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto eko satthāti paññāyittha, tassa kālaṅkiriyāya sāvakānaṃ evarūpo vivādo jāto. samaṇo pana gotamo jambudīpe cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo, sāvakāpissa pākaṭāyeva. kīdiso nu kho samaṇe gotame parinibbute sāvakānaṃ vivādo bhavissatī''ti ^a^M3.0091^ea^. thero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā cintesi -- ``imaṃ kathaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa ārocessāmi, satthā etaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā ekaṃ desanaṃ kathessatī''ti. so nikkhamitvā yena sāmagāmo, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami.
[03] ^b^sāmagāmo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0082^ea^ sāmākānaṃ ussannattā tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ. ^b^yenāyasmā ānando^eb^ti ujumeva bhagavato santikaṃ agantvā yenassa upajjhāyo āyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami.

[03] buddhakāle kira sāriputtatthero ca ānandatthero ca aññamaññaṃ mamāyiṃsu. sāriputtatthero ``mayā kātabbaṃ satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ karotī''ti ānandattheraṃ mamāyi. ānandatthero ``bhagavato sāvakānaṃ aggo''ti sāriputtattheraṃ mamāyi. kuladārake ca pabbājetvā sāriputtattherassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpesi. sāriputtattheropi tatheva akāsi. evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ. āyasmā ānando paṇītāni cīvarādīnipi labhitvā therassa adāsi.

[03] eko kira brāhmaṇo cintesi -- ``buddharatanassa ca saṅgharatanassa ca pūjā paññāyati, kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ hotī''ti? so bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ pucchi. bhagavā āha -- ``sacepi brāhmaṇa dhammaratanaṃ pūjetukāmo, ekaṃ ^a^P3.0908^ea^ bahussutaṃ pūjehī''ti. bahussutaṃ, bhante, ācikkhathāti. bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchāti. so bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bahussutaṃ, bhante, ācikkhathā''ti āha. ānandatthero brāhmaṇāti. brāhmaṇo theraṃ sahassagghanikena ticīvarena pūjesi. thero taṃ gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. bhagavā ``kuto, ānanda, laddha''nti āha? ekena, bhante, brāhmaṇena dinnaṃ, idaṃ panāhaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmoti. dehi, ānandāti. cārikaṃ pakkanto bhanteti. āgatakāle dehīti, sikkhāpadaṃ bhante, paññattanti. kadā pana sāriputto āgamissatīti? dasāhamattena bhanteti. ``anujānāmi, ānanda, dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ nikkhipitu''nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi.

[03] sāriputtattheropi ^a^M3.0092^ea^ tatheva yaṃkiñci manāpaṃ labhati, taṃ ānandattherassa deti. so imampi attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ therasseva saddhivihārikaṃ adāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- ``yenassa upajjhāyo āyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamī''ti. evaṃ kirassa ahosi -- ``upajjhāyo me mahāpañño, so imaṃ kathaṃ satthu ārocessati, atha satthā tadanurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desessatī''ti. ^b^kathāpābhata^eb^nti kathāya mūlaṃ. mūlañhi ``pābhata''nti vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``appakenāpi ^a^V3.0083^ea^ medhāvī, pābhatena vicakkhaṇo.
[22] samuṭṭhāpeti attānaṃ, aṇuṃ aggiṃva sandhama''nti.. (jā0 1.1.4).

[03] ^b^bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ dassanatthāya. kiṃ panānena bhagavā na diṭṭhapubboti? no na diṭṭhapubbo. ayañhi āyasmā divā nava vāre, rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati. divasassa pana satavāraṃ vā sahassavāraṃ vā gantukāmo samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati, ekaṃ pañhuddhāraṃ gahetvāva gacchati. so taṃ divasaṃ tena kathāpābhatena gantukāmo evamāha.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ^b^evañhetaṃ, cunda, hotī^eb^ti bhagavā ānandattherena ārocitepi yasmā na ānandatthero imissā kathāya sāmiko, cundatthero pana sāmiko. sova tassā ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānāti. tasmā bhagavā tena saddhiṃ kathento ``evañhetaṃ, cunda, hotī''tiādimāha ^a^P3.0909^ea^. tassattho -- cunda evañhetaṃ hoti durakkhātādisabhāve dhammavinaye sāvakā dvedhikajātā bhaṇḍanādīni katvā mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.

[03] idāni yasmā aniyyānikasāsaneneva niyyānikasāsanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ādito aniyyānikasāsanameva dassento ^b^idha cunda satthā ca hoti asammāsambuddho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vokkamma ca tamhā dhammā vattatī^eb^ti na nirantaraṃ pūreti, okkamitvā okkamitvā antarantaraṃ katvā vattatīti attho. ^b^tassa te, āvuso, lābhā^eb^ti tassa tuyhaṃ ete ^a^M3.0093^ea^ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiādayo lābhā. ^b^suladdha^eb^nti manussattampi te suladdhaṃ. ^b^tathā paṭipajjatū^eb^ti evaṃ paṭipajjatu. ^b^yathā te satthārā dhammo desito^eb^ti yena te ākārena satthārā dhammo kathito. ^b^yo ca samādapetī^eb^ti yo ca ācariyo samādapeti. ^b^yañca samādapetī^eb^ti yaṃ antevāsiṃ samādapeti. ^b^yo ca samādapito^eb^ti yo ca evaṃ samādapito antevāsiko. yathā ācariyena samādapitaṃ, tathatthāya paṭipajjati. ^b^sabbe te^eb^ti tayopi te. ettha hi ācariyo samādapitattā apuññaṃ pasavati, samādinnantevāsiko samādinnattā, paṭipannako paṭipannattā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sabbe te bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavantī''ti. etenupāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ apicettha ^a^V3.0084^ea^ ^b^ñāyappaṭipanno^eb^ti kāraṇappaṭipanno. ^b^ñāyamārādhessatī^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ nipphādessati. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti attano dukkhanibbattakaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti. vuttañhetaṃ ``durakkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo āraddhavīriyo, so dukkhaṃ viharati. yo kusīto, so sukhaṃ viharatī''ti (a0 ni0 1.318).

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ evaṃ aniyyānikasāsanaṃ dassetvā idāni niyyānikasāsanaṃ dassento ^b^idha pana, cunda, satthā ca hoti sammāsambuddho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^niyyāniko^eb^ti maggatthāya phalatthāya ca niyyāti.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti attano sukhanipphādakaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhati. vuttañhetaṃ ``svākkhāte, bhikkhave, dhammavinaye yo kusīto, so dukkhaṃ viharati. yo āraddhavīriyo, so sukhaṃ viharatī''ti (a0 ni0 1.319).

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ iti bhagavā niyyānikasāsane sammāpaṭipannassa ^a^P3.0910^ea^ kulaputtassa pasaṃsaṃ dassetvā puna desanaṃ vaḍḍhento ^b^idha, cunda, satthā ca loke udapādī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^aviññāpitatthā^eb^ti abodhitatthā. ^b^sabbasaṅgāhapadakata^eb^nti sabbasaṅgahapadehi kataṃ, sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ kataṃ na hotīti attho. ``sabbasaṅgāhapadagata''ntipi pāṭho, na sabbasaṅgāhapadesu gataṃ, na ekasaṅgahajātanti attho. ^b^sappāṭihīrakata^eb^nti niyyānikaṃ. ^b^yāva^eb^ ^a^M3.0094^ea^ ^b^devamanussehī^eb^ti devalokato yāva manussalokā suppakāsitaṃ. ^b^anutappo hotī^eb^ti anutāpakaro hoti. ^b^satthā ca no loke^eb^ti idaṃ tesaṃ anutāpakāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^nānutappo hotī^eb^ti satthāraṃ āgamma sāvakehi yaṃ pattabbaṃ, tassa pattattā anutāpakaro na hoti.
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ^b^thero^eb^ti thiro therakārakehi dhammehi samannāgato. ``rattaññū''tiādīni vuttatthāneva. ^b^etehi ce pī^eb^ti etehi heṭṭhā vuttehi.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ^b^pattayogakkhemā^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemattā arahattaṃ idha yogakkhemaṃ nāma, taṃ pattāti attho. ^b^alaṃ samakkhātuṃ saddhammassā^eb^ti sammukhā gahitattā assa saddhammaṃ sammā ācikkhituṃ samatthā.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ^b^brahmacārino^eb^ti ^a^V3.0085^ea^ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasamānā ariyasāvakā. ^b^kāmabhogino^eb^ti gihisotāpannā. ``iddhañcevā''tiādīni mahāparinibbāne vitthāritāneva. ^b^lābhaggayasaggapatta^eb^nti lābhaggañceva yasaggañca pattaṃ.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ^b^santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi therā bhikkhū sāvakā^eb^ti sāriputtamoggallānādayo therā. ^b^bhikkhuniyo^eb^ti khemātherīuppalavaṇṇatherīādayo. ^b^upāsakā sāvakā gihī odātavatthavasanā brahmacārino^eb^ti cittagahapatihatthakāaḷavakādayo. ^b^kāmabhogino^eb^ti cūḷānāthapiṇḍikamahāanāthapiṇḍikādayo. ^b^brahmacāriniyo^eb^ti nandamātādayo. ^b^kāmabhoginiyo^eb^ti khujjuttarādayo.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbākārasampanna^eb^nti sabbakāraṇasampannaṃ. ^b^idameva^eb^ ^a^P3.0911^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti idameva brahmacariyaṃ, imameva dhammaṃ sammā hetunā nayena vadamāno vadeyya. ^b^udakāssuda^eb^nti ^b^udako sudaṃ. passaṃ na passatī^eb^ti passanto na passati. so kira imaṃ pañhaṃ mahājanaṃ pucchi. tehi ``na jānāma, ācariya, kathehi no''ti vutto so āha -- ``gambhīro ayaṃ pañho āhārasappāye sati thokaṃ cintetvā sakkā kathetu''nti. tato tehi cattāro māse ^a^M3.0095^ea^ mahāsakkāre kate taṃ pañhaṃ kathento ^b^kiñca passaṃ na passatī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sādhunisitassā^eb^ti suṭṭhunisitassa tikhiṇassa, sunisitakhurassa kira talaṃ paññāyati, dhārā na paññāyatīti ayamettha attho.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅgamma samāgammā^eb^ti saṅgantvā samāgantvā. ^b^atthena atthaṃ, byañjanena byañjana^eb^nti atthena saha atthaṃ, byañjanenapi saha byañjanaṃ samānentehīti attho. ^b^saṅgāyitabba^eb^nti vācetabbaṃ sajjhāyitabbaṃ. ^b^yathayidaṃ brahmacariya^eb^nti yathā idaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatra ce^eb^ti tatra saṅghamajjhe, tassa vā bhāsite. ^b^atthañceva micchā gaṇhāti, byañjanāni ca micchā ropetī^eb^ti ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''ti ettha ārammaṇaṃ ``satipaṭṭhāna''nti atthaṃ gaṇhāti. ``satipaṭṭhānānī''ti byañjanaṃ ropeti. ^b^imassa nu kho, āvuso, atthassā^eb^ti ``satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna''nti. atthassa ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''ti kiṃ nu kho imāni byañjanāni, udāhu cattāri satipaṭṭhānānī''ti etāni vā byañjanāni. ^b^katamāni opāyikatarānī^eb^ti imassa atthassa katamāni byañjanāni upapannatarāni allīnatarāni. ^b^imesañca^eb^ ^a^V3.0086^ea^ ^b^byañjanāna^eb^nti ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''ti byañjanānaṃ ``satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna''nti kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ attho, udāhu ``ārammaṇaṃ satipaṭṭhāna''nti eso atthoti? ^b^imassa kho, āvuso, atthassā^eb^ti ``ārammaṇaṃ satipaṭṭhāna''nti imassa atthassa. ^b^yā ceva etānī^eb^ti yāni ceva etāni mayā vuttāni. ^b^yā ceva eso^eb^ti yo ceva esa mayā vutto. ^b^so neva ussādetabbo^eb^ti tumhehi tāva sammā atthe ca sammā byañjane ^a^P3.0912^ea^ ca ṭhātabbaṃ. so pana neva ussādetabbo, na apasādetabbo. ^b^saññāpetabbo^eb^ti jānāpetabbo. ^b^tassa ca atthassā^eb^ti ``satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna''nti atthassa ca. ^b^tesañca byañjanāna^eb^nti ``satipaṭṭhānā''ti byañjanānaṃ. ^b^nisantiyā^eb^ti nisāmanatthaṃ dhāraṇatthaṃ. iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ^b^tādisa^eb^nti tumhādisaṃ. ^b^atthupeta^eb^nti atthena upetaṃ atthassa viññātāraṃ. ^b^byañjanupeta^eb^nti byañjanehi upetaṃ byañjanānaṃ viññātāraṃ. evaṃ etaṃ bhikkhuṃ ^a^M3.0096^ea^ pasaṃsatha. eso hi bhikkhu na tumhākaṃ sāvako nāma, buddho nāma esa cundāti. iti bhagavā bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapesi.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ idāni tatopi uttaritaraṃ desanaṃ vaḍḍhento ^b^na vo ahaṃ, cundā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā nāma idhaloke paccayahetu uppajjanakā āsavā. samparāyikā āsavā nāma paraloke bhaṇḍanahetu uppajjanakā āsavā. ^b^saṃvarāyā^eb^ti yathā te na pavisanti, evaṃ pidahanāya. ^b^paṭighātāyā^eb^ti mūlaghātena paṭihananāya. ^b^alaṃ vo taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā^eb^ti taṃ tumhākaṃ sītassa paṭighātāya samatthaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, yaṃ vo mayā cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ pārupitvā dappaṃ vā mānaṃ vā kurumānā viharissathāti na anuññātaṃ, taṃ pana pārupitvā sītappaṭighātādīni katvā sukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ yoniso manasikāraṃ karissathāti anuññātaṃ. yathā ca cīvaraṃ, evaṃ piṇḍapātādayopi. anupadasaṃvaṇṇanā panettha visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukhallikānuyoga^eb^nti sukhalliyanānuyogaṃ, sukhasevanādhimuttanti attho. ^b^sukhetī^eb^ti sukhitaṃ karoti. ^b^pīṇetī^eb^ti pīṇitaṃ thūlaṃ karoti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ^b^aṭṭhitadhammā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0087^ea^ naṭṭhitasabhāvā. jivhā no atthīti yaṃ yaṃ icchanti, taṃ taṃ kathenti, kadāci maggaṃ kathenti, kadāci phalaṃ kadāci nibbānanti adhippāyo. ^b^jānatā^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānantena. ^b^passatā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi passantena. ^b^gambhīranemo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0913^ea^ gambhīrabhūmiṃ anupaviṭṭho. ^b^sunikhāto^eb^ti suṭṭhu nikhāto. ^b^evameva kho, āvuso^eb^ti evaṃ khīṇāsavo abhabbo nava ṭhānāni ajjhācarituṃ. tasmiṃ anajjhācāro acalo asampavedhī. tattha sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropanādīsu sotāpannādayopi abhabbā. ^b^sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitu^eb^nti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ^a^M3.0097^ea^ ca sannidhiṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ. ^b^seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto^eb^ti yathā pubbe gihibhūto paribhuñjati, evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ abhabbo.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ agāramajjhe vasantā hi sotāpannādayo yāvajīvaṃ gihibyañjanena tiṭṭhanti. khīṇāsavo pana arahattaṃ patvāva manussabhūto parinibbāti vā pabbajati vā. cātumahārājikādīsu kāmāvacaradevesu muhuttampi na tiṭṭhati. kasmā? vivekaṭṭhānassa abhāvā. bhummadevattabhāve pana ṭhito arahattaṃ patvāpi tiṭṭhati. tassa vasena ayaṃ pañho āgato. bhinnadosattā panassa bhikkhubhāvo veditabbo. ^b^atīraka^eb^nti atīraṃ aparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ. ^b^no ca kho anāgata^eb^nti anāgataṃ pana addhānaṃ ārabbha evaṃ na paññapeti, atītameva maññe samaṇo gotamo jānāti, na anāgataṃ. tathā hissa atīte aḍḍhachaṭṭhasatajātakānussaraṇaṃ paññāyati. anāgate evaṃ bahuṃ anussaraṇaṃ na paññāyatīti imamatthaṃ maññamānā evaṃ vadeyyuṃ. ^b^tayidaṃ kiṃ sū^eb^ti anāgate apaññāpanaṃ kiṃ nu kho? ^b^kathaṃsū^eb^ti kena nu kho kāraṇena ajānantoyeva nu kho anāgataṃ nānussarati, ananussaritukāmatāya nānussaratīti. ^b^aññavihitakena ñāṇadassanenā^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ viya katvā dassanasamatthatāya dassanabhūtena ñāṇena aññatthavihitakena ñāṇena aññaṃ ārabbha pavattena, aññavihitakaṃ aññaṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ saṅgāhetabbaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ maññanti. te hi carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ maññanti, tādisañca ñāṇaṃ nāma natthi. tasmā yathariva bālā abyattā, evaṃ maññantīti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^satānusārī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0914^ea^ pubbenivāsānussatisampayuttakaṃ. ^b^yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhatī^eb^ti yattakaṃ ñātuṃ icchati, tattakaṃ jānissāmīti ñāṇaṃ pesesi. athassa dubbalapattapuṭe pakkhandanārāco viya appaṭihataṃ ^a^V3.0088^ea^ anivāritaṃ ñāṇaṃ gacchati, tena yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhati tāvatakaṃ anussarati. ^b^bodhija^eb^nti bodhimūle jātaṃ. ^b^ñāṇaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti catumaggañāṇaṃ uppajjati. ^b^ayamantimā jātī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0098^ea^ tena ñāṇena jātimūlassa pahīnattā puna ayamantimā jāti. ^b^natthidāni punabbhavo^eb^ti aparampi ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. ^b^anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti na idhalokatthaṃ vā paralokatthaṃ vā nissitaṃ. ^b^na taṃ tathāgato byākarotī^eb^ti taṃ bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇasadisaṃ aniyyānikakathaṃ tathāgato na katheti. ^b^bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti rājakathāditiracchānakathaṃ. ^b^kālaññū tathāgato hotī^eb^ti kālaṃ jānāti. sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā yuttapattakāleyeva katheti.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī^eb^ti yathā yathā gaditabbaṃ, tathā tatheva gadanato dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti attho. ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti rūpāyatanaṃ. ^b^suta^eb^nti saddāyatanaṃ. ^b^muta^eb^nti mutvā patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. ^b^viññāta^eb^nti sukhadukkhādidhammāyatanaṃ. ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ vā apattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. ^b^anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti cittena anusañcaritaṃ. ``tathāgatena abhisambuddha''nti iminā etaṃ dasseti, yañhi aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa nīlaṃ pītakantiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ ^a^P3.0915^ea^. tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthamāgacchati. mūlagandho tacagandhotiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthamāgacchati. mūlaraso khandharasotiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthamāgacchati. kakkhaḷaṃ mudukantiādi pathavīdhātutejodhātuvāyodhātubhedaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre āpāthamāgacchati. ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhadukkhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvārassa āpāthamāgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe idaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.

[03] yañhi ^a^M3.0099^ea^, cunda, imesaṃ sattānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ tattha tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi. imassa mahājanassa pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, pariyesitvā appattampi atthi. apariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā appattampi ^a^V3.0089^ea^ atthi. sabbampi taṃ tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi, ñāṇena asacchikataṃ nāma. ``tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī''ti. yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ tassa tatheva gatattā ``tathāgato''ti vuccati. pāḷiyaṃ pana abhisambuddhanti vuttaṃ, taṃ gatasaddena ekatthaṃ. iminā nayena sabbavāresu ``tathāgato''ti nigamanassa attho veditabbo, tassa yutti ^b^brahmajāle^eb^ tathāgatasaddavitthāre vuttāyeva.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ evaṃ attano asamataṃ anuttarataṃ sabbaññutaṃ dhammarājabhāvaṃ kathetvā idāni ``puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhīsu mayā aññātaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ mama ñāṇassa antoyeva parivattatī''ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto ^b^ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, cunda, vijjatī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti satto. ^b^na hetaṃ, āvuso, atthasaṃhita^eb^nti idhalokaparalokātthasaṃhitaṃ na hoti. ^b^na ca dhammasaṃhita^eb^nti navalokuttaradhammanissitaṃ na hoti. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0916^ea^ ^b^ādibrahmacariyaka^eb^nti sikkhattayasaṅgahitassa sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtaṃ na hoti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ^b^idaṃ dukkhanti kho^eb^tiādīsu taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā tebhummakā dhammā idaṃ dukkhanti byākataṃ. tasseva dukkhassa pabhāvikā janikā taṇhā ^b^dukkhasamudayo^eb^ti byākataṃ. ubhinnaṃ appavatti ^b^dukkhanirodho^eb^ti byākataṃ. dukkhaparijānano samudayapajahano nirodhasacchikaraṇo ariyamaggo ^b^dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā^eb^ti byākataṃ. ``etañhi, āvuso, atthasaṃhita''ntiādīsu etaṃ idhalokaparalokātthanissitaṃ navalokuttaradhammanissitaṃ sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ādi padhānaṃ pubbaṅgamanti ayamattho.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ idāni yaṃ taṃ mayā na byākataṃ, taṃ ajānantena na byākatanti mā evaṃ saññamakaṃsu. jānantova ahaṃ evaṃ ``etasmiṃ byākatepi attho natthī''ti ^a^M3.0100^ea^ na byākariṃ. yaṃ pana yathā byākātabbaṃ, taṃ mayā byākatamevāti sīhanādaṃ nadanto puna ^b^yepi te, cundā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha diṭṭhiyova ^b^diṭṭhinissayā,^eb^ diṭṭhinissitakā diṭṭhigatikāti attho. ^b^idameva sacca^eb^nti idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ. ^b^moghamañña^eb^nti aññesaṃ vacanaṃ moghaṃ. ^b^asayaṃkāro^eb^ti asayaṃ kato.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0090^ea^ tesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu. ^b^atthi nu kho idaṃ āvuso vuccatī^eb^ti, āvuso, yaṃ tumhehi sassato attā ca loko cāti vuccati, idamatthi nu kho udāhu natthīti evamahaṃ te pucchāmīti attho. ^b^yañca kho te evamāhaṃsū^eb^ti yaṃ pana te ``idameva saccaṃ moghamañña''nti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ nānujānāmi. ^b^paññattiyā^eb^ti diṭṭhipaññattiyā. ^b^samasama^eb^nti samena ñāṇena samaṃ. ^b^yadidaṃ adhipaññattī^eb^ti yā ayaṃ adhipaññatti nāma. ettha ahameva bhiyyo uttaritaro na mayā samo atthi. tattha yañca vuttaṃ ``paññattiyāti yañca adhipaññattī''ti ubhayametaṃ atthato ekaṃ. bhedato hi paññatti adhipaññattīti dvayaṃ hoti. tattha paññatti nāma diṭṭhipaññatti. adhipaññatti nāma khandhapaññatti dhātupaññatti āyatanapaññatti indriyapaññatti saccapaññatti puggalapaññattīti evaṃ vuttā cha paññattiyo. idha pana paññattiyāti etthāpi ^a^P3.0917^ea^ paññatti ceva adhipaññatti ca adhippetā, adhipaññattīti etthāpi. bhagavā hi paññattiyāpi anuttaro, adhipaññattiyāpi anuttaro. tenāha -- ``ahameva tattha bhiyyo yadidaṃ adhipaññattī''ti.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ^b^pahānāyā^eb^ti pajahanatthaṃ. ^b^samatikkamāyā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^desitā^eb^ti kathitā. ^b^paññattā^eb^ti ṭhapitā. satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya hi ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā sabbadhammesu yāthāvato diṭṭhesu ``suddhasaṅkhārapuñjoyaṃ nayidha sattūpalabbhatī''ti sanniṭṭhānato sabbadiṭṭhinissayānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti. tena vuttaṃ. diṭṭhinissayānaṃ pahānāya samatikkamāya evaṃ mayā ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā desitā paññattā''ti. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] pāsādikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0091^ea^ ^a^M3.0101^ea^ ^a^P3.0918^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti lakkhaṇasuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā. ^b^dvattiṃsimānī^eb^ti dvattiṃsa imāni. ^b^mahāpurisalakkhaṇānī^eb^ti mahāpurisabyañjanāni mahāpurisanimittāni ``ayaṃ mahāpuriso''ti sañjānanakāraṇāni. ``yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassā''tiādi mahāpadāne vitthāritanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ``bāhirakāpi isayo dhārenti, no ca kho jānanti `imassa kammassa katattā imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ paṭilabhatī'ti'' kasmā āha? aṭṭhuppattiyā anurūpattā. idañhi suttaṃ sāṭṭhuppattikaṃ. sā panassa aṭṭhuppatti kattha samuṭṭhitā? antogāme manussānaṃ antare. tadā kira sāvatthivāsino attano attano gehesu ca gehadvāresu ca santhāgārādīsu ca nisīditvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ -- ``bhagavato asītianubyañjanāni byāmappabhā dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, yehi ca bhagavato kāyo, sabbaphāliphullo viya pāricchattako, vikasitamiva kamalavanaṃ, nānāratanavicittaṃ viya suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ, tārāmaricivirocamiva gaganatalaṃ, ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vipphandamānā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo muñcanto ativiya sobhati. bhagavato ca iminā nāma kammena idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattanti kathitaṃ natthi, yāgūḷuṅkamattampi pana kaṭacchubhattamattaṃ vā pubbe dinnapaccayā evaṃ uppajjatīti bhagavatā vuttaṃ. kiṃ nu kho satthā kammaṃ akāsi, yenassa imāni lakkhaṇāni nibbattantī''ti.

[03] athāyasmā ānando antogāme caranto imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā katabhattakicco vihāraṃ āgantvā satthu vattaṃ katvā vanditvā ṭhito ``mayā, bhante, antogāme ekā kathā sutā''ti āha. tato ^a^P3.0919^ea^ bhagavatā ``kiṃ te, ānanda, suta''nti vutte sabbaṃ ārocesi. satthā therassa vacanaṃ ^a^V3.0092^ea^ sutvā parivāretvā nisinne bhikkhū āmantetvā ``dvattiṃsimāni, bhikkhave, mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇānī''ti paṭipāṭiyā lakkhaṇāni dassetvā yena kammena yaṃ nibbattaṃ, tassa dassanatthaṃ evamāha.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^purimaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0102^ea^ ^b^jāti^eb^ntiādīsu pubbe nivutthakkhandhā jātavasena ``jātī''ti vuttā. tathā bhavanavasena ``bhavo''ti, nivutthavasena ālayaṭṭhena vā ``niketo''ti. tiṇṇampi padānaṃ pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantāne ṭhitoti attho. idāni yasmā taṃ khandhasantānaṃ devalokādīsupi vattati. lakkhaṇanibbattanasamatthaṃ pana kusalakammaṃ tattha na sukaraṃ, manussabhūtasseva sukaraṃ. tasmā yathābhūtena yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^pubbe manussabhūto samāno^eb^ti āha. akāraṇaṃ vā etaṃ. hatthiassamigamahiṃsavānarādibhūtopi mahāpuriso pāramiyo pūretiyeva. yasmā pana evarūpe attabhāve ṭhitena katakammaṃ na sakkā sukhena dīpetuṃ, manussabhāve ṭhitena katakammaṃ pana sakkā sukhena dīpetuṃ. tasmā ``pubbe manussabhūto samāno''ti āha.

[03] ^b^daḷhasamādāno^eb^ti thiragahaṇo. ^b^kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathesu. ^b^avatthitasamādāno^eb^ti niccalagahaṇo anivattitagahaṇo. mahāsattassa hi akusalakammato aggiṃ patvā kukkuṭapattaṃ viya cittaṃ paṭikuṭati, kusalaṃ patvā vitānaṃ viya pasāriyati. tasmā daḷhasamādāno hoti avatthitasamādāno. na sakkā kenaci samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kusalasamādānaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.

[03] tatrimāni vatthūni -- pubbe kira mahāpuriso kalandakayoniyaṃ nibbatti. atha deve vuṭṭhe ogho āgantvā kulāvakaṃ gahetvā samuddameva pavesesi. mahāpuriso ``puttake nīharissāmī''ti naṅguṭṭhaṃ temetvā temetvā samuddato udakaṃ bahi khipi. sattame divase sakko āvajjitvā tattha āgamma ``kiṃ karosī''ti pucchi? so tassa ārocesi. sakko mahāsamuddato udakassa dunnīharaṇīyabhāvaṃ kathesi. bodhisatto ^a^P3.0920^ea^ tādisena kusītena saddhiṃ kathetumpi na vaṭṭati. ``mā idha tiṭṭhā''ti apasāresi. sakko ``anomapurisena gahitagahaṇaṃ na sakkā vissajjāpetu''nti tuṭṭho tassa puttake ānetvā adāsi. mahājanakakālepi mahāsamuddaṃ taramāno ``kasmā mahāsamuddaṃ tarasī''ti devatāya puṭṭho ``pāraṃ gantvā kulasantake raṭṭhe rajjaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ dātuṃ tarāmī''ti āha. tato devatāya -- ``ayaṃ mahāsamuddo gambhīro ^a^V3.0093^ea^ ^a^M3.0103^ea^ ceva puthulo ca, kadā naṃ tarissatī''ti vutte so āha ``taveso mahāsamuddasadiso, mayhaṃ pana ajjhāsayaṃ āgamma khuddakamātikā viya khāyati. tvaṃyeva maṃ dakkhissasi samuddaṃ taritvā samuddapārato dhanaṃ āharitvā kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ dadamāna''nti. devatā ``anomapurisena gahitagahaṇaṃ na sakkā vissajjāpetu''nti bodhisattaṃ āliṅgetvā haritvā uyyāne nipajjāpesi. so chattaṃ ussāpetvā divase divase pañcasatasahassapariccāgaṃ katvā aparabhāge nikkhamma pabbajito. evaṃ mahāsatto na sakkā kenaci samaṇena vā...pe0... brahmunā vā kusalasamādānaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ``daḷhasamādāno ahosi kusalesu dhammesu avatthitasamādāno''ti.

[01] idāni yesu kusalesu dhammesu avatthitasamādāno ahosi, te dassetuṃ ^b^kāyasucarite^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^dānasaṃvibhāge^eb^ti ettha ca dānameva diyyanavasena dānaṃ, saṃvibhāgakaraṇavasena saṃvibhāgo. ^b^sīlasamādāne^eb^ti pañcasīladasasīlacatupārisuddhisīlapūraṇakāle. ^b^uposathūpavāse^eb^ti cātuddasikādibhedassa uposathassa upavasanakāle. ^b^matteyyatāyā^eb^ti mātukātabbavatte. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^aññataraññataresu cā^eb^ti aññesu ca evarūpesu. ^b^adhikusalesū^eb^ti ettha atthi kusalā, atthi adhikusalā. sabbepi kāmāvacarā kusalā kusalā nāma, rūpāvacarā adhikusalā. ubhopi te kusalā nāma, arūpāvacarā adhikusalā. sabbepi te kusalā ^a^P3.0921^ea^ nāma, sāvakapāramīpaṭilābhapaccayā kusalā adhikusalā nāma. tepi kusalā nāma, paccekabodhipaṭilābhapaccayā kusalā adhikusalā. tepi kusalā nāma, sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhapaccayā pana kusalā idha ``adhikusalā''ti adhippetā. tesu adhikusalesu dhammesu daḷhasamādāno ahosi avatthitasamādāno.

[03] ^b^kaṭattā upacitattā^eb^ti ettha sakimpi kataṃ katameva, abhiṇhakaraṇena pana upacitaṃ hoti. ^b^ussannattā^eb^ti piṇḍīkataṃ rāsīkataṃ kammaṃ ussannanti vuccati. tasmā ``ussannattā''ti vadanto mayā katakammassa cakkavāḷaṃ atisambādhaṃ, bhavaggaṃ atinīcaṃ, evaṃ me ussannaṃ kammanti dasseti. ^b^vipulattā^eb^ti appamāṇattā. iminā ``anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mayā kataṃ kamma''nti dasseti. ^b^adhiggaṇhātī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0104^ea^ adhibhavati, aññehi devehi atirekaṃ labhatīti attho. ^b^paṭilabhatī^eb^ti adhigacchati.

[03] ^b^sabbāvantehi pādatalehī^eb^ti idaṃ ``samaṃ pādaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipatī''ti etassa vitthāravacanaṃ. tattha sabbāvantehīti sabbapadesavantehi, na ekena padesena paṭhamaṃ phusati, na ekena ^a^V3.0094^ea^ pacchā, sabbeheva pādatalehi samaṃ phusati, samaṃ uddharati. sacepi hi tathāgato ``anekasataporisaṃ narakaṃ akkamissāmī''ti pādaṃ abhinīharati. tāvadeva ninnaṭṭhānaṃ vātapūritā viya kammārabhastā unnamitvā pathavisamaṃ hoti. unnataṭṭhānampi anto pavisati. ``dūre akkamissāmī''ti abhinīharantassa sineruppamāṇopi pabbato suseditavettaṅkuro viya onamitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgacchati. tathā hissa yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā ``yugandharapabbataṃ akkamissāmī''ti pāde abhinīhaṭe pabbato onamitvā pādasamīpaṃ āgato. sopi taṃ akkamitvā dutiyapādena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ akkami. na hi cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ visamaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti. khāṇu vā kaṇṭako vā sakkharā vā kathalā vā uccārapassāvakheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni vā purimataraṃ vā apagacchanti, tattha tattheva vā pathaviṃ pavisanti. tathāgatassa hi sīlatejena puññatejena dhammatejena dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ ^a^P3.0922^ea^ ānubhāvena ayaṃ mahāpathavī sammā mudupupphābhikiṇṇā hoti.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāgarapariyanta^eb^nti sāgarasīmaṃ. na hi tassa rajjaṃ karontassa antarā rukkho vā pabbato vā nadī vā sīmā hoti mahāsamuddova sīmā. tena vuttaṃ ``sāgarapariyanta''nti. ^b^akhilamanimittamakaṇṭaka^eb^nti niccoraṃ. corā hi kharasamphassaṭṭhena khilā, upaddavapaccayaṭṭhena nimittā, vijjhanaṭṭhena kaṇṭakāti vuccanti. ^b^iddha^eb^nti samiddhaṃ. ^b^phīta^eb^nti sabbasampattiphāliphullaṃ. ^b^khema^eb^nti nibbhayaṃ. ^b^siva^eb^nti nirupaddavaṃ. ^b^nirabbuda^eb^nti abbudavirahitaṃ, gumbaṃ gumbaṃ hutvā carantehi corehi virahitanti attho. ^b^akkhambhiyo^eb^ti avikkhambhanīyo. na naṃ koci ṭhānato cāletuṃ sakkoti. ^b^paccatthikenā^eb^ti paṭipakkhaṃ icchantena. ^b^paccāmittenā^eb^ti paṭiviruddhena amittena. ubhayampetaṃ sapattavevacanaṃ. ^b^abbhantarehī^eb^ti anto uṭṭhitehi rāgādīhi.

[03] ^b^bāhirehī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0105^ea^ samaṇādīhi. tathā hi naṃ bāhirā devadattakokālikādayo samaṇāpi soṇadaṇḍakūṭadaṇḍādayo brāhmaṇāpi sakkasadisā devatāpi satta vassāni anubandhamāno māropi bakādayo brahmānopi vikkhambhetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.

[03] ettāvatā bhagavatā kammañca kammasarikkhakañca lakkhaṇañca lakkhaṇānisaṃso ca vutto hoti. ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni daḷhavīriyena hutvā kataṃ kammaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma daḷhena hutvā katabhāvaṃ sadevako loko jānātūti suppatiṭṭhitapādamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma suppatiṭṭhitapādatā. ^b^lakkhaṇānisaṃso^eb^ nāma paccatthikehi avikkhambhanīyatā.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthetaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0095^ea^ ^b^vuccatī^eb^ti tattha vutte kammādibhede aparampi idaṃ vuccati, gāthābandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. etā pana gāthā porāṇakattherā ``ānandattherena ṭhapitā vaṇṇanāgāthā''ti vatvā gatā. aparabhāge therā ``ekapadiko atthuddhāro''ti āhaṃsu.

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0923^ea^ ^b^sacce^eb^ti vacīsacce. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhamme. ^b^dame^eb^ti indriyadamane. ^b^saṃyame^eb^ti sīlasaṃyame. ^b^``soceyyasīlālayuposathesu cā''^eb^ti ettha kāyasoceyyādi tividhaṃ ^b^soceyyaṃ.^eb^ ālayabhūtaṃ sīlameva ^b^sīlālayo.^eb^ uposathakammaṃ ^b^uposatho. ahiṃsāyā^eb^ti avihiṃsāya. ^b^samattamācarī^eb^ti sakalaṃ acari.
[03] ^b^anvabhī^eb^ti anubhavi. ^b^veyyañjanikā^eb^ti lakkhaṇapāṭhakā. ^b^parābhibhū^eb^ti pare abhibhavanasamattho. ^b^sattubhī^eb^ti sapattehi akkhambhiyo hoti.
[03] ^b^na so gacchati jātu khambhana^eb^nti so ekaṃseneva aggapuggalo vikkhambhetabbataṃ na gacchati. ^b^esā hi tassa dhammatā^eb^ti tassa hi esā dhammatā ayaṃ sabhāvo.

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubbegauttāsabhaya^eb^nti ubbegabhayañceva uttāsabhayañca. tattha corato vā rājato vā paccatthikato vā vilopanabandhanādinissayaṃ bhayaṃ ^b^ubbego^eb^ nāma, taṃmuhuttikaṃ caṇḍahatthiassādīni vā ahiyakkhādayo vā paṭicca lomahaṃsanakaraṃ bhayaṃ ^b^uttāsabhayaṃ^eb^ nāma. taṃ sabbaṃ apanuditā ^a^M3.0106^ea^ vūpasametā. ^b^saṃvidhātā^eb^ti saṃvidahitā. kathaṃ saṃvidahati? aṭaviyaṃ sāsaṅkaṭṭhānesu dānasālaṃ kāretvā tattha āgate bhojetvā manusse datvā ativāheti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavisituṃ asakkontānaṃ manusse pesetvā paveseti. nagarādīsupi tesu tesu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapeti, evaṃ saṃvidahati. ^b^saparivārañca dānaṃ adāsī^eb^ti annaṃ pānanti dasavidhaṃ dānavatthuṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^anna^eb^nti yāgubhattaṃ. taṃ dadanto na dvāre ṭhapetvā adāsi, atha kho antonivesane haritupalittaṭṭhāne lājā ceva pupphāni ca vikiritvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadhūmādīhi sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ adāsi. yāguṃ dento ca sabyañjanaṃ adāsi. yāgupānāvasāne pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā nānappakārakaṃ anantaṃ khajjakaṃ datvā pariyosāne anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ adāsi ^a^P3.0924^ea^. pānaṃ dento ambapānādiaṭṭhavidhaṃ ^a^V3.0096^ea^ pānaṃ adāsi, tampi yāgubhattaṃ datvā. vatthaṃ dento na suddhavatthameva adāsi, ekapaṭṭadupaṭṭādipahonakaṃ pana datvā sucimpi adāsi, suttampi adāsi, suttaṃ vaṭṭesi, sūcikammakaraṇaṭṭhāne bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni, yāgubhattaṃ, pādamakkhanaṃ, piṭṭhimakkhanaṃ, rajanaṃ, paṇḍupalāsaṃ, rajanadoṇikaṃ, antamaso cīvararajanakaṃ kappiyakārakampi adāsi.

[03] ^b^yāna^eb^nti upāhanaṃ. taṃ dadantopi upāhanatthavikaṃ upāhanadaṇḍakaṃ makkhanatelaṃ heṭṭhā vuttāni ca annādīni tasseva parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^mālaṃ^eb^ dentopi na suddhamālameva adāsi, atha kho naṃ gandhehi missetvā heṭṭhimāni cattāri tasseva parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. bodhicetiyāasanapotthakādipūjanatthāya ceva cetiyagharadhūpanatthāya ca ^b^gandhaṃ^eb^ dentopi na suddhagandhameva adāsi, gandhapisanakanisadāya ceva pakkhipanakabhājanena ca saddhiṃ heṭṭhimāni pañca tassa parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. cetiyapūjādīnaṃ atthāya haritālamanosilācīnapiṭṭhādi^b^vilepanaṃ^eb^ dentopi na suddhavilepanameva adāsi, vilepanabhājanena saddhiṃ heṭṭhimāni cha tassa parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^seyyā^eb^ti mañcapīṭhaṃ. taṃ dentopi na suddhakameva adāsi, kojavakambalapaccattharaṇamañcappaṭipādakehi saddhiṃ antamaso maṅgulasodhanadaṇḍakaṃ heṭṭhimāni ca satta tassa parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^āvasathaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0107^ea^ dentopi na gehamattameva adāsi, atha kho naṃ mālākammalatākammapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ kāretvā heṭṭhimāni aṭṭha tassa parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^padīpeyya^eb^nti padīpatelaṃ. taṃ dento cetiyaṅgaṇe bodhiyaṅgaṇe dhammassavanagge vasanagehe potthakavācanaṭṭhāne iminā dīpaṃ jālāpethāti na suddhatelameva adāsi, vaṭṭi kapallakatelabhājanādīhi saddhiṃ heṭṭhimāni nava tassa parivāraṃ katvā adāsi. ^b^suvibhattantarānī^eb^ti suvibhattāntarāni.

[03] ^b^rājāno^eb^ti abhisittā. ^b^bhogiyā^eb^ti bhojakā ^b^kumārā^eb^ti rājakumārā. idha ^a^P3.0925^ea^ ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma saparivāraṃ dānaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma saparivāraṃ katvā dānaṃ adāsīti iminā kāraṇena sadevako loko jānātūti nibbattaṃ cakkalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma tadeva cakkalakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^ānisaṃso^eb^ mahāparivāratā.

[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthetaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti imā tadatthaparidīpanā gāthā vuccanti. duvidhā hi gāthā honti -- tadatthaparidīpanā ca visesatthaparidīpanā ca. tattha pāḷiāgatameva atthaṃ paridīpanā ^b^tadatthaparidīpanā^eb^ nāma. pāḷiyaṃ anāgataṃ paridīpanā ^b^visesatthaparidīpanā^eb^ nāma. imā pana tadatthaparidīpanā. tattha ^b^pure^eb^ti pubbe. ^b^puratthā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^purimāsu jātīsū^eb^ti imissā jātiyā ^a^V3.0097^ea^ pubbekatakammapaṭikkhepadīpanaṃ. ^b^ubbegauttāsabhayāpanūdano^eb^ti ubbegabhayassa ca uttāsabhayassa ca apanūdano. ^b^ussuko^eb^ti adhimutto.

[03] ^b^satapuññalakkhaṇa^eb^nti satena satena puññakammena nibbattaṃ ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyāti na rocayiṃsu, anantesu pana cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ kammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ, ettakehi janehi kataṃ kammaṃ bodhisatto ekova ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto. tasmā ``satapuññalakkhaṇo''ti imamatthaṃ rocayiṃsu. ^b^manussāsurasakkarakkhasā^eb^ti manussā ca asurā ca sakkā ca rakkhasā ca.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^b^antarā^eb^ti paṭisandhito sarasacutiyā antare. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma pāṇātipātā virati. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma pāṇātipātaṃ karonto padasaddasavanabhayā ^a^M3.0108^ea^ aggaggapādehi akkamantā gantvā paraṃ pātenti. atha te iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ jano jānātūti antovaṅkapādā vā bahivaṅkapādā vā ukkuṭikapādā vā aggakoṇḍā vā paṇhikoṇḍā vā bhavanti. aggapādehi gantvā parassa amāritabhāvaṃ pana tathāgatassa sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti ^b^āyatapaṇhi^eb^ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati ^a^P3.0926^ea^. tathā paraṃ ghātentā unnatakāyena gacchantā aññe passissantīti onatā gantvā paraṃ ghātenti. atha te evamime gantvā paraṃ ghātayiṃsūti nesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ iminā kāraṇena paro jānātūti khujjā vā vāmanā vā pīṭhasappi vā bhavanti. tathāgatassa pana evaṃ gantvā paresaṃ aghātitabhāvaṃ iminā kāraṇena sadevako loko jānātūti ^b^brahmujugatta^eb^mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. tathā paraṃ ghātentā āvudhaṃ vā muggaraṃ vā gaṇhitvā muṭṭhikatahatthā paraṃ ghātenti. te evaṃ tesaṃ parassa ghātitabhāvaṃ iminā kāraṇena jano jānātūti rassaṅgulī vā rassahatthā vā vaṅkaṅgulī vā phaṇahatthakā vā bhavanti. tathāgatassa pana evaṃ paresaṃ aghātitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti ^b^dīghaṅguli^eb^mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. idamettha ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ.^eb^ idameva pana lakkhaṇattayaṃ ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. dīghāyukabhāvo ^b^lakkhaṇānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ^b^maraṇavadhabhayattano^eb^ti ettha maraṇasaṅkhāto vadho maraṇavadho, maraṇavadhato bhayaṃ ^b^maraṇavadhabhayaṃ,^eb^ taṃ attano jānitvā. ^b^paṭivirato paraṃmāraṇāyā^eb^ti yathā mayhaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ mama jīvitaṃ ^a^V3.0098^ea^ piyaṃ, evaṃ paresampīti ñatvā paraṃ māraṇato paṭivirato ahosi. ^b^sucaritenā^eb^ti suciṇṇena. ^b^saggamagamā^eb^ti saggaṃ gato.
[03] ^b^caviya punaridhāgato^eb^ti cavitvā puna idhāgato. ^b^dīghapāsaṇhiko^eb^ti dīghapaṇhiko. ^b^brahmāva sujū^eb^ti brahmā viya suṭṭhu uju.

[03] ^b^subhujo^eb^ti sundarabhujo. ^b^susū^eb^ti mahallakakālepi taruṇarūpo. ^b^susaṇṭhito^eb^ti susaṇṭhānasampanno. ^b^mudutalunaṅguliyassā^eb^ti mudū ca talunā ca aṅguliyo assa. ^b^tībhī^eb^ti tīhi. ^b^purisavaraggalakkhaṇehī^eb^ti purisavarassa ^a^M3.0109^ea^ aggalakkhaṇehi. ^b^cirayapanāyā^eb^ti ciraṃ yāpanāya, dīghāyukabhāvāya.

[03] ^b^ciraṃ yapetī^eb^ti ciraṃ yāpeti. ^b^cirataraṃ pabbajati yadi tato^eb^ti tato cirataraṃ yāpeti, yadi pabbajatīti attho. ^b^yāpayati^eb^ ^a^P3.0927^ea^ ^b^ca vasiddhibhāvanāyā^eb^ti vasippatto hutvā iddhibhāvanāya yāpeti.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ^b^rasitāna^eb^nti rasasampannānaṃ. ``khādanīyāna''ntiādīsu ^b^khādanīyāni^eb^ nāma piṭṭhakhajjakādīni. ^b^bhojanīyānī^eb^ti pañca bhojanāni. ^b^sāyanīyānī^eb^ti sāyitabbāni sappinavanītādīni. ^b^lehanīyānī^eb^ti nillehitabbāni piṭṭhapāyāsādīni. ^b^pānānī^eb^ti aṭṭha pānakāni.

[03] idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dinnaṃ idaṃ paṇītabhojanadānaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma lūkhabhojane kucchigate lohitaṃ sussati, maṃsaṃ milāyati. tasmā lūkhadāyakā sattā iminā kāraṇena nesaṃ lūkhabhojanassa dinnabhāvaṃ jano jānātūti appamaṃsā appalohitā manussapetā viya dullabhannapānā bhavanti. paṇītabhojane pana kucchigate maṃsalohitaṃ vaḍḍhati, paripuṇṇakāyā pāsādikā abhirūpadassanā honti. tasmā tathāgatassa dīgharattaṃ paṇītabhojanadāyakattaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti sattussadamahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma sattussadalakkhaṇameva. paṇītalābhitā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ^b^khajjabhojjamathaleyyasāyita^eb^nti ^a^V3.0099^ea^ khajjakañca bhojanañca lehanīyañca sāyanīyañca. ^b^uttamaggarasadāyako^eb^ti uttamo aggarasadāyako, uttamānaṃ vā aggarasānaṃ dāyako.

[03] ^b^satta cussade^eb^ti satta ca ussade. ^b^tadatthajotaka^eb^nti khajjabhojjādijotakaṃ, tesaṃ lābhasaṃvattanikanti attho. ^b^pabbajampi cā^eb^ti pabbajamānopi ca. ^b^tadādhigacchatī^eb^ti taṃ adhigacchati. ^b^lābhiruttama^eb^nti lābhi uttamaṃ.
[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ^b^dānenā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M3.0110^ea^ ekacco dāneneva saṅgaṇhitabbo hoti, taṃ dānena saṅgahesi. pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ, gihīnaṃ gihiparikkhāraṃ adāsi.

[03] ^b^peyyavajjenā^eb^ti ekacco hi ``ayaṃ dātabbaṃ nāma deti, ekena pana vacanena sabbaṃ makkhetvā nāseti, kiṃ etassa dāna''nti vattā hoti. ekacco ``ayaṃ kiñcāpi dānaṃ na deti, kathento pana telena viya makkheti. eso detu vā mā vā, vacanameva ^a^P3.0928^ea^ tassa sahassaṃ agghatī''ti vattā hoti. evarūpo puggalo dānaṃ na paccāsīsati, piyavacanameva paccāsīsati. taṃ piyavacanena saṅgahesi.

[03] ^b^atthacariyāyā^eb^ti atthasaṃvaḍḍhanakathāya. ekacco hi neva dānaṃ, na piyavacanaṃ paccāsīsati. attano hitakathaṃ vaḍḍhitakathameva paccāsīsati. evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ ``idaṃ te kātabbaṃ, idaṃ te na kātabbaṃ. evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo, evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo''ti evaṃ atthacariyāya saṅgahesi.

[03] ^b^samānattatāyā^eb^ti samānasukhadukkhabhāvena. ekacco hi dānādīsu ekampi na paccāsīsati, ekāsane nisajjaṃ, ekapallaṅke sayanaṃ, ekato bhojananti evaṃ samānasukhadukkhataṃ paccāsīsati. tattha jātiyā hīno bhogena adhiko dussaṅgaho hoti. na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogo kātuṃ, tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati. bhogena hīno jātiyā adhikopi dussaṅgaho hoti. so hi ``ahaṃ jātimā''ti bhogasampannena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ na icchati, tasmiṃ akariyamāne kujjhati. ubhohipi hīno pana susaṅgaho hoti. na hi so itarena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ icchati, na akariyamāne ca kujjhati. ubhohi ^a^V3.0100^ea^ sadisopi susaṅgahoyeva. bhikkhūsu dussīlo dussaṅgaho hoti. na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogo kātuṃ, tathā akariyamāne ca kujjhati. sīlavā susaṅgaho hoti. sīlavā hi adīyamānepi akariyamānepi na kujjhati. aññaṃ attanā ^a^M3.0111^ea^ saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akarontampi na pāpakena cittena passati. paribhogopi tena saddhiṃ sukaro hoti. tasmā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ samānattatāya saṅgahesi.

[03] ^b^susaṅgahitāssa hontī^eb^ti susaṅgahitā assa honti. detu vā mā vā detu, karotu vā mā vā karotu, susaṅgahitāva honti, na bhijjanti. ``yadāssa dātabbaṃ hoti, tadā deti. idāni maññe natthi, tena na deti. kiṃ mayaṃ dadamānameva upaṭṭhahāma? adentaṃ akarontaṃ na upaṭṭhahāmā''ti evaṃ cintenti.

[03] idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ kataṃ dānādisaṅgahakammaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma yo evaṃ asaṅgāhako hoti, so iminā kāraṇenassa asaṅgāhakabhāvaṃ jano jānātūti thaddhahatthapādo ceva hoti, visamaṭṭhitāvayavalakkhaṇo ca. tathāgatassa pana dīgharattaṃ saṅgāhakabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti imāni dve ^a^P3.0929^ea^ lakkhaṇāni nibbattanti. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. susaṅgahitaparijanatā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^
[03] 211^b^.^eb^ ^b^kariyā^eb^ti karitvā. ^b^cariyā^eb^ti caritvā. ^b^anavamatenā^eb^ti anavaññātena. ``anapamodenā''tipi pāṭho, na appamodena, na dīnena na gabbhitenāti attho.
[03] ^b^caviyā^eb^ti cavitvā. ^b^atirucira suvaggu dassaneyya^eb^nti atirucirañca supāsādikaṃ suvaggu ca suṭṭhu chekaṃ dassaneyyañca daṭṭhabbayuttaṃ. ^b^susu kumāro^eb^ti suṭṭhu sukumāro.

[03] ^b^parijanassavo^eb^ti parijano assavo vacanakaro. ^b^vidheyyo^eb^ti kattabbākattabbesu yathāruci vidhātabbo. ^b^mahima^eb^nti mahiṃ imaṃ. ^b^piyavadū hitasukhataṃ jigīsamāno^eb^ti piyavado hutvā hitañca sukhañca pariyesamāno. ^b^vacanapaṭikarassā bhippasannā^eb^ti vacanapaṭikarā assa abhippasannā. ^b^dhammānudhamma^eb^nti dhammañca anudhammañca.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthūpasaṃhita^eb^nti ^a^V3.0101^ea^ ^a^M3.0112^ea^ idhalokaparalokatthanissitaṃ. ^b^dhammūpasaṃhita^eb^nti dasakusalakammapathanissitaṃ. ^b^bahujanaṃ nidaṃsesī^eb^ti bahujanassa nidaṃsanakathaṃ kathesi. ^b^pāṇīna^eb^nti sattānaṃ. ``aggo''tiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāni. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ bhāsitā uddhaṅgamanīyā atthūpasaṃhitā vācā. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma yo evarūpaṃ uggatavācaṃ na bhāsati, so iminā kāraṇena uggatavācāya abhāsanaṃ jano jānātūti adhosaṅkhapādo ca hoti adhonatalomo ca. tathāgatassa pana dīgharattaṃ evarūpāya uggatavācāya bhāsitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti ^b^ussaṅkhapādalakkhaṇañca uddhaggalomalakkhaṇañca^eb^ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. uttamabhāvo ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^
[03] 213^b^.^eb^ ^b^eraya^eb^nti ^a^P3.0930^ea^ bhaṇanto. ^b^bahujanaṃ nidaṃsayī^eb^ti bahujanassa hitaṃ dasseti. ^b^dhammayāga^eb^nti dhammadānayaññaṃ.

[03] ^b^ubbhamuppatitalomavā saso^eb^ti so esa uddhaggatalomavā hoti. ^b^pādagaṇṭhirahū^eb^ti pādagopphakā ahesuṃ. ^b^sādhusaṇṭhitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu saṇṭhitā. ^b^maṃsalohitācitā^eb^ti maṃsena ca lohitena ca ācitā. ^b^tacotthatā^eb^ti tacena pariyonaddhā niguḷhā. ^b^vajatī^eb^ti gacchati. ^b^anomanikkamo^eb^ti anomavihārī seṭṭhavihārī.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ^b^sippaṃ vā^eb^tiādīsu sippaṃ nāma dve sippāni -- hīnañca sippaṃ, ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ. hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ pesakārasippaṃ nahāpitasippaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma sippaṃ lekhā muddā gaṇanā. ^b^vijjā^eb^ti ahivijjādianekavidhā. ^b^caraṇa^eb^nti pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ. ^b^kamma^eb^nti kammassakatājānanapaññā. ^b^kilisseyyu^eb^nti kilameyyuṃ. antevāsikavattaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ, taṃ nesaṃ mā ciramahosīti cintesi.

[03] ^b^rājārahānī^eb^ti rañño anurūpāni hatthiassādīni, tāniyeva rañño senāya aṅgabhūtattā ^b^rājaṅgānī^eb^ti vuccanti. ^b^rājūpabhogānī^eb^ti rañño ^a^M3.0113^ea^ upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍāni, tāni ceva sattaratanāni ca. ^b^rājānucchavikānī^eb^ti rañño anucchavikāni. tesaṃyeva sabbesaṃ idaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^samaṇārahānī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0102^ea^ samaṇānaṃ anurūpāni cīvarādīni. ^b^samaṇaṅgānī^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ koṭṭhāsabhūtā catasso parisā. ^b^samaṇūpabhogānī^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ upabhogaparikkhārā. ^b^samaṇānucchavikānī^eb^ti tesaṃyeva adhivacanaṃ.

[03] idha pana ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ sakkaccaṃ sippādivācanaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma yo evaṃ sakkaccaṃ sippaṃ avācento antevāsike ukkuṭikāsanajaṅghapesanikādīhi kilameti, tassa jaṅghamaṃsaṃ likhitvā pātitaṃ viya hoti. tathāgatassa pana sakkaccaṃ vācitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti anupubbauggatavaṭṭitaṃ ^b^eṇijaṅghalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0931^ea^ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. anucchavikalābhitā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadūpaghātāyā^eb^ti yaṃ sippaṃ kassaci upaghātāya na hoti. ^b^kilissatī^eb^ti kilamissati. ^b^sukhumattacotthatā^eb^ti sukhumattacena pariyonaddhā. kiṃ pana aññena kammena aññaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatīti? na nibbattati. yaṃ pana nibbattati, taṃ anubyañjanaṃ hoti, tasmā idha vuttaṃ.
[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ^b^samaṇaṃ vā^eb^ti samitapāpaṭṭhena samaṇaṃ. ^b^brāhmaṇaṃ vā^eb^ti bāhitapāpaṭṭhena brāhmaṇaṃ.
[03] ^b^mahāpañño^eb^tiādīsu mahāpaññādīhi samannāgato hotīti attho. tatridaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ nānattaṃ.

[03] tattha katamā ^b^mahāpaññā?^eb^ mahante sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti ^b^mahāpaññā,^eb^ mahante samādhikkhandhe paññākkhandhe vimuttikkhandhe vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā. mahantāni ṭhānāṭhānāni mahantā vihārasamāpattiyo mahantāni ariyasaccāni mahante satipaṭṭhāne sammappadhāne iddhipāde mahantāni indriyāni balāni mahante bojjhaṅge mahante ariyamagge mahantāni sāmaññaphalāni mahantā abhiññāyo mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā.

[01] katamā ^a^M3.0114^ea^ ^b^puthupaññā?^eb^ puthunānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti ^b^puthupaññā.^eb^ puthunānādhātūsu puthunānāāyatanesu ^a^V3.0103^ea^ puthunānāpaṭiccasamuppādesu puthunānāsuññatamanupalabbhesu puthunānāatthesu dhammesu niruttīsu paṭibhānesu. puthunānāsīlakkhandhesu puthunānāsamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñādassanakkhandhesu puthunānāṭhānāṭhānesu puthunānāvihārasamāpattīsu puthunānāariyasaccesu puthunānāsatipaṭṭhānesu sammappadhānesu iddhipādesu indriyesu balesu bojjhaṅgesu puthunānāariyamaggesu sāmaññaphalesu abhiññāsu puthujjanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.

[03] katamā ^b^hāsapaññā?^eb^ idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūreti bhojane mattaññutaṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ vimuttikkhandhaṃ ^a^P3.0932^ea^ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ paripūretīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo...pe0... pāmojjabahulo ṭhānāṭhānaṃ paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo vihārasamāpattiyo paripūretīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā. satipaṭṭhāne sammappadhāne iddhipāde indriyāni balāni bojjhaṅge ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo sāmaññaphalāni sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā. abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā. hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.

[03] katamā ^b^javanapaññā?^eb^ yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. dukkhato khippaṃ anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. yā kāci vedanā...pe0... yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. cakkhu...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ cakkhu...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena...pe0... vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ^a^M3.0115^ea^. cakkhuṃ...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.

[03] katamā ^a^V3.0104^ea^ ^b^tikkhapaññā?^eb^ khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā. uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāseti, uppannaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ, uppannaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ, uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme uppannaṃ rāgaṃ dosaṃ mohaṃ kodhaṃ upanāhaṃ makkhaṃ paḷāsaṃ issaṃ macchariyaṃ māyaṃ sāṭheyyaṃ thambhaṃ sārambhaṃ ^a^P3.0933^ea^ mānaṃ atimānaṃ madaṃ pamādaṃ sabbe kilese sabbe duccarite sabbe abhisaṅkhāre sabbe bhavagāmikamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantī karoti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā. ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri sāmaññaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidāyo cha abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā phassitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.

[03] katamā ^b^nibbedhikapaññā?^eb^ idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu, anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā. anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ mohakkhandhaṃ kodhaṃ upanāhaṃ...pe0... sabbe bhavagāmikamme nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññāti (paṭi0 ma0 3.3).

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabbajitaṃ upāsitā^eb^ti paṇḍitaṃ pabbajitaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsitā. ^b^atthantaro^eb^ti yathā eke randhagavesino upārambhacittatāya dosaṃ abbhantaraṃ karitvā nisāmayanti, evaṃ anisāmetvā atthaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā atthayuttaṃ kathaṃ nisāmayi upadhārayi.
[03] ^b^paṭilābhagatenā^eb^ti paṭilābhatthāya gatena. ^b^uppādanimittakovidā^eb^ti uppāde ca nimitte ca chekā. ^b^avecca dakkhitī^eb^ti ñatvā passissati.
[03] ^b^atthānusiṭṭhīsu pariggahesu cā^eb^ti ye atthānusāsanesu pariggahā atthānatthaṃ pariggāhakāni ñāṇāni, tesūti attho.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^akkodhano^eb^ti ^a^M3.0116^ea^ na anāgāmimaggena kodhassa pahīnattā, atha kho sacepi me kodho uppajjeyya, khippameva naṃ paṭivinodeyyanti evaṃ akkodhavasikattā. ^b^nābhisajjī^eb^ti kuṭilakaṇṭako viya tattha tattha mammaṃ tudanto viya na laggi. ^b^na kuppi na byāpajjī^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V3.0105^ea^ pubbuppattiko ^b^kopo. ^eb^ tato balavataro ^b^byāpādo.^eb^ tato balavatarā ^b^patitthiyanā.^eb^ taṃ sabbaṃ akaronto na kuppi na byāpajji na patitthiyi. ^b^appaccaya^eb^nti domanassaṃ. ^b^na pātvākāsī^eb^ti na kāyavikārena vā vacīvikārena vā pākaṭamakāsi.

[03] idha kammaṃ nāma dīgharattaṃ akkodhanatā ceva ^a^P3.0934^ea^ sukhumattharaṇādidānañca. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma kodhanassa chavivaṇṇo āvilo hoti mukhaṃ duddasiyaṃ vatthacchādanasadisañca maṇḍanaṃ nāma natthi. tasmā yo kodhano ceva vatthacchādanānañca adātā, so iminā kāraṇenassa jano kodhanādibhāvaṃ jānātūti dubbaṇṇo hoti dussaṇṭhāno. akkodhanassa pana mukhaṃ virocati, chavivaṇṇo vippasīdati. sattā hi catūhi kāraṇehi pāsādikā honti āmisadānena vā vatthadānena vā sammajjanena vā akkodhanatāya vā. imāni cattāripi kāraṇāni dīgharattaṃ tathāgatena katāneva. tenassa imesaṃ katabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. sukhumattharaṇādilābhitā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^
[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhivissajī^eb^ti abhivissajjesi. ^b^mahimiva suro abhivassa^eb^nti suro vuccati devo, mahāpathaviṃ abhivassanto devo viya.
[03] ^b^suravarataroriva indo^eb^ti surānaṃ varataro indo viya.
[03] ^b^apabbajjamiccha^eb^nti apabbajjaṃ gihibhāvaṃ icchanto. ^b^mahatimahi^eb^nti mahantiṃ pathaviṃ.
[03] ^b^acchādanavatthamokkhapāvuraṇāna^eb^nti acchādanānañceva vatthānañca uttamapāvuraṇānañca. ^b^panāso^eb^ti vināso.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ^b^mātarampi^eb^ ^a^M3.0117^ea^ ^b^puttena samānetā ahosī^eb^ti imaṃ kammaṃ rajje patiṭṭhitena sakkā kātuṃ. tasmā bodhisattopi rajjaṃ kārayamāno antonagare catukkādīsu catūsu nagaradvāresu bahinagare catūsu disāsu imaṃ kammaṃ karothāti manusse ṭhapesi. te mātaraṃ kuhiṃ me putto puttaṃ ^a^V3.0106^ea^ na passāmīti vilapantiṃ pariyesamānaṃ disvā ehi, amma, puttaṃ dakkhasīti taṃ ādāya gantvā nahāpetvā bhojetvā puttamassā pariyesitvā dassenti. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ ñātīnaṃ samaṅgibhāvakaraṇaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma ñātayo hi samaṅgībhūtā aññamaññassa vajjaṃ paṭicchādenti. kiñcāpi hi te kalahakāle kalahaṃ karonti, ekassa pana dose uppanne aññaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchanti. ayaṃ nāma etassa dosoti vutte sabbe uṭṭhahitvā ^a^P3.0935^ea^ kena diṭṭhaṃ kena sutaṃ, amhākaṃ ñātīsu evarūpaṃ kattā nāma natthīti. tathāgatena ca taṃ ñātisaṅgahaṃ karontena dīgharattaṃ idaṃ vajjappaṭicchādanakammaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti. athassa sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena evarūpassa kammassa katabhāvaṃ jānātūti kosohitavatthaguyhalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. pahūtaputtatā ^b^ānisaṃso. ^eb^
[03] 221^b^.^eb^ ^b^vatthachādiya^eb^nti vatthena chādetabbaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ.
[03] ^b^amittatāpanā^eb^ti amittānaṃ patāpanā. ^b^gihissa pītiṃ jananā^eb^ti gihibhūtassa sato pītijananā.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ^b^samaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ tārukkhasamo ayaṃ pokkharasātisamo''ti evaṃ tena tena samaṃ jānāti. ^b^sāmaṃ jānātī^eb^ti sayaṃ jānāti. ^b^purisaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ seṭṭhasammato''ti purisaṃ jānāti. ^b^purisavisesaṃ jānātī^eb^ti muggaṃ māsena samaṃ akatvā guṇavisiṭṭhassa visesaṃ jānāti. ^b^ayamidamarahatī^eb^ti ayaṃ puriso idaṃ nāma dānasakkāraṃ arahati ^a^M3.0118^ea^. ^b^purisavisesakaro ahosī^eb^ti purisavisesaṃ ñatvā kārako ahosi. yo yaṃ arahati, tasseva taṃ adāsi. yo hi kahāpaṇārahassa aḍḍhaṃ deti, so parassa aḍḍhaṃ nāseti. yo dve kahāpaṇe deti, so attano kahāpaṇaṃ nāseti. tasmā idaṃ ubhayampi akatvā yo yaṃ arahati, tassa tadeva adāsi. ^b^saddhādhana^eb^ntiādīsu sampattipaṭilābhaṭṭhena saddhādīnaṃ dhanabhāvo veditabbo.

[03] idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ purisavisesaṃ ñatvā kataṃ samasaṅgahakammaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma tadassa ^a^V3.0107^ea^ kammaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti imāni dve lakkhaṇāni nibbattanti. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. dhanasampatti ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ^b^tuliyā^eb^ti tulayitvā. ^b^paṭivicayā^eb^ti paṭivicinitvā. ^b^mahājanasaṅgāhaka^eb^nti mahājanasaṅgahaṇaṃ. ^b^samekkhamāno^eb^ti samaṃ pekkhamāno. ^b^atinipuṇā^eb^ ^a^P3.0936^ea^ ^b^manujā^eb^ti atinipuṇā sukhumapaññā lakkhaṇapāṭhakamanussā. ^b^bahuvividhā gihīnaṃ arahānī^eb^ti bahū vividhāni gihīnaṃ anucchavikāni paṭilabhati. ^b^daharo susu kumāro^eb^ ``ayaṃ daharo kumāro paṭilabhissatī''ti byākaṃsu ^b^mahīpatissā^eb^ti rañño.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ^b^yogakkhemakāmo^eb^ti yogato khemakāmo. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti kammassakatapaññāya. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma mahājanassa atthakāmatā. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma taṃ mahājanassa atthakāmatāya vaḍḍhimeva paccāsīsitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti imāni samantaparipūrāni aparihīnāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni nibbattanti. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇattayaṃ. dhanādīhi ceva saddhādīhi ca aparihāni ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti okappanasaddhāya pasādasaddhāya. ^b^sīlenā^eb^ti pañcasīlena dasasīlena. ^b^sutenā^eb^ti pariyattisavanena. ^b^buddhiyā^eb^ti etesaṃ buddhiyā ^a^M3.0119^ea^, ``kinti etehi vaḍḍheyyu''nti evaṃ cintesīti attho. ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti lokiyadhammena. ^b^bahūhi sādhūhī^eb^ti aññehipi bahūhi uttamaguṇehi. ^b^asahānadhammata^eb^nti aparihīnadhammaṃ.

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ^b^samābhivāhiniyo^eb^ti yathā tilaphalamattampi jivhagge ṭhapitaṃ sabbattha pharati, evaṃ samā hutvā vahanti. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma aviheṭhanakammaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma pāṇiādīhi pahāraṃ laddhassa tattha tattha lohitaṃ saṇṭhāti, gaṇṭhi gaṇṭhi hutvā antova pubbaṃ gaṇhāti, antova bhijjati, evaṃ so bahurogo hoti. tathāgatena pana dīgharattaṃ imaṃ ārogyakaraṇakammaṃ kataṃ. tadassa sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti ārogyakaraṃ rasaggasaggilakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. appābādhatā ^b^ānisaṃso. ^eb^
[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ^b^maraṇavadhenā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0108^ea^ ``etaṃ māretha etaṃ ghātethā''ti evaṃ āṇattena maraṇavadhena. ^b^ubbādhanāyā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0937^ea^ bandhanāgārappavesanena.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ^b^na ca visaṭa^eb^nti kakkaṭako viya akkhīni nīharitvā na kodhavasena pekkhitā ahosi. ^b^na ca visācī^eb^ti vaṅkakkhikoṭiyā pekkhitāpi nāhosi. ^b^na ca pana viceyya pekkhitā^eb^ti viceyya pekkhitā nāma yo kujjhitvā yadā naṃ paro oloketi, tadā nimmīleti na oloketi, puna gacchantaṃ kujjhitvā oloketi, evarūpo nāhosi. ``vineyyapekkhitā''tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^ujuṃ tathā pasaṭamujumano^eb^ti ujumano hutvā uju pekkhitā hoti, yathā ca ujuṃ, tathā pasaṭaṃ vipulaṃ vitthataṃ pekkhitā hoti. ^b^piyadassano^eb^ti piyāyamānehi passitabbo.

[03] idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ mahājanassa piyacakkhunā olokanakammaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma kujjhitvā olokento kāṇo viya kākakkhi viya hoti, vaṅkakkhi pana āvilakkhi ca hotiyeva. pasannacittassa pana olokayato ^a^M3.0120^ea^ akkhīnaṃ pañcavaṇṇo pasādo paññāyati. tathāgato ca tathā olokesi. athassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ piyacakkhunā olokitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti imāni nettasampattikarāni dve mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni nibbattanti. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. piyadassanatā ^b^ānisaṃso. abhiyogino^eb^ti lakkhaṇasatthe yuttā.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahujanapubbaṅgamo ahosī^eb^ti bahujanassa pubbaṅgamo ahosi gaṇajeṭṭhako. tassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ aññe āpajjiṃsu. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma pubbaṅgamatā. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma yo pubbaṅgamo hutvā dānādīni kusalakammāni karoti, so amaṅkubhūto sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā pītipāmojjena paripuṇṇasīso vicarati, mahāpuriso ca hoti. tathāgato ca tathā akāsi. athassa sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena idaṃ pubbaṅgamakammaṃ jānātūti uṇhīsasīsalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. mahājanānuvattanatā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ^b^bahujanaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0109^ea^ ^b^hessatī^eb^ti bahujanassa bhavissati. ^b^paṭibhogiyā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0938^ea^ veyyāvaccakarā, etassa bahū veyyāvaccakarā bhavissantīti attho. ^b^abhiharanti tadā^eb^ti daharakāleyeva tadā evaṃ byākaronti. ^b^paṭihāraka^eb^nti veyyāvaccakarabhāvaṃ. ^b^visavī^eb^ti ciṇṇavasī.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ^b^upavattatī^eb^ti ajjhāsayaṃ anuvattati, idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ saccakathanaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ advejjhakathāya parisuddhakathāya kathitabhāvamassa sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti ekekalomalakkhaṇañca uṇṇālakkhaṇañca nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. mahājanassa ajjhāsayānukūlena anuvattanatā ^b^ānisaṃso. ekekalomūpacitaṅgavā^eb^ti ekekehi lomehi upacitasarīro.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhejjapariso^eb^ti ^a^M3.0121^ea^ abhinditabbapariso. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ apisuṇavācāya kathanaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma pisuṇavācassa kira samaggabhāvaṃ bhindanato dantā aparipuṇṇā ceva honti viraḷā ca. tathāgatassa pana dīgharattaṃ apisuṇavācataṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti idaṃ lakkhaṇadvayaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. abhejjaparisatā ^b^ānisaṃso. caturo dasā^eb^ti cattāro dasa cattālīsaṃ.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādeyyavāco hotī^eb^ti gahetabbavacano hoti. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma dīgharattaṃ apharusavāditā. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma ye pharusavācā honti, te iminā kāraṇena nesaṃ jivhaṃ parivattetvā parivattetvā pharusavācāya kathitabhāvaṃ jano jānātūti baddhajivhā vā honti, gūḷhajivhā vā dvijivhā vā mammanā vā. ye pana jivhaṃ parivattetvā parivattetvā pharusavācaṃ na vadanti, te baddhajivhā gūḷhajivhā dvijivhā na honti. mudu nesaṃ jivhā hoti rattakambalavaṇṇā. tasmā tathāgatassa dīgharattaṃ jivhaṃ parivattetvā pharusāya vācāya akathitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti pahūtajivhālakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. pharusavācaṃ kathentānañca saddo bhijjati. te saddabhedaṃ katvā pharusavācāya kathitabhāvaṃ jano jānātūti ^a^P3.0939^ea^ ^a^V3.0110^ea^ chinnassarā vā honti bhinnassarā vā kākassarā vā. ye pana sarabhedakaraṃ pharusavācaṃ na kathenti, tesaṃ saddo madhuro ca hoti pemanīyo. tasmā tathāgatassa dīgharattaṃ sarabhedakarāya pharusavācāya akathitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti brahmassaralakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. ādeyyavacanatā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubbādhika^eb^nti akkosayuttattā ābādhakariṃ ^b^bahujanappamaddana^eb^nti bahujanānaṃ pamaddaniṃ ^b^abāḷhaṃ giraṃ so na bhaṇi pharusa^eb^nti ettha akāro parato bhaṇisaddena yojetabbo. ^b^bāḷha^eb^nti balavaṃ atipharusaṃ. ^b^bāḷhaṃ giraṃ so na abhaṇī^eb^ti ayamettha attho. ^b^susaṃhita^eb^nti suṭṭhu pemasañhitaṃ. ^b^sakhila^eb^nti ^a^M3.0122^ea^ mudukaṃ. ^b^vācā^eb^ti vācāyo. ^b^kaṇṇasukhā^eb^ti kaṇṇasukhāyo. ``kaṇṇasukha''ntipi pāṭho, yathā kaṇṇānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, evaṃ erayatīti attho. ^b^vedayathā^eb^ti vedayittha. ^b^brahmassaratta^eb^nti brahmassarataṃ. ^b^bahuno bahu^eb^nti bahujanassa bahuṃ. ``bahūnaṃ bahunti''pi pāṭho, bahujanānaṃ bahunti attho.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ^b^appadhaṃsiko hotī^eb^ti guṇato vā ṭhānato vā padhaṃsetuṃ cāvetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma palāpakathāya akathanaṃ. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma ye taṃ kathenti, te iminā kāraṇena nesaṃ hanukaṃ cāletvā cāletvā palāpakathāya kathitabhāvaṃ jano jānātūti antopaviṭṭhahanukā vā vaṅkahanukā vā pabbhārahanukā vā honti. tathāgato pana tathā na kathesi. tenassa hanukaṃ cāletvā cāletvā dīgharattaṃ palāpakathāya akathitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti sīhahanulakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. appadhaṃsikatā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ^b^avikiṇṇavacanabyappatho cā^eb^ti avikiṇṇavacanānaṃ viya purimabodhisattānaṃ vacanapatho assāti avikiṇṇavacanabyappatho. ^b^dvidugamavaratarahanuttamalatthā^eb^ti dvīhi dvīhi gacchatīti ^a^P3.0940^ea^ dvidugamo, dvīhi dvīhīti catūhi, catuppadānaṃ varatarassa sīhasseva hanubhāvaṃ alatthāti attho. ^b^manujādhipatī^eb^ti manujānaṃ adhipati. ^b^tathatto^eb^ti tathasabhāvo.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ^b^suciparivāro^eb^ti ^a^V3.0111^ea^ parisuddhaparivāro. idha ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ nāma sammājīvatā. ^b^kammasarikkhakaṃ^eb^ nāma yo visamena saṃkiliṭṭhājīvena jīvitaṃ kappeti, tassa dantāpi visamā honti dāṭhāpi kiliṭṭhā. tathāgatassa pana samena suddhājīvena jīvitaṃ kappitabhāvaṃ sadevako loko iminā kāraṇena jānātūti samadantalakkhaṇañca susukkadāṭhālakkhaṇañca nibbattati. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma idameva lakkhaṇadvayaṃ. suciparivāratā ^b^ānisaṃso.^eb^

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ^b^avassajī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0123^ea^ pahāsi ^b^tidivapuravarasamo^eb^ti tidivapuravarena sakkena samo. ^b^lapanaja^eb^nti mukhajaṃ, dantanti attho. ^b^dijasamasukkasucisobhanadanto^eb^ti dve vāre jātattā dijanāmakā sukkā suci sobhanā ca dantā assāti dijasamasukkasucisobhanadanto. ^b^na ca janapadatudana^eb^nti yo tassa cakkavāḷaparicchinno janapado, tassa aññena tudanaṃ pīḷā vā ābādho vā natthi. ^b^hitamapi ca bahujana sukhañca carantī^eb^ti bahujanā samānasukhadukkhā hutvā tasmiṃ janapade aññamaññassa hitañceva sukhañca caranti. ^b^vipāpo^eb^ti vigatapāpo. ^b^vigatadarathakilamatho^eb^ti vigatakāyikadarathakilamatho. ^b^malakhilakalikilese panudehī^eb^ti rāgādimalānañceva rāgādikhilānañca dosakalīnañca sabbakilesānañca apanudehi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] lakkhaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0112^ea^ ^a^M3.0124^ea^ ^a^P3.0941^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti siṅgālasuttaṃ. tatrāyamanuttānapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe^eb^ti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ. taṃ kira veḷūhi parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena gopuraṭṭālakayuttaṃ nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ, tena veḷuvananti vuccati. kalandakānañcettha nivāpaṃ adaṃsu, tena kalandakanivāpoti vuccati.

[03] pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divā niddaṃ okkami. parijanopissa ``sutto rājā''ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi. atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati, taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā ``rañño jīvitaṃ dammī''ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi. rājā paṭibujjhi. kaṇhasappo nivatto. so taṃ disvā ``imāya kāḷakāya mama jīvitaṃ dinna''nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi, abhayaghosañca ghosāpesi. tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti ``kalandakanivāpo''ti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ. ^b^kalandakā^eb^ti hi kāḷakānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayenā^eb^ti yasmiṃ samaye bhagavā rājagahaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe viharati, tena samayena. ^b^siṅgālako gahapatiputto^eb^ti siṅgālakoti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^gahapatiputto^eb^ti gahapatissa putto gahapatiputto. tassa kira pitā gahapatimahāsālo, nidahitvā ṭhapitā cassa gehe cattālīsa dhanakoṭiyo ^a^P3.0942^ea^ atthi. so bhagavati niṭṭhaṅgato upāsako sotāpanno, bhariyāpissa sotāpannāyeva. putto panassa assaddho appasanno. atha naṃ mātāpitaro abhikkhaṇaṃ evaṃ ovadanti -- ``tāta satthāraṃ upasaṅkama, dhammasenāpatiṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ ^a^V3.0113^ea^ mahākassapaṃ asītimahāsāvake upasaṅkamā''ti. so evamāha -- ``natthi mama tumhākaṃ samaṇānaṃ upasaṅkamanakiccaṃ, samaṇānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditabbaṃ hoti, onamitvā vandantassa piṭṭhi rujjati, jāṇukāni kharāni honti, bhūmiyaṃ nisīditabbaṃ ^a^M3.0125^ea^ hoti, tattha nisinnassa vatthāni kilissanti jīranti, samīpe nisinnakālato paṭṭhāya kathāsallāpo hoti, tasmiṃ sati vissāso uppajjati, tato nimantetvā cīvarapiṇḍapātādīni dātabbāni honti. evaṃ sante attho parihāyati, natthi mayhaṃ tumhākaṃ samaṇānaṃ upasaṅkamanakicca''nti. iti naṃ yāvajīvaṃ ovadantāpi mātāpitaro sāsane upanetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.

[03] athassa pitā maraṇamañce nipanno ``mama puttassa ovādaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā puna cintesi -- ``disā tāta namassāhī''ti evamassa ovādaṃ dassāmi, so atthaṃ ajānanto disā namassissati, atha naṃ satthā vā sāvakā vā passitvā ``kiṃ karosī''ti pucchissanti. tato ``mayhaṃ pitā disā namassanaṃ karohīti maṃ ovadī''ti vakkhati. athassa te ``na tuyhaṃ pitā etā disā namassāpeti, imā pana disā namassāpetī''ti dhammaṃ desessanti. so buddhasāsane guṇaṃ ñatvā ``puññakammaṃ karissatī''ti. atha naṃ āmantāpetvā ``tāta, pātova uṭṭhāya cha disā namasseyyāsī''ti āha. maraṇamañce nipannassa kathā nāma yāvajīvaṃ anussaraṇīyā hoti. tasmā so gahapatiputto taṃ pituvacanaṃ anussaranto tathā akāsi. tasmā ``kālasseva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā''tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ^b^puthudisā^eb^ti bahudisā. idāni tā dassento ^b^puratthimaṃ disa^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^pāvisī^eb^ti na tāva paviṭṭho, pavisissāmīti nikkhantattā pana antarāmagge vattamānopi evaṃ vuccati. ^b^addasā kho bhagavā^eb^ti na idāneva addasa, paccūsasamayepi buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento etaṃ disā namassamānaṃ disvā ``ajja ahaṃ siṅgālassa gahapatiputtassa gihivinayaṃ siṅgālasuttantaṃ kathessāmi, mahājanassa sā kathā saphalā bhavissati, gantabbaṃ mayā etthā''ti. tasmā ^a^P3.0943^ea^ pātova nikkhamitvā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi, pavisanto ca naṃ tatheva addasa. tena vuttaṃ -- ``addasā kho bhagavā''ti. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti so kira avidūre ṭhitampi satthāraṃ na passati, disāyeva namassati. athaṃ naṃ bhagavā sūriyarasmisamphassena vikasamānaṃ mahāpadumaṃ viya mukhaṃ vivaritvā ``kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, gahapatiputtā''tiādikaṃ etadavoca.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V3.0114^ea^ ^a^M3.0126^ea^ ^b^kathaṃ pana, bhante^eb^ti so kira taṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvāva cintesi ``yā kira mama pitarā cha disā namassitabbā''ti vuttā, na kira tā etā, aññā kira ariyasāvakena cha disā namassitabbā. handāhaṃ ariyasāvakena namassitabbā disāyeva pucchitvā namassāmīti. so tā pucchanto ^b^yathā kathaṃ pana, bhante^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yathā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^kathaṃ panā^eb^ti idameva pucchāpadaṃ. ^b^kammakilesā^eb^ti tehi kammehi sattā kilissanti, tasmā kammakilesāti vuccanti. ^b^ṭhānehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi. ^b^apāyamukhānī^eb^ti vināsamukhāni. ^b^so^eb^ti so sotāpanno ariyasāvako. ^b^cuddasa pāpakāpagato^eb^ti etehi cuddasahi pāpakehi lāmakehi apagato. ^b^chaddisāpaṭicchādī^eb^ti cha disā paṭicchādento. ^b^ubholokavijayāyā^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ idhalokaparalokānaṃ vijinanatthāya. ^b^ayañceva loko āraddho hotī^eb^ti evarūpassa hi idha loke pañca verāni na honti, tenassa ayañceva loko āraddho hoti paritosito ceva nipphādito ca. paralokepi pañca verāni na honti, tenassa paro ca loko ārādhito hoti. tasmā so kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ iti bhagavā saṅkhepena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tameva vitthārento ^b^katamassa cattāro kammakilesā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^kammakileso^eb^ti kammañca taṃ kilesasampayuttattā kileso cāti kammakileso. sakilesoyeva hi pāṇaṃ hanati, nikkileso na hanati, tasmā pāṇātipāto ``kammakileso''ti vutto. ^b^adinnādānādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^athāpara^eb^nti aparampi etadatthaparidīpakameva gāthābandhaṃ avocāti attho.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ^b^pāpakammaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0944^ea^ ^b^karotī^eb^ti idaṃ bhagavā yasmā kārake dassite akārako pākaṭo hoti, tasmā ``pāpakammaṃ na karotī''ti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāpi desanākusalatāya paṭhamataraṃ kārakaṃ dassento āha ^a^M3.0127^ea^. tattha ^b^chandāgatiṃ gacchanto^eb^ti chandena pemena agatiṃ gacchanto akattabbaṃ karonto. parapadesupi eseva nayo. tattha yo ``ayaṃ me mitto vā sambhatto vā sandiṭṭho vā ñātako vā lañjaṃ vā pana me detī''ti chandavasena assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ chandāgatiṃ gacchanto pāpakammaṃ karoti nāma. yo ``ayaṃ me verī''ti pakativeravasena taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena ^a^V3.0115^ea^ vā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ dosāgatiṃ gacchanto pāpakammaṃ karoti nāma. yo pana mandattā momūhattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ mohāgatiṃ gacchanto pāpakammaṃ karoti nāma. yo pana ``ayaṃ rājavallabho vā visamanissito vā anatthampi me kareyyā''ti bhīto assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ bhayāgatiṃ gacchanto pāpakammaṃ karoti nāma. yo pana yaṃkiñci bhājento ``ayaṃ me sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto vā''ti pemavasena atirekaṃ deti, ``ayaṃ me verī''ti dosavasena ūnakaṃ deti, momūhattā dinnādinnaṃ ajānamāno kassaci ūnaṃ kassaci adhikaṃ deti, ``ayaṃ imasmiṃ adiyyamāne mayhaṃ anatthampi kareyyā''ti bhīto kassaci atirekaṃ deti, so catubbidhopi yathānukkamena chandāgatiādīni gacchanto pāpakammaṃ karoti nāma.
[03] ariyasāvako pana jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇantopi chandāgatiādīni na gacchati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``imehi catūhi ṭhānehi pāpakammaṃ na karotī''ti.
[03] ^b^nihīyati yaso tassā^eb^ti tassa agatigāmino kittiyasopi parivārayasopi nihīyati parihāyati.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ^b^surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānānuyogo^eb^ti ettha ^b^surā^eb^ti piṭṭhasurā pūvasurā odanasurā kiṇṇapakkhittā sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañca surā. ^b^meraya^eb^nti pupphāsavo phalāsavo madhvāsavo guḷāsavo sambhārasaṃyuttoti pañca āsavā. taṃ sabbampi madakaraṇavasena ^b^majjaṃ. pamādaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pamādakāraṇaṃ. yāya cetanāya taṃ majjaṃ pivati, tassa etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^anuyogo^eb^ti tassa surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānassa anuanuyogo punappunaṃ karaṇaṃ. yasmā panetaṃ anuyuttassa uppannā ceva ^a^P3.0945^ea^ bhogā parihāyanti, anuppannā ca nuppajjanti, tasmā ``bhogānaṃ apāyamukha''nti ^a^M3.0128^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^vikālavisikhācariyānuyogo^eb^ti avelāya visikhāsu cariyānuyuttatā.
[03] ^b^samajjābhicaraṇa^eb^nti naccādidassanavasena samajjāgamanaṃ. ^b^ālasyānuyogo^eb^ti kāyālasiyatāya yuttappayuttatā.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V3.0116^ea^ channaṃ apāyamukhānaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tāni vibhajanto ^b^cha kho me, gahapatiputta ādīnavā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sandiṭṭhikā^eb^ti sāmaṃ passitabbā, idhalokabhāvinī. ^b^dhanajānī^eb^ti dhanahāni. ^b^kalahappavaḍḍhanī^eb^ti vācākalahassa ceva hatthaparāmāsādikāyakalahassa ca vaḍḍhanī. ^b^rogānaṃ āyatana^eb^nti tesaṃ tesaṃ akkhirogādīnaṃ khettaṃ. ^b^akittisañjananī^eb^ti suraṃ pivitvā hi mātarampi paharanti pitarampi, aññaṃ bahumpi avattabbaṃ vadanti, akattabbaṃ karonti. tena garahampi daṇḍampi hatthapādādichedampi pāpuṇanti, idhalokepi paralokepi akittiṃ pāpuṇanti, iti tesaṃ sā surā akittisañjananī nāma hoti. ^b^kopīnanidaṃsanī^eb^ti guyhaṭṭhānañhi vivariyamānaṃ hiriṃ kopeti vināseti, tasmā ``kopīna''nti vuccati, surāmadamattā ca taṃ taṃ aṅgaṃ vivaritvā vicaranti, tena nesaṃ sā surā kopīnassa nidaṃsanato ``kopīnanidaṃsanī''ti vuccati. ^b^paññāya dubbalikaraṇī^eb^ti sāgatattherassa viya kammassakatapaññaṃ dubbalaṃ karoti, tasmā ``paññāya dubbalikaraṇī''ti vuccati. maggapaññaṃ pana dubbalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. adhigatamaggānañhi sā antomukhameva na pavisati. ^b^chaṭṭhaṃ pada^eb^nti chaṭṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ^b^attāpissa agutto arakkhito hotī^eb^ti avelāya caranto hi khāṇukaṇṭakādīnipi akkamati, ahināpi yakkhādīhipi samāgacchati, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti ñatvā verinopi naṃ nilīyitvā gaṇhanti vā hananti vā. evaṃ attāpissa agutto hoti arakkhito. puttadārāpi ``amhākaṃ pitā amhākaṃ sāmi rattiṃ vicarati, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya''nti itissa puttadhītaropi bhariyāpi ^a^P3.0946^ea^ bahi patthanaṃ katvā rattiṃ carantā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇanti. evaṃ ^b^puttadāropissa agutto arakkhito hoti. sāpateyya^eb^nti tassa puttadāraparijanassa rattiṃ caraṇakabhāvaṃ ñatvā corā suññaṃ ^a^M3.0129^ea^ gehaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ icchanti, taṃ haranti. evaṃ ^b^sāpateyyampissa aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ hoti. saṅkiyo ca hotī^eb^ti aññehi katapāpakammesupi ``iminā kataṃ bhavissatī''ti saṅkitabbo hoti. yassa yassa gharadvārena yāti, tattha yaṃ aññena corakammaṃ paradārikakammaṃ vā kataṃ, taṃ ``iminā kata''nti vutte abhūtaṃ asantampi tasmiṃ rūhati patiṭṭhāti. ^b^bahūnañca dukkhadhammāna^eb^nti ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ domanassanti vattuṃ na sakkā, aññasmiṃ puggale asati sabbaṃ vikālacārimhi āharitabbaṃ hoti, iti so bahūnaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ purakkhato puregāmī hoti.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ^b^kva^eb^ ^a^V3.0117^ea^ ^b^nacca^eb^nti ``kasmiṃ ṭhāne naṭanāṭakādinaccaṃ atthī''ti pucchitvā yasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā taṃ atthi, tattha gantabbaṃ hoti, tassa ``sve naccadassanaṃ gamissāmī''ti ajja vatthagandhamālādīni paṭiyādentasseva sakaladivasampi kammacchedo hoti, naccadassanena ekāhampi dvīhampi tīhampi tattheva hoti, atha vuṭṭhisampattiyādīni labhitvāpi vappādikāle vappādīni akarontassa anuppannā bhogā nuppajjanti, tassa bahi gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā anārakkhe gehe corā yaṃ icchanti, taṃ karonti, tenassa uppannāpi bhogā vinassanti. ^b^kva gīta^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. tesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ brahmajāle vuttameva.
