[03] pāḷiyaṃ pana katthaci dve āsavā āgatā ``diṭṭhadhammikā ca āsavā samparāyikā ca āsavā''ti, katthaci ``tayome, bhikkhave, āsavā. kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo''ti tayo. abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saddhiṃ cattāro. nibbedhikapariyāye ``atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigāminiyā, atthi āsavā pettivisayagāminiyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagāminiyā atthi āsavā devalokagāminiyā''ti evaṃ pañca. chakkanipāte āhuneyyasutte ``atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā''ti evaṃ cha. sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanāpahātabbehi saddhiṃ satta. imasmiṃ pana saṅgītisutte tayo. tattha ``yo kāmesu kāmacchando''ti evaṃ vutto pañcakāmaguṇiko ^a^V3.0156^ea^ rāgo ^b^kāmāsavo^eb^ nāma. ``yo bhavesu bhavacchando''ti evaṃ vutto sassatadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo, bhavavasena vā patthanā ^b^bhavāsavo^eb^ nāma. ``dukkhe aññāṇa''ntiādinā nayena āgatā avijjā ^b^avijjāsavo^eb^ nāmāti. kāmabhavādayo kāmadhātuādivasena vuttāyeva.

[03] kāmesanādīsu ``tattha katamā kāmesanā? yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā''ti evaṃ vutto kāmagavesanarāgo ^b^kāmesanā^eb^ nāma. ``tattha katamā bhavesanā? yo bhavesu ^a^M3.0172^ea^ bhavacchando bhavajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā''ti evaṃ vutto bhavagavesanarāgo ^b^bhavesanā^eb^ nāma. ``tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? sassato lokoti vā...pe0... neva hoti na nahoti tathāgato parammaraṇāti vā, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ vipariyesaggāho ^a^P3.0990^ea^, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā''ti evaṃ vuttā diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa gavesanadiṭṭhi ^b^brahmacariyesanā^eb^ nāma. na kevalañca bhavarāgadiṭṭhiyova, tadekaṭṭhaṃ kammampi esanāyeva. vuttañhetaṃ ``tattha katamā kāmesanā? kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā. tattha katamā bhavesanā? bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā. tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? antaggāhikā diṭṭhi tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā''ti.

[03] vidhāsu ``kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadantī''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.95) ākārasaṇṭhānaṃ vidhā nāma. ``ekavidhena ñāṇavatthu duvidhena ñāṇavatthū''tiādīsu (vibha0 751) koṭṭhāso. ``seyyohamasmīti vidhā''tiādīsu (vibha0 920) māno vidhā nāma. idha so adhippeto. māno hi seyyādivasena vidahanato ^b^vidhā^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^seyyohamasmī^eb^ti iminā seyyasadisahīnānaṃ vasena tayo mānā vuttā. sadisahīnesupi eseva nayo.
[03] ayañhi ^b^māno^eb^ nāma seyyassa tividho, sadisassa tividho, hīnassa tividhoti ^b^navavidho^eb^ hoti. tattha ``seyyassa seyyohamasmī''ti māno rājūnañceva pabbajitānañca uppajjati.

[03] rājā hi raṭṭhena vā dhanavāhanehi vā ``ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti ^a^V3.0157^ea^. pabbajitopi sīladhutaṅgādīhi ``ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. ``seyyassa sadisohamasmī''ti mānopi etesaṃyeva uppajjati. rājā hi raṭṭhena vā dhanavāhanehi vā aññarājūhi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. pabbajitopi sīladhutaṅgādīhipi aññena bhikkhunā mayhaṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. ``seyyassa hīnohamasmī''ti mānopi etesaṃyeva uppajjati. yassa ^a^M3.0173^ea^ hi rañño raṭṭhaṃ vā dhanavāhanādīni vā nātisampannāni honti, so mayhaṃ rājāti vohāramukhamattameva, kiṃ rājā nāma ahanti etaṃ mānaṃ karoti. pabbajitopi appalābhasakkāro ahaṃ dhammakathiko bahussuto mahātheroti kathāmattakameva, kiṃ dhammakathiko nāmāhaṃ kiṃ bahussuto kiṃ mahāthero yassa me lābhasakkāro natthīti ^a^P3.0991^ea^ etaṃ mānaṃ karoti.

[03] ``sadisassa seyyohamasmī''ti mānādayo amaccādīnaṃ uppajjanti. amacco vā hi raṭṭhiyo vā bhogayānavāhanādīhi ko mayā sadiso añño rājapuriso atthīti vā mayhaṃ aññehi saddhiṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇanti vā amaccoti nāmameva mayhaṃ, ghāsacchādanamattampi me natthi, kiṃ amacco nāmāhanti vā ete māne karoti.

[03] ``hīnassa seyyohamasmī''ti mānādayo dāsādīnaṃ uppajjanti. dāso hi mātito vā pitito vā ko mayā sadiso añño dāso nāma atthi, aññe jīvituṃ asakkontā kucchihetu dāsā jātā, ahaṃ pana paveṇīāgatattā seyyoti vā paveṇīāgatabhāvena ubhatosuddhikadāsattena asukadāsena nāma saddhiṃ kiṃ mayhaṃ nānākaraṇanti vā kucchivasenāhaṃ dāsabya upagato, mātāpitukoṭiyā pana me dāsaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, kiṃ dāso nāma ahanti vā ete māne karoti. yathā ca dāso, evaṃ pukkusacaṇḍālādayopi ete māne karontiyeva.
[03] ettha ca seyyassa seyyohamasmīti, ca sadisassa sadisohamasmīti ca hīnassa hīnohamasmīti ca ime tayo mānā yāthāvamānā nāma arahattamaggavajjhā. sesā cha mānā ayāthāvamānā nāma paṭhamamaggavajjhā.

[03] ^b^tayo addhā^eb^ti tayo kālā. ^b^atīto addhā^eb^tiādīsu dvepariyāyā suttantapariyāyo ca abhidhammapariyāyo ca. suttantapariyāyena paṭisandhito pubbe ^b^atīto addhā^eb^ nāma. cutito pacchā ^b^anāgato addhā^eb^ nāma. saha cutipaṭisandhīhi tadantaraṃ ^b^paccuppanno addhā^eb^ nāma. abhidhammapariyāyena tīsu khaṇesu bhaṅgato uddhaṃ ^b^atīto addhā^eb^ nāma. uppādato pubbe ^b^anāgato^eb^ ^a^V3.0158^ea^ ^b^addhā^eb^ nāma. khaṇattaye ^b^paccuppanno addhā^eb^ nāma. atītādibhedo ca nāma ayaṃ dhammānaṃ hoti, na kālassa. atītādibhede ^a^M3.0174^ea^ pana dhamme upādāya idha paramatthato avijjamānopi kālo teneva vohārena vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^tayo antā^eb^ti tayo koṭṭhāsā. ``kāyabandhanassa anto jīratī''tiādīsu (cūḷava0 278) hi antoyeva anto. ``esevanto dukkhassā''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 2.51) parabhāgo anto. ``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikāna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.80) ettha lāmakabhāvo anto. ``sakkāyo kho, āvuso, paṭhamo anto''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 6.61) koṭṭhāso anto. idha koṭṭhāso adhippeto. ^b^sakkāyo^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhā. ^b^sakkāyasamudayo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0992^ea^ tesaṃ nibbattikā purimataṇhā. ^b^sakkāyanirodho^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ appavattibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. maggo pana nirodhādhigamassa upāyattā nirodhe gahite gahitovāti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^dukkhadukkhatā^eb^ti dukkhabhūtā dukkhatā. dukkhavedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^saṅkhāradukkhatā^eb^ti saṅkhārabhāvena dukkhatā. adukkhamasukhāvedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. sā hi saṅkhatattā uppādajarābhaṅgapīḷitā, tasmā aññadukkhasabhāvavirahato saṅkhāradukkhatāti vuttā. ^b^vipariṇāmadukkhatā^eb^ti vipariṇāme dukkhatā. sukhavedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. sukhassa hi vipariṇāme dukkhaṃ uppajjati, tasmā sukhaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāti vuttaṃ. apica ṭhapetvā dukkhavedanaṃ sukhavedanañca sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^micchattaniyato^eb^ti micchāsabhāvo hutvā niyato. niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ ānantariyakammassetaṃ nāmaṃ. sammāsabhāve niyato ^b^sammattaniyato.^eb^ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānametaṃ nāmaṃ. na niyatoti ^b^aniyato.^eb^ avasesānaṃ dhammānametaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] tayo tamāti ``tamandhakāro sammoho avijjogho mahābhayo''ti vacanato avijjā tamo nāma. idha pana avijjāsīsena vicikicchā vuttā. ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti āgamma. ^b^kaṅkhatī^eb^ti kaṅkhaṃ uppādeti. ^b^vicikicchatī^eb^ti vicinanto kicchaṃ āpajjati, sanniṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^nādhimucchatī^eb^ti tattha adhimucchituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^na sampasīdatī^eb^ti taṃ ārabbha pasādaṃ āropetuṃ na sakkoti.

[03] ^b^arakkheyyānī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0159^ea^ ^a^M3.0175^ea^ na rakkhitabbāni. tīsu dvāresu paccekaṃ rakkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi, sabbāni satiyā eva rakkhitānīti dīpeti. ^b^natthi tathāgatassā^eb^ti. ``idaṃ nāma me sahasā uppannaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ, imāhaṃ yathā me paro na jānāti ^a^P3.0993^ea^, tathā rakkhāmi, paṭicchādemī''ti evaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. kiṃ pana sesakhīṇāsavānaṃ kāyasamācārādayo aparisuddhāti? no aparisuddhā. na pana tathāgatassa viya parisuddhā. appassutakhīṇāsavo hi kiñcāpi lokavajjaṃ nāpajjati, paṇṇattiyaṃ pana akovidattā vihārakāraṃ kuṭikāraṃ sahagāraṃ sahaseyyanti evarūpā kāyadvāre āpattiyo āpajjati. sañcarittaṃ padasodhammaṃ uttarichappañcavācaṃ bhūtārocananti evarūpā vacīdvāre āpattiyo āpajjati. upanikkhittasādiyanavasena manodvāre rūpiyappaṭiggāhaṇāpattiṃ āpajjati, dhammasenāpatisadisassāpi hi khīṇāsavassa manodvāre saupārambhavasena manoduccaritaṃ uppajjati eva.

[03] cātumavatthusmiñhi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ paṇāmitakāle tesaṃ atthāya cātumeyyakehi sakyehi bhagavati khamāpite thero bhagavatā ``kinti te sāriputta ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite''ti puṭṭho ahaṃ parisāya abyattabhāvena satthārā paṇāmito. ito dāni paṭṭhāya paraṃ na ovadissāmīti cittaṃ uppādetvā āha ``evaṃ kho me, bhante, ahosi bhagavatā bhikkhusaṅgho paṇāmito, appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharissati, mayampi dāni appossukkā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyuttā viharissāmā''ti.

[03] athassa tasmiṃ manoduccarite upārambhaṃ āropento satthā āha -- ``āgamehi tvaṃ, sāriputta na kho te, sāriputta, punapi evarūpaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabba''nti. evaṃ paraṃ na ovadissāmi nānusāsissāmīti vitakkitamattampi therassa manoduccaritaṃ nāma jātaṃ. bhagavato pana ettakaṃ nāma natthi, anacchariyañcetaṃ. sabbaññutaṃ pattassa duccaritaṃ na bhaveyya. bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa chabbassāni padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassāpi panassa nāhosi. udaracchaviyā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ allīnāya ``kālaṅkato samaṇo gotamo''ti devatānaṃ vimatiyā uppajjamānāyapi ``siddhattha kasmā kilamasi? sakkā bhoge ^a^M3.0176^ea^ ca bhuñjituṃ puññāni ca kātu''nti mārena pāpimatā vuccamānassa ``bhoge bhuñjissāmī''ti vitakkamattampi nuppajjati. atha naṃ māro bodhisattakāle chabbassāni buddhakāle ekaṃ vassaṃ ^a^P3.0994^ea^ anubandhitvā kiñci vajjaṃ apassitvā idaṃ vatvā pakkāmi --
[21] ``sattavassāni ^a^V3.0160^ea^ bhagavantaṃ, anubandhiṃ padāpadaṃ.
[22] otāraṃ nādhigacchissaṃ, sambuddhassa satīmato''ti.. (su0 ni0 448).

[03] apica aṭṭhārasannaṃ buddhadhammānaṃ vasenāpi bhagavato duccaritābhāvo veditabbo. ^b^aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā^eb^ nāma natthi tathāgatassa kāyaduccaritaṃ, natthi vacīduccaritaṃ, natthi manoduccaritaṃ, atīte buddhassa appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, anāgate, paccuppanne buddhassa appaṭihatañāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ, sabbaṃ manokammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti, natthi chandassa hāni, natthi vīriyassa hāni, natthi satiyā hāni, natthi davā, natthi ravā, natthi calitaṃ natthi sahasā, natthi abyāvaṭo mano, natthi akusalacittanti.
[03] ^b^kiñcanā^eb^ti palibodhā. ^b^rāgo kiñcana^eb^nti rāgo uppajjamāno satte bandhati palibundhati tasmā kiñcananti vuccati. itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^aggī^eb^ti anudahanaṭṭhena ^b^aggi. rāgaggī^eb^ti rāgo uppajjamāno satte anudahati jhāpeti, tasmā aggīti vuccati. itaresupi eseva nayo. tattha vatthūni ekā daharabhikkhunī cittalapabbatavihāre uposathāgāraṃ gantvā dvārapālarūpakaṃ olokayamānā ṭhitā. athassā anto rāgo uppanno. sā teneva jhāyitvā kālamakāsi. bhikkhuniyo gacchamānā ``ayaṃ daharā ṭhitā, pakkosatha, na''nti āhaṃsu. ekā gantvā kasmā ṭhitāsīti hatthe gaṇhi. gahitamattā parivattitvā papatā. idaṃ tāva rāgassa anudahanatāya vatthu. dosassa pana anudahanatāya ^b^manopadosikā^eb^ devā. mohassa anudahanatāya ^b^khiḍḍāpadosikā^eb^ devā daṭṭhabbā. mohavasena hi tāsaṃ satisammoso hoti. tasmā khiḍḍāvasena āhārakālaṃ ativattitvā kālaṅkaronti.

[03] ^b^āhuneyyaggī^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M3.0177^ea^ āhunaṃ vuccati sakkāro, āhunaṃ arahantīti ^b^āhuneyyā.^eb^ mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ bahūpakāratāya āhunaṃ ^a^P3.0995^ea^ arahanti. tesu vippaṭipajjamānā puttā nirayādīsu nibbattanti. tasmā kiñcāpi mātāpitaro nānudahanti, anudahanassa pana paccayā honti. iti anudahanaṭṭhena āhuneyyaggīti vuccanti. svāyamattho mittavindakavatthunā dīpetabbo --

[03] mittavindako hi mātarā ``tāta, ajja uposathiko hutvā vihāre sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ ^a^V3.0161^ea^ suṇa, sahassaṃ te dassāmī''ti vutto dhanalobhena uposathaṃ samādāya vihāraṃ gantvā idaṃ ṭhānaṃ akutobhayanti sallakkhetvā dhammāsanassa heṭṭhā nipanno sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā gharaṃ agamāsi. mātā pātova yāguṃ pacitvā upanāmesi. so sahassaṃ gahetvāva pivi. athassa etadahosi -- ``dhanaṃ saṃharissāmī''ti. so nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhanditukāmo ahosi. atha naṃ mātā ``tāta, imasmiṃ kule cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ atthi, alaṃ gamanenā''ti nivāresi. so tassā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā gacchati eva. mātā purato aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ kujjhitvā ``ayaṃ mayhaṃ purato tiṭṭhatī''ti pādena paharitvā patitaṃ antaraṃ katvā agamāsi.

[03] mātā uṭṭhahitvā ``mādisāya mātari evarūpaṃ kammaṃ katvā gatassa te gataṭṭhāne sukhaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃsaññī nāma tvaṃ puttā''ti āha. tassa nāvaṃ āruyha gacchato sattame divase nāvā aṭṭhāsi. atha te manussā ``addhā ettha pāpapuriso atthi salākaṃ dethā''ti āhaṃsu. salākā diyyamānā tasseva tikkhattuṃ pāpuṇāti. te tassa uḷumpaṃ datvā taṃ samudde pakkhipiṃsu. so ekaṃ dīpaṃ gantvā vimānapetīhi saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto tāhi ``purato purato mā agamāsī''ti vuccamānopi taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇaṃ sampattiṃ passanto anupubbena khuracakkadharaṃ ekaṃ addasa. tassa taṃ cakkaṃ padumapupphaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi. so taṃ āha -- ``ambho, idaṃ tayā piḷandhitaṃ padumaṃ mayhaṃ dehī''ti. ``na idaṃ sāmi padumaṃ, khuracakkaṃ eta''nti. so ``vañcesi maṃ, tvaṃ kiṃ mayā padumaṃ adiṭṭhapubba''nti vatvā tvaṃ lohitacandanaṃ vilimpitvā piḷandhanaṃ padumapupphaṃ mayhaṃ na dātukāmoti āha. so cintesi ``ayampi mayā katasadisaṃ kammaṃ katvā tassa phalaṃ ^a^M3.0178^ea^ anubhavitukāmo''ti. atha naṃ ``handa re''ti vatvā tassa matthake cakkaṃ pakkhipi. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``catubbhi ^a^P3.0996^ea^ aṭṭhajjhagamā, aṭṭhāhipi ca soḷasa.
[21] soḷasāhi ca bāttiṃsa, atricchaṃ cakkamāsado.
[03] icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake''ti.. (jā0 1.1.104).

[03] ^b^gahapatī^eb^ti pana gehasāmiko vuccati. so mātugāmassa sayanavatthālaṅkārādianuppadānena bahūpakāro. taṃ aticaranto mātugāmo nirayādīsu nibbattati, tasmā sopi purimanayeneva anudahanaṭṭhena gahapataggīti vutto.

[03] tattha vatthu -- kassapabuddhassa kāle sotāpannassa upāsakassa bhariyā aticārinī ahosi ^a^V3.0162^ea^. so taṃ paccakkhato disvā ``kasmā tvaṃ evaṃ karosī''ti āha. sā ``sacāhaṃ evarūpaṃ karomi, ayaṃ me sunakho viluppamāno khādatū''ti vatvā kālaṅkatvā kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahe vemānikapetī hutvā nibbattā. divā sampattiṃ anubhavati, rattiṃ dukkhaṃ. tadā bārāṇasīrājā migavaṃ caranto araññaṃ pavisitvā anupubbena kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahaṃ sampatto tāya saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavati. sā taṃ vañcetvā rattiṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavati. so ñatvā ``kattha nu kho gacchatī''ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gantvā avidūre ṭhito kaṇṇamuṇḍakadahato nikkhamitvā taṃ ``paṭapaṭa''nti khādamānaṃ ekaṃ sunakhaṃ disvā asinā dvidhā chindi. dve ahesuṃ. puna chinne cattāro. puna chinne aṭṭha. puna chinne soḷasa ahesuṃ. sā ``kiṃ karosi sāmī''ti āha. so ``kiṃ ida''nti āha. sā ``evaṃ akatvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ bhūmiyaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā pādena ghaṃsāhī''ti āha. so tathā akāsi. sunakhā antaradhāyiṃsu. taṃ divasaṃ tassā kammaṃ khīṇaṃ. rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā gantuṃ āraddho. sā ``mayhaṃ, sāmi, kammaṃ khīṇaṃ mā agamā''ti āha. rājā asutvāva gato.

[03] ^b^dakkhiṇeyyaggī^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^dakkhiṇā^eb^ti cattāro paccayā, bhikkhusaṅgho dakkhiṇeyyo. so gihīnaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu sīlesu dasasu sīlesu mātāpitūpaṭṭhāne dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaupaṭṭhāneti evamādīsu kalyāṇadhammesu niyojanena bahūpakāro, tasmiṃ micchāpaṭipannā gihī bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ^a^M3.0179^ea^ akkositvā paribhāsitvā nirayādīsu nibbattanti, tasmā sopi purimanayeneva anudahanaṭṭhena dakkhiṇeyyaggīti ^a^P3.0997^ea^ vutto. imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ vimānavatthusmiṃ revatīvatthu vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] ``tividhena rūpasaṅgaho''ti ettha ^b^tividhenā^eb^ti tīhi koṭṭhāsehi. ^b^saṅgaho^eb^ti jātisañjātikiriyagaṇanavasena catubbidho saṅgaho. tattha sabbe khattiyā āgacchantūtiādiko (ma0 ni0 1.462) jātisaṅgaho. sabbe kosalakātiādiko sañjātisaṅgaho. sabbe hatthārohātiādiko kiriyasaṅgaho. cakkhāyatanaṃ katamaṃ khandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti? cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti. hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitanti ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho, so idha adhippeto. tasmā tividhena rūpasaṅgahoti tīhi koṭṭhāsehi rūpagaṇanāti attho.

[03] ^b^sanidassanā^eb^dīsu attānaṃ ārabbha pavattena cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātena saha nidassanenāti ^b^sanidassanaṃ.^eb^ cakkhupaṭihananasamatthato saha paṭighenāti ^b^sappaṭighaṃ.^eb^ taṃ atthato rūpāyatanameva. cakkhuviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nāssa nidassananti ^b^anidassanaṃ.^eb^ sotādipaṭihananasamatthato saha paṭighenāti ^a^V3.0163^ea^ ^b^sappaṭighaṃ.^eb^ taṃ atthato cakkhāyatanādīni nava āyatanāni. vuttappakāraṃ nāssa nidassananti ^b^anidassanaṃ.^eb^ nāssa paṭighoti ^b^appaṭighaṃ.^eb^ taṃ atthato ṭhapetvā dasāyatanāni avasesaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ.
[03] ^b^tayo saṅkhārā^eb^ti sahajātadhamme ceva samparāye phaladhamme ca saṅkharonti rāsī karontīti saṅkhārā. abhisaṅkharotīti abhisaṅkhāro. puñño abhisaṅkhāro ^b^puññābhisaṅkhāro.^eb^

[03] ``tattha katamo puññābhisaṅkhāro? kusalā cetanā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā dānamayā sīlamayā bhāvanāmayā''ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalamahācittacetanānaṃ, pañcannaṃ rūpāvacarakusalacetanānañcetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ettha ca dānasīlamayā aṭṭheva cetanā honti. bhāvanāmayā terasāpi. yathā hi paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ sajjhāyamāno ekaṃ dve anusandhiṃ gatopi na jānāti, pacchā āvajjanto jānāti, evameva kasiṇaparikammaṃ ^a^M3.0180^ea^ karontassa paguṇajjhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa ñāṇavippayuttāpi bhāvanā hoti. tena vuttaṃ ``bhāvanāmayā terasāpī''ti.

[03] tattha dānamayādīsu ``dānaṃ ārabbha dānamadhikicca yā uppajjati ^a^P3.0998^ea^ cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati dānamayo puññābhisaṅkhāro. sīlaṃ ārabbha, bhāvanaṃ ārabbha, bhāvanamadhikicca yā uppajjati cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhāvanāmayo puññābhisaṅkhāro''ti ayaṃ saṅkhepadesanā.

[03] cīvarādīsu pana catūsu paccayesu rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu annādīsu vā dasasu dānavatthūsu taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge, pariccāgakāle, pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā dānamayā nāma. sīlapūraṇatthāya pana pabbajissāmīti vihāraṃ gacchantassa, pabbajantassa manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā pabbajito vatamhi sādhu sādhūti āvajjantassa, pātimokkhaṃ saṃvarantassa, cīvarādayo paccaye paccavekkhantassa, āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa, ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā sīlamayā nāma.

[03] paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena ``cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa...pe0... manaṃ. rūpe. dhamme. cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... manoviññāṇaṃ. cakkhusamphassaṃ...pe0... manosamphassaṃ. cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ...pe0... manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ. rūpasaññaṃ ^a^V3.0164^ea^, jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā bhāvanāmayā nāmā''ti ayaṃ vitthārakathā.

[03] apuñño ca so abhisaṅkhāro cāti ^b^apuññābhisaṅkhāro. ^eb^ dvādasākusalacittasampayuttānaṃ cetanānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vuttampi cetaṃ ``tattha katamo apuññābhisaṅkhāro? akusalacetanā kāmāvacarā, ayaṃ vuccati apuññābhisaṅkhāro''ti. āneñjaṃ niccalaṃ santaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ arūpameva abhisaṅkharotīti ^b^āneñjābhisaṅkhāro. ^eb^ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarakusalacetanānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. yathāha ``tattha katamo āneñjābhisaṅkhāro? kusalacetanā arūpāvacarā, ayaṃ vuccati āneñjābhisaṅkhāro''ti.

[03] ^b^puggalattike^eb^ ^a^M3.0181^ea^ sattavidho purisapuggalo, tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti ^b^sekkho.^eb^ khīṇāsavo sikkhitasikkhattā puna na sikkhissatīti ^b^asekkho.^eb^ puthujjano sikkhāhi paribāhiyattā ^b^nevasekkho nāsekkho.^eb^

[03] therattike ^a^P3.0999^ea^ jātimahallako gihī ^b^jātitthero^eb^ nāma. ``cattārome, bhikkhave, therakaraṇā dhammā. idha, bhikkhave, thero sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ lābhī hoti, āsavānaṃ khayā bahussuto hoti, catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ lābhī hoti, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro therakaraṇā dhammā''ti (a0 ni0 4.22). evaṃ vuttesu dhammesu ekena vā anekehi vā samannāgato ^b^dhammathero^eb^ nāma. aññataro theranāmako bhikkhūti evaṃ theranāmako vā, yaṃ vā pana mahallakakāle pabbajitaṃ sāmaṇerādayo disvā thero theroti vadanti, ayaṃ ^b^sammutithero^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^puññakiriyavatthūsu^eb^ dānameva ^b^dānamayaṃ.^eb^ puññakiriyā ca sā tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthu cāti ^b^puññakiriyavatthu.^eb^ itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. atthato pana pubbe vuttadānamayacetanādivaseneva saddhiṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgacetanāhi imāni tīṇi puññakiriyavatthūni veditabbāni. ekamekañcettha pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya kāyena karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti. tadatthaṃ vācaṃ nicchārentassa vacīkammaṃ. kāyaṅgavācaṅgaṃ acopetvā manasā cintentassa manokammaṃ. annādīni dentassa cāpi annadānādīni demīti vā dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā ^a^V3.0165^ea^ vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ. khayato vayato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.

[01] aparānipi satta puññakiriyavatthūni apacitisahagataṃ puññakiriyavatthu, veyyāvaccasahagataṃ, pattānuppadānaṃ, pattabbhanumodanaṃ, desanāmayaṃ, savanamayaṃ, diṭṭhijugataṃ puññakiriyavatthūti. tattha mahallakaṃ disvā paccuggamanapattacīvarappaṭiggahaṇābhivādanamaggasampadānādivasena apacitisahagataṃ veditabbaṃ. vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattappaṭipattikaraṇavasena, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena, ``gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ āharā''ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca veyyāvaccasahagataṃ ^a^M3.0182^ea^ veditabbaṃ. cattāro paccaye datvā sabbasattānaṃ patti hotūti pavattanavasena pattānuppadānaṃ veditabbaṃ. parehi dinnāya pattiyā sādhu suṭṭhūti anumodanāvasena ^a^P3.1000^ea^ pattabbhanumodanaṃ veditabbaṃ. eko ``evaṃ maṃ `dhammakathiko'ti jānissantī''ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhagaruko hutvā deseti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. eko attano paguṇadhammaṃ apaccāsīsamāno paresaṃ deseti, idaṃ desanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma. eko suṇanto ``iti maṃ `saddho'ti jānissantī''ti suṇāti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. eko ``evaṃ me mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī''ti hitappharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ savanamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu. diṭṭhijugataṃ pana sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇaṃ. yaṃkiñci puññaṃ karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā ujubhāveneva mahapphalaṃ hoti.

[03] iti imesaṃ sattannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ purimeheva tīhi saṅgaho veditabbo. ettha hi apacitiveyyāvaccāni sīlamaye. pattidānapattabbhanumodanāni dānamaye. desanāsavanāni bhāvanāmaye. diṭṭhijugataṃ tīsupi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.

[03] ^b^codanāvatthūnī^eb^ti codanākāraṇāni. ^b^diṭṭhenā^eb^ti maṃsacakkhunā vā dibbacakkhunā vā vītikkamaṃ disvā codeti. ^b^sutenā^eb^ti pakatisotena vā dibbasotena vā parassa saddaṃ sutvā codeti. ^b^parisaṅkāya vā^eb^ti diṭṭhaparisaṅkitena vā sutaparisaṅkitena vā mutaparisaṅkitena vā codeti. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] ^b^kāmūpapattiyo^eb^ti kāmūpasevanā kāmappaṭilābhā vā. ^b^paccupaṭṭhitakāmā^eb^ti nibaddhakāmā nibaddhārammaṇā. ^b^seyyathāpi manussā^eb^ti yathā manussā. manussā hi nibaddheyeva vatthusmiṃ vasaṃ vattenti ^a^V3.0166^ea^. yattha paṭibaddhacittā honti, satampi sahassampi datvā mātugāmaṃ ānetvā nibaddhabhogaṃ bhuñjanti. ^b^ekacce devā^eb^ nāma catudevalokavāsino. tepi nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti. ^b^ekacce vinipātikā^eb^ nāma nerayike ṭhapetvā avasesā macchakacchapādayopi hi nibaddhavatthusmiṃyeva vasaṃ vattenti. maccho attano macchiyā kacchapo kacchapiyāti ^a^M3.0183^ea^. ^b^nimminitvā nimminitvā^eb^ti nīlapītādivasena yādisaṃ yādisaṃ attano ^a^P3.1001^ea^ rūpaṃ icchanti, tādisaṃ tādisaṃ nimminitvā āyasmato anuruddhassa purato manāpakāyikā devatā viya. ^b^nimmānaratī^eb^ti evaṃ sayaṃ nimmite nimmite nimmāne rati etesanti nimmānaratī. ^b^paranimmitakāmā^eb^ti parehi nimmitakāmā. tesañhi manaṃ ñatvā pare yathārucitaṃ kāmabhogaṃ nimminanti, te tattha vasaṃ vattenti. kathaṃ parassa manaṃ jānantīti? pakatisevanavasena. yathā hi kusalo sūdo rañño bhuñjantassa yaṃ yaṃ so bahuṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ taṃ tassa ruccatīti jānāti, evaṃ pakatiyā abhirucitārammaṇaṃ ñatvā tādisakaṃyeva nimminanti. te tattha vasaṃ vattenti, methunaṃ sevanti. keci pana therā ``hasitamattena olokitamattena āliṅgitamattena ca tesaṃ kāmakiccaṃ ijjhatī''ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``etaṃ pana natthī''ti paṭikkhittaṃ. na hi kāyena aphusantassa phoṭṭhabbaṃ kāmakiccaṃ sādheti. channampi hi kāmāvacarānaṃ kāmā pākatikā eva. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``cha ete kāmāvacarā, sabbakāmasamiddhino.
[22] sabbesaṃ ekasaṅkhātaṃ, āyu bhavati kittaka''nti.. (vibha0 1023).

[03] ^b^sukhūpapattiyo^eb^ti sukhappaṭilābhā. ^b^uppādetvā uppādetvā sukhaṃ viharantī^eb^ti te heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhānasukhaṃ nibbattetvā upari vipākajjhānasukhaṃ anubhavantīti attho. ^b^sukhena abhisannā^eb^ti dutiyajjhānasukhena tintā. ^b^parisannā^eb^ti samantato tintā. ^b^paripūrā^eb^ti paripuṇṇā. ^b^paripphuṭā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. idampi vipākajjhānasukhameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^ahosukhaṃ ahosukha^eb^nti tesaṃ kira bhavalobho mahā uppajjati. tasmā kadāci karahaci evaṃ udānaṃ udānenti. ^b^santamevā^eb^ti paṇītameva. ^b^tusitā^eb^ti tato uttariṃ sukhassa apatthanato santuṭṭhā hutvā. ^b^sukhaṃ paṭivedentī^eb^ti tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ anubhavanti.
[03] ^b^sekkhā paññā^eb^ti satta ariyapaññā. arahato paññā ^b^asekkhā.^eb^ avasesā paññā ^b^nevasekkhānāsekkhā.^eb^

[03] ^b^cintāmayā^eb^dīsu ^a^V3.0167^ea^ ^a^M3.0184^ea^ ^a^P3.1002^ea^ ayaṃ vitthāro -- ``tattha katamā cintāmayā paññā? yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭṭhānesu kammassakataṃ vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti vā...pe0... viññāṇaṃ aniccanti vā yaṃ evarūpaṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ diṭṭhiṃ ruciṃ muttiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ parato asutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ vuccati ^b^cintāmayā paññā.^eb^ tattha katamā sutamayā paññā? yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu...pe0... dhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ parato sutvā paṭilabhati, ayaṃ vuccati ^b^sutamayā paññā.^eb^ (tattha katamā bhāvanāmayā paññā?) sabbāpi samāpannassa paññā ^b^bhāvanāmayā paññā^eb^''ti (vibha0 768-69).

[03] ^b^sutāvudha^eb^nti sutameva āvudhaṃ. taṃ atthato tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. tañhi nissāya bhikkhu paññāvudhaṃ nissāya sūro yodho avikampamāno mahākantāraṃ viya saṃsārakantāraṃ atikkamati avihaññamāno. teneva vuttaṃ -- ``sutāvudho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī''ti (a0 ni0 7.67).

[03] ^b^pavivekāvudha^eb^nti ``kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhiviveko''ti ayaṃ tividhopi vivekova āvudhaṃ. tassa nānākaraṇaṃ kāyaviveko vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ. cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ. upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ. imasmiñhi tividhe viveke abhirato, na kutoci bhāyati. tasmā ayampi avassayaṭṭhena āvudhanti vutto. lokiyalokuttarapaññāva āvudhaṃ ^b^paññāvudhaṃ.^eb^ yassa sā atthi, so na kutoci bhāyati, na cassa koci bhāyati. tasmā sāpi avassayaṭṭheneva āvudhanti vuttā.

[03] ^b^anaññātaññassāmītindriya^eb^nti ito pubbe anaññātaṃ aviditaṃ dhammaṃ jānissāmīti paṭipannassa uppannaṃ indriyaṃ. sotāpattimaggañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^aññindriya^eb^nti aññābhūtaṃ ājānanabhūtaṃ indriyaṃ. sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^aññātāvindriya^eb^nti aññātāvīsu jānanakiccapariyosānappattesu dhammesu indriyaṃ. arahattaphalañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^maṃsacakkhu^eb^ ^a^M3.0185^ea^ ^a^P3.1003^ea^ cakkhupasādo. ^b^dibbacakkhu^eb^ ālokanissitaṃ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^paññācakkhu^eb^ lokiyalokuttarapaññā.

[03] ^b^adhisīlasikkhā^eb^dīsu ^a^V3.0168^ea^ adhisīlañca taṃ sikkhitabbato sikkhā cāti ^b^adhisīlasikkhā.^eb^ itarasmiṃ dvayepi eseva nayo. tattha sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ, cittaṃ adhicittaṃ, paññā adhipaññāti ayaṃ pabhedo veditabbo --

[03] ^b^sīlaṃ^eb^ nāma pañcasīladasasīlāni, pātimokkhasaṃvaro ^b^adhisīlaṃ^eb^ nāma. aṭṭha samāpattiyo cittaṃ, vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ ^b^adhicittaṃ.^eb^ kammassakatañāṇaṃ paññā, vipassanāpaññā ^b^adhipaññā.^eb^ anuppannepi hi buddhuppāde pavattatīti pañcasīladasasīlāni sīlameva, pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ buddhuppādeyeva pavattatīti adhisīlaṃ. cittapaññāsupi eseva nayo. apica nibbānaṃ patthayantena samādinnaṃ pañcasīlampi dasasīlampi adhisīlameva. samāpannā aṭṭha samāpattiyopi adhicittameva. sabbaṃ vā lokiyaṃ sīlameva, lokuttaraṃ adhisīlaṃ. cittapaññāsupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^bhāvanāsu^eb^ khīṇāsavassa pañcadvārikakāyo ^b^kāyabhāvanā^eb^ nāma. aṭṭha samāpattiyo ^b^cittabhāvanā^eb^ nāma. arahattaphalapaññā ^b^paññābhāvanā^eb^ nāma. khīṇāsavassa hi ekanteneva pañcadvārikakāyo subhāvito hoti. aṭṭha samāpattiyo cassa na aññesaṃ viya dubbalā, tasseva ca paññā bhāvitā nāma hoti paññāvepullapattiyā. tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^anuttariyesu^eb^ vipassanā ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ^eb^ maggo ^b^paṭipadānussariyaṃ.^eb^ phalaṃ ^b^vimuttānuttariyaṃ.^eb^ phalaṃ vā dassanānuttariyaṃ. maggo paṭipadānuttariyaṃ. nibbānaṃ vimuttānuttariyaṃ. nibbānaṃ vā dassanānuttariyaṃ, tato uttariñhi daṭṭhabbaṃ nāma natthi. maggo paṭipadānuttariyaṃ. phalaṃ vimuttānuttariyaṃ. ^b^anuttariya^eb^nti uttamaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ.
[03] ^b^samādhīsu^eb^ paṭhamajjhānasamādhi ^b^savitakkasavicāro.^eb^ pañcakanayena dutiyajjhānasamādhi ^b^avitakkavicāramatto.^eb^ seso ^b^avitakkāvicāro.^eb^

[03] ^b^suññatā^eb^dīsu tividhā kathā āgamanato, saguṇato, ārammaṇatoti. āgamanato nāma eko bhikkhu anattato abhinivisitvā anattato disvā anattato vuṭṭhāti, tassa vipassanā ^b^suññatā^eb^ nāma hoti. kasmā? asuññatattakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ ^a^P3.1004^ea^ abhāvā. vipassanāgamanena ^a^M3.0186^ea^ maggasamādhi suññato nāma hoti. maggāgamanena phalasamādhi suññato nāma. aparo aniccato abhinivisitvā aniccato disvā aniccato vuṭṭhāti. tassa vipassanā animittā ^a^V3.0169^ea^ nāma hoti. kasmā? nimittakārakakilesābhāvā. vipassanāgamanena maggasamādhi ^b^animitto^eb^ nāma hoti. maggāgamanena phalaṃ animittaṃ nāma. aparo dukkhato abhinivisitvā dukkhato disvā dukkhato vuṭṭhāti, tassa vipassanā ^b^appaṇihitā^eb^ nāma hoti. kasmā? paṇidhikārakakilesābhāvā. vipassanāgamanena maggasamādhi appaṇihito nāma. maggāgamanena phalaṃ appaṇihitaṃ nāmāti ayaṃ ^b^āgamanato^eb^ kathā. maggasamādhi pana rāgādīhi suññatattā suññato, rāganimittādīnaṃ abhāvā animitto, rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvā appaṇihitoti ayaṃ ^b^saguṇato^eb^ kathā. nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi suññatattā rāgādinimittapaṇidhīnañca abhāvā suññatañceva animittañca appaṇihitañca. tadārammaṇo maggasamādhi suññato animitto appaṇihito. ayaṃ ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ kathā.

[03] ^b^soceyyānī^eb^ti sucibhāvakarā soceyyappaṭipadā dhammā. vitthāro panettha ``tattha katamaṃ ^b^kāyasoceyyaṃ?^eb^ pāṇātipātā veramaṇī''tiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vasena veditabbo.

[03] ^b^moneyyānī^eb^ti munibhāvakarā moneyyappaṭipadā dhammā. tesaṃ vitthāro ``tattha katamaṃ ^b^kāyamoneyyaṃ?^eb^ tividhakāyaduccaritassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyapariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasmiṃ chandarāgappahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāranirodhā catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ. tattha katamaṃ ^b^vacīmoneyyaṃ? ^eb^ catubbidhavacīduccaritassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ, vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ vācāpariññā vacīmoneyyaṃ pariññāsahagato maggo, vācāya chandarāgappahānaṃ, vacīsaṅkhāranirodhā dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyaṃ. tattha katamaṃ ^b^manomoneyyaṃ?^eb^ tividhamanoduccaritassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ ^a^P3.1005^ea^, tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ manomoneyyaṃ, manopariññā manomoneyyaṃ. pariññāsahagato maggo, manasmiṃ chandarāgappahānaṃ ^a^M3.0187^ea^, cittasaṅkhāranirodhā saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyya''nti (mahāni0 14).
[03] kosallesu ^b^āyo^eb^ti vuḍḍhi. ^b^apāyo^eb^ti avuḍḍhi. tassa tassa kāraṇaṃ ^b^upāyo.^eb^ tesaṃ pajānanā kosallaṃ. vitthāro pana vibhaṅge vuttoyeva.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ -- ``tattha katamaṃ āyakosallaṃ? ime dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva akusalā ^a^V3.0170^ea^ dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā nirujjhanti. ime vā pana me dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattantīti, yā tattha paññā pajānanā...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi. idaṃ vuccati āyakosallaṃ. tattha katamaṃ apāyakosallaṃ? ime dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā na uppajjanti, uppannā ca kusalā dhammā nirujjhanti. ime vā pana me dhamme manasikaroto anuppannā ceva akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā ca akusalā dhammā bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattantīti, yā tattha paññā pajānanā...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi. idaṃ vuccati apāyakosallaṃ. sabbāpi tatrupāyā paññā upāyakosalla''nti (vibha0 771). idaṃ pana accāyikakicce vā bhaye vā uppanne tassa tikicchanatthaṃ ṭhānuppattiyā kāraṇajānanavaseneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^madā^eb^ti majjanākāravasena pavattamānā. tesu ``ahaṃ nirogo saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni atikkantāni, na me harītakīkhaṇḍampi khāditapubbaṃ, ime panaññe asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ rujjati, bhesajjaṃ khādāmāti vicaranti, ko añño mādiso nirogo nāmā''ti evaṃ mānakaraṇaṃ ^b^ārogyamado.^eb^ ``mahallakakāle puññaṃ karissāma, daharamha tāvā''ti yobbane ṭhatvā mānakaraṇaṃ ^b^yobbanamado.^eb^ ``ciraṃ jīviṃ, ciraṃ jīvāmi, ciraṃ jīvissāmi; sukhaṃ jīviṃ, sukhaṃ jīvāmi, sukhaṃ jīvissāmī''ti evaṃ mānakaraṇaṃ ^b^jīvitamado.^eb^

[03] ^b^ādhipateyyesu^eb^ adhipatito āgataṃ ādhipateyyaṃ. ``ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā, na me etaṃ patirūpa''nti evaṃ attānaṃ adhipattiṃ ^a^M3.0188^ea^ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ ^a^P3.1006^ea^ ^b^attādhipateyyaṃ^eb^ nāma. lokaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā akaraṇaṃ ^b^lokādhipateyyaṃ^eb^ nāma. lokuttaradhammaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā akaraṇaṃ ^b^dhammādhipateyyaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^kathāvatthūnī^eb^ti kathākāraṇāni. ^b^atītaṃ vā addhāna^eb^nti atītaṃ dhammaṃ, atītakkhandheti attho. apica ``yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ, `ahosī'ti tassa saṅkhā, `ahosī'ti tassa paññatti `ahosī'ti tassa samaññā, na tassa saṅkhā `atthī'ti, na tassa saṅkhā `bhavissatī'ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.62) evaṃ āgatena niruttipathasuttenapettha attho dīpetabbo.

[03] ^b^vijjā^eb^ti tamavijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā. viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā. pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇañhi ^a^V3.0171^ea^ uppajjamānaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ chādetvā ṭhitaṃ tamaṃ vijjhati, pubbenivāsañca viditaṃ karotīti vijjā. cutūpapātañāṇaṃ cutipaṭisandhicchādakaṃ tamaṃ vijjhati, tañca viditaṃ karotīti vijjā. āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ catusaccacchādakaṃ tamaṃ vijjhati, catusaccadhammañca viditaṃ karotīti vijjā.
[03] ^b^vihāresu^eb^ aṭṭha samāpattiyo ^b^dibbo vihāro.^eb^ catasso appamaññā ^b^brahmā vihāro.^eb^ phalasamāpatti ^b^ariyo vihāro.^eb^
[03] pāṭihāriyāni kevaṭṭasutte vitthāritāneva.
[03] ``ime kho, āvuso''tiādīsu vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti samasaṭṭhiyā tikānaṃ vasena asītisatapañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] tikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 306^b^.^eb^ iti tikavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni catukkavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ``satipaṭṭhānacatukkaṃ'' pubbe vitthāritameva.

[03] sammappadhānacatukke ^a^M3.0189^ea^ ^b^chandaṃ janetī^eb^ti ``yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā kusalo dhammacchando''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ kattukamyataṃ janeti. ^b^vāyamatī^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ karoti. ^b^vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti vīriyaṃ janeti. ^b^cittaṃ paggaṇhātī^eb^ti cittaṃ upatthambheti. ayamettha saṅkhepo ^a^P3.1007^ea^. vitthāro pana sammappadhānavibhaṅge āgatoyeva.

[03] iddhipādesu chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi ^b^chandasamādhi. ^eb^ padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā ^b^padhānasaṅkhārā. samannāgata^eb^nti tehi dhammehi upetaṃ. iddhiyā pādaṃ, iddhibhūtaṃ vā pādanti ^b^iddhipādaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0172^ea^. sesesupi eseva nayo. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana iddhipādavibhaṅge āgato eva. visuddhimagge panassa attho dīpito. jhānakathāpi visuddhimagge vitthāritāva.
[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāyā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhavihāratthāya. idha phalasamāpattijhānāni, khīṇāsavassa aparabhāge nibbattitajhānāni ca kathitāni.

[03] ^b^ālokasaññaṃ manasikarotī^eb^ti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyacandapajjotamaṇiādīnaṃ ālokaṃ ālokoti manasikaroti. ^b^divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti evaṃ manasi katvā divātisaññaṃ ṭhapeti. ^b^yathā divā tathā ratti^eb^nti yathā divā diṭṭho āloko, tatheva taṃ rattiṃ manasikaroti. ^b^yathā rattiṃ tathā divā^eb^ti yathā rattiṃ āloko diṭṭho, evameva divā manasikaroti. ^b^iti vivaṭena cetasā^eb^ti evaṃ apihitena cittena. ^b^apariyonaddhenā^eb^ti samantato anaddhena. ^b^sappabhāsa^eb^nti saobhāsaṃ. ^b^ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhatthāya. iminā kiṃ kathitaṃ? middhavinodanāaloko kathito parikammāaloko vā. iminā kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? khīṇāsavassa dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ. tasmiṃ vā āgatepi anāgatepi pādakajjhānasamāpattimeva sandhāya ``sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvetī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^satisampajaññāyā^eb^ti sattaṭṭhānikassa satisampajaññassa atthāya. ^b^viditā vedanā uppajjantī^eb^tiādīsu khīṇāsavassa vatthu viditaṃ hoti ārammaṇaṃ viditaṃ vatthārammaṇaṃ viditaṃ. vatthārammaṇaviditatāya evaṃ vedanā uppajjanti, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ nirujjhanti. na kevalañca vedanā eva idha vuttā ^a^P3.1008^ea^ saññādayopi ^a^M3.0190^ea^, avuttā cetanādayopi, viditā ca uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca nirujjhanti ca. api ca vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti, upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo, taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayo, phassasamudayā vedanāyasamudayo. nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa samudayaṃ passati. evaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti. kathaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti? aniccato manasikaroto khayatūpaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. dukkhato manasikaroto bhayatūpaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. anattato manasikaroto suññatūpaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. evaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, khayato bhayato suññato jānāti. kathaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo vidito hoti? avijjānirodhā vedanānirodho....pe0... evaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo vidito hoti. imināpi nayenettha attho veditabbo.
[03] ^b^iti^eb^ ^a^V3.0173^ea^ ^b^rūpa^eb^ntiādi vuttanayameva. ^b^ayaṃ āvuso samādhibhāvanā^eb^ti ayaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇassa pādakajjhānasamādhibhāvanā.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ^b^appamaññā^eb^ti pamāṇaṃ agahetvā anavasesapharaṇavasena appamaññāva. anupadavaṇṇanā pana bhāvanāsamādhividhānañca etāsaṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva. arūpakathāpi visuddhimagge vitthāritāva.

[03] ^b^apassenānī^eb^ti apassayāni. ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti ñāṇena ñatvā. ^b^paṭisevatī^eb^ti ñāṇena ñatvā sevitabbayuttakameva sevati. tassa ca vitthāro ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī''tiādinā nayena veditabbo. ^b^saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāsetī^eb^ti ñāṇena ñatvā adhivāsetabbayuttakameva adhivāseti. vitthāro panettha ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso khamo hoti sītassā''tiādinā nayena veditabbo. ^b^parivajjetī^eb^ti ñāṇena ñatvā parivajjetuṃ yuttameva parivajjeti. tassa vitthāro ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī''tiādinā nayena veditabbo. ^b^vinodetī^eb^ti ñāṇena ñatvā vinodetabbameva vinodeti, nudati nīharati anto pavisituṃ na deti. tassa vitthāro ``uppannaṃ ^a^P3.1009^ea^ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī''tiādinā nayena veditabbo.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0191^ea^ ariyānaṃ vaṃsā. yathā hi khattiyavaṃso, brāhmaṇavaṃso, vessavaṃso, suddavaṃso, samaṇavaṃso, kulavaṃso, rājavaṃso, evaṃ ayampi aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso ariyatanti ariyapaveṇī nāma hoti. so kho panāyaṃ ariyavaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ kāḷānusāritagandhādayo viya aggamakkhāyati. ke pana te ariyā yesaṃ ete vaṃsāti? ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca, etesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ^b^ariyavaṃsā.^eb^ ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā uppannā, te ariyā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno...pe0... imasmiṃ kappe kakusandho, koṇāgamano, kassapo, amhākaṃ bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā. tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. apica atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. te kho ^a^V3.0174^ea^ panete ^b^aggaññā^eb^ aggāti jānitabbā. ^b^rattaññā^eb^ dīgharattaṃ pavattāti jānitabbā. ^b^vaṃsaññā^eb^ vaṃsāti jānitabbā.

[03] ^b^porāṇā^eb^ti na adhunuppattikā. ^b^asaṃkiṇṇā^eb^ avikiṇṇā anapanītā. ^b^asaṃkiṇṇapubbā^eb^ atītabuddhehi na saṃkiṇṇapubbā. ``kiṃ imehī''ti na apanītapubbā? ^b^na saṅkīyantī^eb^ti idānipi na apanīyanti. ^b^na saṅkīyissantī^eb^ti anāgatabuddhehipi na apanīyissanti, ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi appaṭikuṭṭhā, samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi aninditā agarahitā.

[03] ^b^santuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho hoti. ^b^itarītarena cīvarenā^eb^ti thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ yena kenaci. atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho. cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā -- yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti. piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. tesaṃ vitthārakathā sāmaññaphale vuttanayeneva veditabbā. ime tayo santose sandhāya ``santuṭṭho hoti, itarītarena yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭho hotī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha ^a^M3.0192^ea^ ^a^P3.1010^ea^ ca cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarasantoso jānitabbo, cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni. tattha ^b^cīvaraṃ jānitabba^eb^nti khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni jānitabbāni. imāni dvādasa kappiyacīvarāni. kusacīraṃ vākacīraṃ phalakacīraṃ kesakambalaṃ vāḷakambalaṃ potthako cammaṃ ulūkapakkhaṃ rukkhadussaṃ latādussaṃ erakadussaṃ kadalidussaṃ veḷudussanti evamādīni pana akappiyacīvarāni. ^b^cīvarakkhetta^eb^nti ``saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vā''ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni, aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena ^b^aṭṭha khettāni^eb^ jānitabbāni. ^b^paṃsukūla^eb^nti sosānikaṃ, pāpaṇikaṃ, rathiyaṃ saṅkārakūṭakaṃ, sotthiyaṃ, sinānaṃ, titthaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ, aggidaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ upacikakhāyitaṃ, undūrakhāyitaṃ, antacchinnaṃ, dasācchinnaṃ, dhajāhaṭaṃ, thūpaṃ, samaṇacīvaraṃ, sāmuddiyaṃ, ābhisekiyaṃ, panthikaṃ, vātāhaṭaṃ, iddhimayaṃ, devadattiyanti tevīsati paṃsukūlāni veditabbāni.

[03] ettha ca ^b^sotthiya^eb^nti gabbhamalaharaṇaṃ. ^b^gatapaccāgata^eb^nti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ. ^b^dhajāhaṭa^eb^nti dhajaṃ ussāpetvā tato ānītaṃ. ^b^thūpa^eb^nti vammike pūjitacīvaraṃ ^a^V3.0175^ea^. ^b^sāmuddiya^eb^nti samuddavīcīhi thalaṃ pāpitaṃ. ^b^panthika^eb^nti panthaṃ gacchantehi corabhayena pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ. ^b^iddhimaya^eb^nti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] ^b^cīvarasantoso^eb^ti vīsati cīvarasantosā, vitakkasantoso, gamanasantoso, pariyesanasantoso, paṭilābhasantoso, mattappaṭiggahaṇasantoso, loluppavivajjanasantoso, yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantoso, udakasantoso, dhovanasantoso, karaṇasantoso, parimāṇasantoso, suttasantoso, sibbanasantoso, rajanasantoso, kappasantoso, paribhogasantoso, sannidhiparivajjanasantoso, vissajjanasantosoti.

[03] tattha sādakabhikkhunā temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati. so hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti. paṃsukūliko ^a^M3.0193^ea^ aḍḍhamāseneva karoti. iti māsaḍḍhamāsamattaṃ vitakkanaṃ vitakkasantoso. vitakkasantosena pana santuṭṭhena bhikkhunā pācīnakkhaṇḍarājivāsikapaṃsukūlikattherasadisena ^a^P3.1011^ea^ bhavitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^thero^eb^ kira cetiyapabbatavihāre cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti āgato cetiyaṃ vanditvā cintesi ``mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne labhissāmī''ti. so mahāvihāraṃ gantvā saṅghattheraṃ disvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā tattha vuttho punadivase cīvaraṃ ādāya āgantvā theraṃ vandi. thero kiṃ āvusoti āha. gāmadvāraṃ, bhante, gamissāmīti. ahampāvuso, gamissāmīti. sādhu, bhanteti gacchanto mahābodhidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā puññavantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne manāpaṃ labhissāmīti cintetvā aparisuddho me vitakkoti tatova paṭinivatti. punadivase ambaṅgaṇasamīpato, punadivase mahācetiyassa uttaradvārato, tatheva paṭinivattitvā catutthadivase therassa santikaṃ agamāsi. thero imassa bhikkhuno vitakko na parisuddho bhavissatīti cīvaraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃyeva pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi. tañca rattiṃ eko manusso uccārapalibuddho sāṭakeyeva vaccaṃ katvā taṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi. ^b^paṃsukūlikatthero^eb^ taṃ nīlamakkhikāhi samparikiṇṇaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggahesi. mahāthero ``kiṃ, āvuso, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāsī''ti? ``nāhaṃ, bhante, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāmi, mayhaṃ pitu dasabalassa paggaṇhāmi, puṇṇadāsiyā sarīraṃ pārupitvā chaḍḍitaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ tumbamatte pāṇake vidhunitvā susānato gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ kataṃ, bhante''ti. mahāthero ``parisuddho vitakko paṃsukūlikassā''ti cintesi. paṃsukūlikattheropi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ^a^V3.0176^ea^ tīṇi phalāni patto taṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ katvā pārupitvā pācīnakkhaṇḍarājiṃ gantvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
[03] cīvaratthāya gacchantassa pana ``kattha labhissāmī''ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamanaṃ ^b^gamanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā lajjiṃ pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā pariyesanaṃ ^b^pariyesanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M3.0194^ea^ pariyesantassa āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūrato disvā ``etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati, etaṃ amanāpa''nti evaṃ avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu yathāladdheneva ^a^P3.1012^ea^ santussanaṃ ^b^paṭilābhasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi ``ettakaṃ dupaṭṭassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā''ti attano pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ ^b^mattappaṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa pana ``asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ labhissāmī''ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti, tena yāpanaṃ ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] manāpaṃ aññassa datvā attano yena kenaci yāpanaṃ ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``kattha udakaṃ manāpaṃ, kattha amanāpa''nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanupagena udakena dhovanaṃ ^b^udakasantoso^eb^ nāma. paṇḍumattikagerukapūtipaṇṇarasakiliṭṭhāni pana udakāni vajjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
[03] dhovantassa ^a^V3.0177^ea^ pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ ^b^dhovanasantoso^eb^ nāma. tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ vaṭṭati.
[03] evaṃ dhovitvā karontassa idaṃ thūlaṃ, idaṃ sukhumanti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva karaṇaṃ ^b^karaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] timaṇḍalappaṭicchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ ^b^parimāṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana manāpasuttaṃ pariyesissāmīti avicāretvā rathikādīsu vā devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃkiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ ^b^suttasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] kusibandhanakāle ^a^M3.0195^ea^ pana aṅgulamatte sattavāre na vijjhitabbaṃ, evaṃ karontassa hi yo bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti, tassa vattabhedopi natthi. tivaṅgulamatte pana sattavāre vijjhitabbaṃ, evaṃ karontassa maggapaṭipannenāpi sahāyena bhavitabbaṃ. yo na hoti, tassa vattabhedo. ayaṃ ^b^sibbanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena na rajitabbaṃ. somavakkalādīsu yaṃ labhati, tena rajitabbaṃ. alabhantena pana manussehi araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā rajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ ^b^rajanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu ^a^P3.1013^ea^ yaṃkiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnassa paññāyamānakapakaraṇaṃ ^b^kappasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] hirikopīnapaṭicchādanamattavasena paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^paribhogasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] dussaṃ pana labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, labhantena na vaṭṭati. katampi sace antevāsikādīnaṃ dātukāmo hoti, te ca asannihitā yāva āgamanā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. āgatamattesu dātabbaṃ. dātuṃ asakkontena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. aññasmiṃ ^a^V3.0178^ea^ cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati. anadhiṭṭhitameva hi sannidhi hoti. adhiṭṭhitaṃ na hotīti ^b^mahāsīvatthero^eb^ āha. ayaṃ ^b^sannidhiparivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] vissajjantena pana na mukhaṃ oloketvā dātabbaṃ. sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvā vissajjitabbanti ayaṃ ^b^vissajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni^eb^ nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgañceva tecīvarikaṅgañca. tesaṃ vitthārakathā ^b^visuddhimaggato^eb^ veditabbā. iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti. imāni gopento cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇavādī^eb^ti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti, eko na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti, eko ^a^M3.0196^ea^ neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti, eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti, taṃ dassetuṃ ``itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^anesana^eb^nti dūteyyapahinagamanānuyogappabhedaṃ nānappakāraṃ anesanaṃ. ^b^appatirūpa^eb^nti ayuttaṃ. ^b^aladdhā cā^eb^ti alabhitvā. yathā ekacco ``kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī''ti. puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritasati, santuṭṭho bhikkhu evaṃ aladdhā cīvaraṃ na paritasati. ^b^laddhā cā^eb^ti dhammena samena labhitvā. ^b^agadhito^eb^ti vigatalobhagiddho. ^b^amucchito^eb^ti adhimattataṇhāya mucchaṃ anāpanno. ^b^anajjhāpanno^eb^ti taṇhāya anotthato apariyonaddho. ^b^ādīnavadassāvī^eb^ti anesanāpattiyañca gedhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. ^b^nissaraṇapañño^eb^ti ``yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā''ti vuttaṃ nissaraṇameva pajānanto.

[03] ^b^itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1014^ea^ yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭhiyā. ^b^nevattānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ paṃsukūliko mayā upasampadamāḷeyeva paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ gahitaṃ, ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. ^b^na paraṃ vambhetī^eb^ti ``ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikā''ti vā ``paṃsukūlikaṅgamattampi etesaṃ natthī''ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti. ^b^yo hi tattha dakkho^eb^ti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose, vaṇṇavādādīsu vā dakkho cheko byatto. ^b^analaso^eb^ti sātaccakiriyāya ^a^V3.0179^ea^ ālasiyavirahito. ^b^sampajāno paṭissato^eb^ti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā ca yutto. ^b^ariyavaṃse ṭhito^eb^ti ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhito.

[03] ^b^itarītarena piṇḍapātenā^eb^ti yena kenaci piṇḍapātena. etthāpi piṇḍapāto jānitabbo. piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabbo, piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ. tattha ^b^piṇḍapāto^eb^ti ``odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsaṃ, khīraṃ, dadhi, sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇitaṃ, yāgu, khādanīyaṃ, sāyanīyaṃ, lehanīya''nti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātakkhetta^eb^nti ^a^M3.0197^ea^ saṅghabhattaṃ, uddesabhattaṃ, nimantanaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, āgantukabhattaṃ, gamikabhattaṃ, gilānabhattaṃ, gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ, dhurabhattaṃ, kuṭibhattaṃ, vārabhattaṃ, vihārabhattanti pannarasa piṇḍapātakkhettāni.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātasantoso^eb^ti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso, gamanasantoso, pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso, paṭiggahaṇasantoso, mattappaṭiggahaṇasantoso, loluppavivajjanasantoso, yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantoso, upakārasantoso, parimāṇasantoso, paribhogasantoso, sannidhiparivajjanasantoso, vissajjanasantosoti pannarasa santosā.

[03] tattha sādako bhikkhu mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi. piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ caratā sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānakāle ``sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmāti asukagāme, bhante''ti, ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya na vitakketabbaṃ. ekacārikena vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā vitakketabbaṃ. tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro. ayaṃ ^b^vitakkasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] piṇḍāya pavisantena ``kuhiṃ labhissāmī''ti acintetvā ^a^P3.1015^ea^ kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^gamanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā agahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā pariyesitabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^pariyesanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] dūratova ^a^V3.0180^ea^ āhariyamānaṃ disvā ``etaṃ manāpaṃ, etaṃ amanāpa''nti cittaṃ na uppādetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^paṭilābhasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] ``imaṃ manāpaṃ gaṇhissāmi, imaṃ amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī''ti acintetvā yaṃkiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva, ayaṃ ^b^paṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ettha pana deyyadhammo bahu, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammo bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, pamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyakopi appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyako pana bahuṃ dātukāmo, pamāṇena gahetabbaṃ. paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi ^a^M3.0198^ea^ mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti, saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, sāsanaṃ na karoti, vijātamātuyāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ ^b^mattappaṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] saddhakulāniyeva agantvā dvārappaṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma. ^b^yathālābhasantosā^eb^dayo cīvare vuttanayā eva.
[03] piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmīti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^upakārasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] pattaṃ pūretvā ānītaṃ na paṭiggahetabbaṃ, anupasampanne sati tena gāhāpetabbaṃ, asati harāpetvā paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ gahetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^parimāṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] ``jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ idamettha nissaraṇa''nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^paribhogasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbanti ayaṃ ^b^sannidhiparivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.
[03] mukhaṃ anoloketvā sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitena vissajjetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^vissajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni^eb^ pana pañca dhutaṅgāni -- piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ, sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ, ekāsanikaṅgaṃ ^a^V3.0181^ea^, pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattikaṅganti. tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā. iti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti. imāni gopento piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti. ``vaṇṇavādī''tiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^senāsanenā^eb^ti idha senāsanaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanakkhettaṃ ^a^P3.1016^ea^ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanasantoso jānitabbo, senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ. tattha ^b^senāsana^eb^nti mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohanaṃ, vihāro, aḍḍhayogo, pāsādo, hammiyaṃ, guhā, leṇaṃ, aṭṭo, māḷo ^a^M3.0199^ea^, veḷugumbo, rukkhamūlaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
[03] ^b^senāsanakkhetta^eb^nti ``saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vā''ti cha khettāni.

[03] ^b^senāsanasantoso^eb^ti senāsane vitakkasantosādayo pannarasa santosā. te piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. ^b^senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni^eb^ pana pañca dhutaṅgāni -- āraññikaṅgaṃ, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ, abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ, sosānikaṅgaṃ, yathāsantatikaṅganti. tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā. iti senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti. imāni gopento senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti.
[03] gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāteyeva paviṭṭho. tattha yathālābhayathābalayathāsāruppasantoseneva santussitabbaṃ. nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmāriyavaṃsaṃ bhajati. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``pañca senāsane vuttā, pañca āhāranissitā.
[22] eko vīriyasaṃyutto, dve ca cīvaranissitā''ti..

[03] iti āyasmā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayamāno viya ca paṭhamaṃ cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ ullaṅghento viya ca dutiyaṃ piṇḍapātasantosaṃ kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipento viya tatiyaṃ senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā idāni sahassanayappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ catutthaṃ ^a^V3.0182^ea^ bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^puna caparaṃ āvuso bhikkhu pahānārāmo hotī^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha āramanaṃ ārāmo, abhiratīti attho. pañcavidhe pahāne ārāmo assāti ^b^pahānārāmo.^eb^ kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto ramati, nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, byāpādaṃ pajahanto ramati...pe0... sabbakilese pajahanto ramati, arahattamaggaṃ bhāvento ramatīti evaṃ pahāne ratoti ^b^pahānarato^eb^ ^a^M3.0200^ea^. vuttanayeneva ^a^P3.1017^ea^ bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti ^b^bhāvanārāmo.^eb^ bhāvanāya ratoti ^b^bhāvanārato.^eb^

[03] imesu pana catūsu ariyavaṃsesu purimehi tīhi terasannaṃ dhutaṅgānaṃ catupaccayasantosassa ca vasena sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti. bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ. imaṃ pana bhāvanārāmataṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathentena bhikkhunā paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo. dīghanikāye dasuttarasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo. majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo. abhidhamme niddesapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] tattha ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā^eb^ti so nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto ramati. abyāpādaṃ byāpādaṃ. ālokasaññaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ. avikkhepaṃ uddhaccaṃ. dhammavavatthānaṃ, vicikicchaṃ. ñāṇaṃ, avijjaṃ. pāmojjaṃ, aratiṃ. paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, pañca nīvaraṇe. dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, vitakkavicāre. tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, pītiṃ. catutthaṃ jhānaṃ, sukhadukkhe. ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ bhāvento ramati, rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ bhāvento ramati, ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati.

[03] aniccānupassanaṃ bhāvento ramati, niccasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. dukkhānupassanaṃ, sukhasaññaṃ. anattānupassanaṃ, attasaññaṃ. nibbidānupassanaṃ, nandiṃ. virāgānupassanaṃ, rāgaṃ. nirodhānupassanaṃ, samudayaṃ. paṭinissaggānupassanaṃ, ādānaṃ. khayānupassanaṃ, ghanasaññaṃ. vayānupassanaṃ, āyūhanaṃ. vipariṇāmānupassanaṃ, dhuvasaññaṃ. animittānupassanaṃ, nimittaṃ. apaṇihitānupassanaṃ, paṇidhiṃ. suññatānupassanaṃ abhinivesaṃ. adhipaññādhammavipassanaṃ, sārādānābhinivesaṃ. yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ, sammohābhinivesaṃ. ādīnavānupassanaṃ, ālayābhinivesaṃ. paṭisaṅkhānupassanaṃ, appaṭisaṅkhaṃ. vivaṭṭānupassanaṃ, saṃyogābhinivesaṃ. sotāpattimaggaṃ ^a^V3.0183^ea^, diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese. sakadāgāmimaggaṃ, oḷārike kilese. anāgāmimaggaṃ, aṇusahagate kilese. arahattamaggaṃ bhāvento ramati, sabbakilese pajahanto ramatīti evaṃ ^a^P3.1018^ea^ ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^dīghanikāye^eb^ ^a^M3.0201^ea^ ^b^dasuttarasuttantapariyāyenā^eb^ti ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati...pe0... dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati, dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati? kāyagatāsatiṃ sātasahagataṃ. imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati. katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati? asmimānaṃ. imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati. katame dve dhamme...pe0... katame dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati? dasa kasiṇāyatanāni. ime dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati. katame dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati? dasa micchatte. ime dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotīti evaṃ dīghanikāye dasuttarasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyenā^eb^ti ekāyano, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā, sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya, dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya, ñāyassa adhigamāya, nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. katame cattāro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati... vedanāsu vedanānupassī... citte cittānupassī... dhammesu dhammānupassī... `atthi dhammā'ti vā panassa sati paccupaṭṭhitā hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissito ca viharati na ca kiñci loke upādiyati. evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hoti bhāvanārato, pahānārāmo hoti pahānarato. puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti...pe0... puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ...pe0... pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni. so imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati, ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti. iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotīti evaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^abhidhamme niddesapariyāyenā^eb^ti sabbepi saṅkhate aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato...pe0... saṃkilesikadhammato passanto ramati. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotīti evaṃ niddesapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^neva^eb^ ^a^V3.0184^ea^ ^b^attānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti ajja me saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa, ko mayā sadiso atthīti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. ^b^na paraṃ vambhetī^eb^ti aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassanāmattakampi natthi, kiṃ ime vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā carantīti ^a^P3.1019^ea^ evaṃ paraṃ vambhanaṃ na karoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ^b^padhānānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0202^ea^ uttamavīriyāni. ^b^saṃvarapadhāna^eb^nti cakkhādīni saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^pahānapadhāna^eb^nti kāmavitakkādayo pajahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^bhāvanāpadhāna^eb^nti bojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^anurakkhaṇāpadhāna^eb^nti samādhinimittaṃ anurakkhantassa uppannavīriyaṃ.

[03] ^b^vivekanissita^eb^ntiādīsu viveko virāgo nirodhoti tīṇipi nibbānassa nāmāni. nibbānañhi upadhivivekattā ^b^viveko.^eb^ taṃ āgamma rāgādayo virajjantīti ^b^virāgo.^eb^ nirujjhantīti ^b^nirodho.^eb^ tasmā ``vivekanissita''ntiādīsu ārammaṇavasena adhigantabbavasena vā nibbānanissitanti attho. ^b^vossaggapariṇāmi^eb^nti ettha dve vossaggā pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo ca. tattha vipassanā tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo. maggo ārammaṇavasena nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti pakkhandanavossaggo. tasmā vossaggapariṇāminti yathā bhāviyamāno satisambojjhaṅgo vossaggatthāya pariṇamati, vipassanābhāvañca maggabhāvañca pāpuṇāti, evaṃ bhāvetīti ayamettha attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^bhadraka^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ. ^b^samādhinimittaṃ^eb^ vuccati aṭṭhikasaññādivasena adhigato samādhiyeva. ^b^anurakkhatī^eb^ti samādhiparibandhakadhamme rāgadosamohe sodhento rakkhati. ettha ca aṭṭhikasaññādikā pañceva saññā vuttā. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne dasapi asubhāni vitthāretvā kathetabbāni. tesaṃ vitthāro visuddhimagge vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^dhamme ñāṇa^eb^nti ekapaṭivedhavasena catusaccadhamme ñāṇaṃ catusaccabbhantare nirodhasacce dhamme ñāṇañca ^a^P3.1020^ea^. yathāha -- ``tattha katamaṃ dhamme ñāṇaṃ? catūsu maggesu catūsu phalesu ñāṇa''nti (vibha0 796). ^b^anvaye ñāṇa^eb^nti cattāri saccāni paccakkhato disvā yathā idāni, evaṃ atītepi anāgatepi imeva pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, ayameva taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, ayameva nirodho nirodhasaccaṃ, ayameva maggo maggasaccanti evaṃ tassa ñāṇassa anugatiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ. tenāha ^a^V3.0185^ea^ -- ``so iminā dhammena ñātena diṭṭhena pattena viditena pariyogāḷhena atītānāgatena nayaṃ netī''ti. ^b^pariye ñāṇa^eb^nti paresaṃ cittaparicchede ^a^M3.0203^ea^ ñāṇaṃ. yathāha -- ``tattha katamaṃ pariye ñāṇaṃ? idha bhikkhu parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca jānātī''ti (vibha0 796) vitthāretabbaṃ. ṭhapetvā pana imāni tīṇi ñāṇāni avasesaṃ ^b^sammutiñāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. yathāha -- ``tattha katamaṃ sammutiñāṇaṃ? ṭhapetvā dhamme ñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā anvaye ñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā paricchede ñāṇaṃ avasesaṃ sammutiñāṇa''nti (vibha0 796).

[03] ^b^dukkhe ñāṇā^eb^dīhi arahattaṃ pāpetvā ekassa bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ. tattha dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ, dve vivaṭṭaṃ, vaṭṭe abhiniveso hoti, no vivaṭṭe. dvīsu saccesu ācariyasantike pariyattiṃ uggahetvā kammaṃ karoti, dvīsu saccesu ``nirodhasaccaṃ nāma iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ, maggasaccaṃ nāma iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa''nti savanavasena kammaṃ karoti. dvīsu saccesu uggahaparipucchāsavanadhāraṇasammasanapaṭivedho vaṭṭati, dvīsu savanapaṭivedho vaṭṭati. tīṇi kiccavasena paṭivijjhati, ekaṃ ārammaṇavasena. dve saccāni duddasattā gambhīrāni, dve gambhīrattā duddasāni.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ^b^sotāpattiyaṅgānī^eb^ti sotāpattiyā aṅgāni, sotāpattimaggassa paṭilābhakāraṇānīti attho. ^b^sappurisasaṃsevo^eb^ti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sevanaṃ. ^b^saddhammassavana^eb^nti sappāyassa tepiṭakadhammassa savanaṃ. ^b^yonisomanasikāro^eb^ti aniccādivasena manasikāro. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipattī^eb^ti lokuttaradhammassa anudhammabhūtāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ.

[03] ^b^aveccappasādenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1021^ea^ acalappasādena. ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāni. phaladhātuāhāracatukkāni uttānatthāneva. apicettha lūkhapaṇītavatthuvasena oḷārikasukhumatā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo^eb^ti viññāṇaṃ etāsu tiṭṭhatīti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. ārammaṇaṭṭhitivasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^rūpūpāya^eb^nti rūpaṃ upagataṃ hutvā. pañcavokārabhavasmiñhi abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^rūpārammaṇa^eb^nti rūpakkhandhagocaraṃ rūpapatiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā. ^b^nandūpasecana^eb^nti ^a^V3.0186^ea^ ^a^M3.0204^ea^ lobhasahagataṃ sampayuttanandiyāva upasittaṃ hutvā. itaraṃ upanissayakoṭiyā. ^b^vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni evaṃ pavattamānaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati. ^b^vedanūpāyādīsupi^eb^ eseva nayo. imehi pana tīhi padehi catuvokārabhave abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. tassa yāvatāyukaṃ pavattanavasena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanā veditabbā. catukkavasena pana desanāya āgatattā viññāṇūpāyanti na vuttaṃ. evaṃ vuccamāne ca ``katamaṃ nu kho ettha kammaviññāṇaṃ, katamaṃ vipākaviññāṇa''nti sammoho bhaveyya, tasmāpi na vuttaṃ. ^b^agatigamanāni^eb^ vitthāritāneva.

[03] ^b^cīvarahetū^eb^ti tattha manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhissāmīti cīvarakāraṇā uppajjati. ^b^iti bhavābhavahetū^eb^ti ettha ^b^itī^eb^ti nidassanatthe nipāto. yathā cīvarādihetu, evaṃ bhavābhavahetūpīti attho. ^b^bhavābhavo^eb^ti cettha paṇītapaṇītatarāni telamadhuphāṇitādīni adhippetāni. imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ taṇhuppādānaṃ pahānatthāya paṭipāṭiyāva cattāro ariyavaṃsā desitāti veditabbā. ^b^paṭipadācatukkaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttameva. akkhamādīsu padhānakaraṇakāle sītādīni na khamatīti ^b^akkhamā.^eb^ khamatīti ^b^khamā.^eb^ indriyadamanaṃ ^b^damā.^eb^ ``uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī''tiādinā nayena vitakkasamanaṃ ^b^samā.^eb^

[03] ^b^dhammapadānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.1022^ea^ dhammakoṭṭhāsāni. anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā. abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ nāma akopo vā mettāsīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. sammāsati dhammapadaṃ nāma suppaṭṭhitasati vā satisīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. sammāsamādhi dhammapadaṃ nāma samāpatti vā aṭṭhasamāpattivasena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā. dasāsubhavasena vā adhigatajjhānādīni anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ. catubrahmavihāravasena adhigatāni abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ. dasānussatiāhārepaṭikūlasaññāvasena adhigatāni sammāsati dhammapadaṃ. dasakasiṇāanāpānavasena adhigatāni sammāsamādhi dhammapadanti.

[03] dhammasamādānesu paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā. dutiyaṃ tibbakilesassa arahattaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontassa assumukhassāpi rudato parisuddhabrahmacariyacaraṇaṃ. tatiyaṃ kāmesu pātabyatā. catutthaṃ cattāro paccaye alabhamānassāpi ^a^M3.0205^ea^ jhānavipassanāvasena sukhasamaṅgino sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
[03] ^b^dhammakkhandhā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0187^ea^ ettha guṇaṭṭho khandhaṭṭho. ^b^sīlakkhandho^eb^ti sīlaguṇo. ettha ca phalasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. iti catūsupi ṭhānesu phalameva vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^balānī^eb^ti upatthambhanaṭṭhena akampiyaṭṭhena ca balāni. tesaṃ paṭipakkhehi kosajjādīhi akampaniyatā veditabbā. sabbānipi samathavipassanāmaggavasena lokiyalokuttarāneva kathitāni.

[03] ^b^adhiṭṭhānānī^eb^ti ettha ^b^adhī^eb^ti upasaggamattaṃ. atthato pana tena vā tiṭṭhanti, tattha vā tiṭṭhanti, ṭhānameva vā taṃtaṃguṇādhikānaṃ purisānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, paññāva adhiṭṭhānaṃ ^b^paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. ^eb^ ettha ca paṭhamena aggaphalapaññā. dutiyena vacīsaccaṃ. tatiyena āmisapariccāgo. catutthena kilesūpasamo kathitoti veditabbo. paṭhamena ca kammassakatapaññaṃ vipassanāpaññaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā phalapaññā kathitā. dutiyena vacīsaccaṃ ādiṃ katvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ. tatiyena āmisapariccāgaṃ ādiṃ katvā aggamaggena kilesapariccāgo. catutthena samāpattivikkhambhite ^a^P3.1023^ea^ kilese ādiṃ katvā aggamaggena kilesavūpasamo. paññādhiṭṭhānena vā ekena arahattaphalapaññā kathitā. sesehi paramatthasaccaṃ. saccādhiṭṭhānena vā ekena paramatthasaccaṃ kathitaṃ. sesehi arahattapaññāti ^b^mūsikābhayatthero^eb^ āha.
[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañhabyākaraṇāni^eb^ mahāpadesakathāya vitthāritāneva.

[03] ^b^kaṇha^eb^nti kāḷakaṃ dasākusalakammapathakammaṃ. ^b^kaṇhavipāka^eb^nti apāye nibbattanato kāḷakavipākaṃ. ^b^sukka^eb^nti paṇḍaraṃ kusalakammapathakammaṃ. ^b^sukkavipāka^eb^nti sagge nibbattanato paṇḍaravipākaṃ. ^b^kaṇhasukka^eb^nti missakakammaṃ. ^b^kaṇhasukkavipāka^eb^nti sukhadukkhavipākaṃ. missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vedayati. kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena pavatte dukkhaṃ vedayati. ^b^akaṇhāsukka^eb^nti kammakkhayakaraṃ catumaggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. tañhi ^a^M3.0206^ea^ yadi kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. yadi sukkaṃ bhaveyya, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya. ubhayavipākassa pana adānato akaṇhāsukkavipākattā akaṇhaṃ asukkanti ayamettha attho.

[03] ^b^sacchikaraṇīyā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0188^ea^ paccakkhakaraṇena ceva paṭilābhena ca sacchikātabbā. ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti dibbacakkhunā. ^b^kāyenā^eb^ti sahajātanāmakāyena. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalañāṇena.

[03] ^b^oghā^eb^ti vaṭṭasmiṃ satte ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā. tattha pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo ^b^kāmogho.^eb^ rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo ^b^bhavogho.^eb^ tathā jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo. dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ^b^diṭṭhogho.^eb^
[03] vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti ^b^yogā.^eb^ te oghā viya veditabbā.

[03] visaṃyojentīti ^b^visaññogā.^eb^ tattha asubhajjhānaṃ kāmayogavisaṃyogo. taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva ^b^kāmayogavisaññogo^eb^ nāma. arahattamaggo ^b^bhavayogavisaññogo^eb^ nāma. sotāpattimaggo ^b^diṭṭhiyogavisaññogo^eb^ nāma. arahattamaggo ^b^avijjāyogavisaññogo^eb^ nāma.

[03] ganthanavasena ^a^P3.1024^ea^ ^b^ganthā.^eb^ vaṭṭasmiṃ nāmakāyañceva rūpakāyañca ganthati bandhati palibundhatīti ^b^kāyagantho.^eb^ ^b^idaṃsaccābhiniveso^eb^ti idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti evaṃ pavatto diṭṭhābhiniveso.

[03] ^b^upādānānī^eb^ti ādānaggahaṇāni. kāmoti rāgo, soyeva gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānanti ^b^kāmupādānaṃ.^eb^ diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhi, sāpi gahaṇaṭṭhena upādānanti ^b^diṭṭhupādānaṃ.^eb^ iminā suddhīti evaṃ sīlavatānaṃ gahaṇaṃ ^b^sīlabbatupādānaṃ.^eb^ attāti etena vadati ceva upādiyati cāti ^b^attavādupādānaṃ.^eb^

[03] ^b^yoniyo^eb^ti koṭṭhāsā. aṇḍe jātāti ^b^aṇḍajā.^eb^ jalābumhi jātāti ^b^jalābujā.^eb^ saṃsede jātāti ^b^saṃsedajā. ^eb^ sayanasmiṃ pūtimacchādīsu ca nibbattānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vegena āgantvā upapatitā viyāti ^b^opapātikā.^eb^ tattha devamanussesu saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ ayaṃ ^a^M3.0207^ea^ viseso. saṃsedajā mandā daharā hutvā nibbattanti. opapātikā soḷasavassuddesikā hutvā. manussesu hi bhummadevesu ca imā catassopi yoniyo labbhanti. tathā tiracchānesu supaṇṇanāgādīsu. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``tattha, bhikkhave, aṇḍajā supaṇṇā aṇḍajeva nāge haranti, na jalābuje na saṃsedaje na opapātike''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.393). cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā opapātikāyeva ^a^V3.0189^ea^. tathā nerayikā. petesu catassopi labbhanti. ^b^gabbhāvakkantiyo^eb^ sampasādanīye kathitā eva.

[03] ^b^attabhāvapaṭilābhesu^eb^ paṭhamo khiḍḍāpadosikavasena veditabbo. dutiyo orabbhikādīhi ghātiyamānaurabbhādivasena. tatiyo manopadosikāvasena. catuttho cātumahārājike upādāya uparisesadevatāvasena. te hi devā neva attasañcetanāya maranti, na parasañcetanāya.
[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo^eb^ti dānasaṅkhātā dakkhiṇā visujjhanti mahapphalā honti etāhīti ^b^dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo.^eb^

[03] ^b^dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato^eb^ti yattha dāyako sīlavā hoti, dhammenuppannaṃ deyyadhammaṃ deti, paṭiggāhako dussīlo. ayaṃ dakkhiṇā vessantaramahārājassa dakkhiṇāsadisā. ^b^paṭiggāhakato^eb^ ^a^P3.1025^ea^ ^b^visujjhati, no dāyakato^eb^ti yattha paṭiggāhako sīlavā hoti, dāyako dussīlo, adhammenuppannaṃ deti, ayaṃ dakkhiṇā coraghātakassa dakkhiṇāsadisā. ^b^neva dāyakato visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato^eb^ti yattha ubhopi dussīlā deyyadhammopi adhammena nibbatto. vipariyāyena catutthā veditabbā.
[03] ^b^saṅgahavatthūnī^eb^ti saṅgahakāraṇāni. tāni heṭṭhā vibhattāneva.
[03] ^b^anariyavohārā^eb^ti anariyānaṃ lāmakānaṃ vohārā.
[03] ^b^ariyavohārā^eb^ti ariyānaṃ sappurisānaṃ vohārā.
[03] ^b^diṭṭhavāditā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0208^ea^ diṭṭhaṃ mayāti evaṃ vāditā. ettha ca taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena attho veditabbo.
[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ^b^attantapā^eb^dīsu ^a^V3.0190^ea^ paṭhamo acelako. dutiyo orabbhikādīsu aññataro. tatiyo yaññayājako. catuttho sāsane sammāpaṭipanno.

[03] ^b^attahitāya paṭipannā^eb^dīsu paṭhamo yo sayaṃ sīlādisampanno, paraṃ sīlādīsu na samādapeti āyasmā vakkalitthero viya. dutiyo yo attanā na sīlādisampanno, paraṃ sīlādīsu samādapeti āyasmā upanando viya. tatiyo yo nevattanā sīlādisampanno, paraṃ sīlādīsu na samādapeti devadatto viya. catuttho yo attanā ca sīlādisampanno parañca sīlādīsu samādapeti āyasmā mahākassapo viya.

[03] tamādīsu ^b^tamo^eb^ti andhakārabhūto. ^b^tamaparāyaṇo^eb^ti tamameva paraṃ ayanaṃ gati assāti tamaparāyaṇo. evaṃ sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. ettha ca paṭhamo nīce caṇḍālādikule dujjīvite hīnattabhāve nibbattitvā tīṇi duccaritāni paripūreti. dutiyo tathāvidho hutvā tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti. tatiyo uḷāre khattiyakule bahuannapāne sampannattabhāve nibbattitvā tīṇi duccaritāni paripūreti. catuttho tādisova hutvā tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti.

[03] ^b^samaṇamacalo^eb^ti samaṇācalo. ma-kāro padasandhimattaṃ. so sotāpanno veditabbo. sotāpanno hi catūhi vātehi indakhīlo viya parappavādehi akampiyo. acalasaddhāya samannāgatoti ^b^samaṇamacalo.^eb^ vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``katamo ca puggalo samaṇamacalo? idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā''ti (pu0 pa0 190) vitthāro. rāgadosānaṃ pana tanubhūtattā sakadāgāmī ^b^samaṇapadumo^eb^ ^a^P3.1026^ea^ nāma. tenāha -- ``katamo pana puggalo samaṇapadumo? idhekacco puggalo sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ^a^M3.0209^ea^ samaṇapadumo''ti (pu0 pa0 190). rāgadosānaṃ abhāvā khippameva pupphissatīti anāgāmī ^b^samaṇapuṇḍarīko^eb^ nāma. tenāha -- ``katamo ca puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko? idhekacco puggalo pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko''ti (pu0 pa0 190). arahā pana sabbesampi ganthakārakilesānaṃ abhāvā samaṇesu ^b^samaṇasukhumālo^eb^ nāma. tenāha -- ``katamo ca puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo? idhekacco āsavānaṃ khayā...pe0... upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo''ti.
[03] ``ime kho ^a^V3.0191^ea^, āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti samapaññāsāya catukkānaṃ vasena dvepañhasatāni kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] catukkavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ iti catukkavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha pañcasu khandhesu ^b^rūpakkhandho^eb^ lokiyo. sesā ^b^lokiyalokuttarā. upādānakkhandhā^eb^ lokiyāva. vitthārato pana khandhakathā visuddhimagge vuttā. ^b^kāmaguṇā^eb^ heṭṭhā vitthāritāva.
[03] sukatadukkaṭādīhi gantabbāti ^b^gatiyo. nirayo^eb^ti nirassādo. sahokāsena khandhā kathitā. tato paresu tīsu nibbattā khandhāva vuttā. catutthe okāsopi.

[03] āvāse macchariyaṃ ^b^āvāsamacchariyaṃ.^eb^ tena samannāgato bhikkhu āgantukaṃ disvā ``ettha cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā parikkhāro ṭhapito''tiādīni vatvā saṅghikampi āvāsaṃ nivāreti. so kālaṅkatvā peto vā ajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati. kule macchariyaṃ ^b^kulamacchariyaṃ.^eb^ tena samannāgato bhikkhu tehi kāraṇehi attano upaṭṭhākakule aññesaṃ ^a^M3.0210^ea^ pavesanampi nivāreti. lābhe macchariyaṃ ^b^lābhamacchariyaṃ.^eb^ tena samannāgato ^a^P3.1027^ea^ bhikkhu saṅghikampi lābhaṃ maccharāyanto yathā aññe na labhanti, evaṃ karoti. vaṇṇe macchariyaṃ ^b^vaṇṇamacchariyaṃ. vaṇṇo^eb^ti cettha sarīravaṇṇopi guṇavaṇṇopi veditabbo. pariyattidhamme macchariyaṃ ^b^dhammamacchariyaṃ.^eb^ tena samannāgato bhikkhu ``imaṃ dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā eso maṃ abhibhavissatī''ti aññassa na deti. yo pana dhammānuggahena vā puggalānuggahena vā na deti, na taṃ macchariyaṃ.

[03] cittaṃ nivārenti pariyonandhantīti ^b^nīvaraṇāni.^eb^ kāmacchando nīvaraṇapatto arahattamaggavajjho. kāmarāgānusayo kāmarāgasaṃyojanapatto anāgāmimaggavajjho. thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ ^a^V3.0192^ea^. middhaṃ khandhattayagelaññaṃ. ubhayampi arahattamaggavajjhaṃ. tathā uddhaccaṃ. kukkuccaṃ anāgāmimaggavajjhaṃ. vicikicchā paṭhamamaggavajjhā.

[03] ^b^saṃyojanānī^eb^ti bandhanāni. tehi pana baddhesu puggalesu rūpārūpabhave nibbattā sotāpannasakadāgāmino antobaddhā bahisayitā nāma. tesañhi kāmabhave bandhanaṃ. kāmabhave anāgāmino bahibaddhā antosayitā nāma. tesañhi rūpārūpabhave bandhanaṃ. kāmabhave sotāpannasakadāgāmino antobaddhā antosayitā nāma. rūpārūpabhave anāgāmino bahibaddhā bahisayitā nāma. khīṇāsavo sabbattha abandhano.

[03] sikkhitabbaṃ padaṃ ^b^sikkhāpadaṃ,^eb^ sikkhākoṭṭhāsoti attho. sikkhāya vā padaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, adhicittādhipaññāsikkhāya adhigamupāyoti attho. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthārato pana sikkhāpadakathā vibhaṅgappakaraṇe sikkhāpadavibhaṅge āgatā eva.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``abhabbo, āvuso, khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇa''ntiādi desanāsīsameva, sotāpannādayopi pana abhabbā. puthujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ nindāpasaṃsatthampi evaṃ vuttaṃ. puthujjano nāma gārayho, mātughātādīnipi karoti ^a^M3.0211^ea^. khīṇāsavo pana pāsaṃso, kunthakipillikaghātādīnipi na karotīti.

[03] byasanesu viyassatīti byasanaṃ, hitasukhaṃ khipati viddhaṃsetīti attho. ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ ^b^ñātibyasanaṃ,^eb^ corarogabhayādīhi ñātivināsoti attho. bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ ^a^P3.1028^ea^ ^b^bhogabyasanaṃ,^eb^ rājacorādivasena bhogavināsoti attho. rogo eva byasanaṃ ^b^rogabyasanaṃ.^eb^ rogo hi ārogyaṃ byasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ, sīlassa byasanaṃ ^b^sīlabyasanaṃ.^eb^ dussīlyassetaṃ nāmaṃ. sammādiṭṭhiṃ vināsayamānā uppannā diṭṭhi eva byasanaṃ ^b^diṭṭhibyasanaṃ. ^eb^ ettha ca ñātibyasanādīni tīṇi neva akusalāni na tilakkhaṇāhatāni. sīladiṭṭhibyasanadvayaṃ akusalaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ. teneva ``nāvuso, sattā ñātibyasanahetu vā''tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^ñātisampadā^eb^ti ñātīnaṃ sampadā pāripūrī bahubhāvo. ^b^bhogasampadāyapi^eb^ eseva nayo. ārogyassa sampadā ^b^ārogyasampadā.^eb^ pāripūrī dīgharattaṃ arogatā. ^b^sīladiṭṭhisampadāsupi^eb^ eseva nayo ^a^V3.0193^ea^. idhāpi ñātisampadādayo no kusalā, na tilakkhaṇāhatā. sīladiṭṭhisampadā kusalā, tilakkhaṇāhatā. teneva ``nāvuso, sattā ñātisampadāhetu vā''tiādimāha.
[03] sīlavipattisīlasampattikathā mahāparinibbāne vitthāritāva.

[03] ^b^codakenā^eb^ti vatthusaṃsandassanā, āpattisaṃsandassanā, saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo, sāmīcippaṭikkhepoti catūhi codanāvatthūhi codayamānena. ^b^kālena vakkhāmi no akālenā^eb^ti ettha cuditakassa kālo kathito, na codakassa. paraṃ codentena hi parisamajjhe vā uposathapavāraṇagge vā āsanasālābhojanasālādīsu vā na codetabbaṃ. divāṭṭhāne nisinnakāle ``karotāyasmā okāsaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ vattukāmo''ti evaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codetabbaṃ. puggalaṃ pana upaparikkhitvā yo lolapuggalo abhūtaṃ vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ āropeti, so okāsakammaṃ vināpi codetabbo. ^b^bhūtenā^eb^ti tacchena sabhāvena. ^b^saṇhenā^eb^ti maṭṭhena mudukena. ^b^atthasañhitenā^eb^ti atthakāmatāya hitakāmatāya upetena.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ^b^padhāniyaṅgānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0212^ea^ padhānaṃ vuccati padahanaṃ, padhānamassa atthīti padhāniyo, padhāniyassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni ^b^padhāniyaṅgāni. saddho^eb^ti saddhāya samannāgato. saddhā panesā āgamanasaddhā, adhigamanasaddhā, okappanasaddhā, pasādasaddhāti catubbidhā. tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ saddhā abhinīhārato āgatattā ^b^āgamanasaddhā^eb^ nāma. ariyasāvakānaṃ ^a^P3.1029^ea^ paṭivedhena adhigatattā ^b^adhigamanasaddhā^eb^ nāma. buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena okappanaṃ ^b^okappanasaddhā^eb^ nāma. pasāduppatti ^b^pasādasaddhā^eb^ nāma. idha okappanasaddhā adhippetā. ^b^bodhi^eb^nti catutthamaggañāṇaṃ. taṃ suppaṭividdhaṃ tathāgatenāti saddahati. desanāsīsameva cetaṃ, iminā pana aṅgena tīsupi ratanesu saddhā adhippetā. yassa hi buddhādīsu pasādo balavā, tassa padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati. ^b^appābādho^eb^ti arogo. ^b^appātaṅko^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^samavepākiniyā^eb^ti samavipācanīyā. ^b^gahaṇiyā^eb^ti kammajatejodhātuyā. ^b^nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā^eb^ti atisītagahaṇiko sītabhīrū hoti, accuṇhagahaṇiko uṇhabhīrū hoti, tesaṃ padhānaṃ na ijjhati. majjhimagahaṇikassa ijjhati. tenāha -- ``majjhimāya padhānakkhamāyā''ti. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ attānaṃ āvikattā^eb^ti yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā. ^b^udayatthagāminiyā^eb^ti udayañca atthaṅgamañca gantuṃ paricchindituṃ samatthāya, etena paññāsalakkhaṇapariggāhakaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ ^a^V3.0194^ea^. ^b^ariyāyā^eb^ti parisuddhāya. ^b^nibbedhikāyā^eb^ti anibbiddhapubbe lobhakkhandhādayo nibbijjhituṃ samatthāya. ^b^sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā^eb^ti tadaṅgavasena kilesānaṃ pahīnattā yaṃ yaṃ dukkhaṃ khīyati, tassa tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyā. iti sabbehi imehi padehi vipassanāpaññāva kathitā. duppaññassa hi padhānaṃ na ijjhati.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ^b^suddhāvāsā^eb^ti suddhā idha āvasiṃsu āvasanti āvasissanti vāti suddhāvāsā. suddhāti kilesamalarahitā anāgāmikhīṇāsavā. ^b^avihā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ mahāpadāne vuttameva.
