[03] ^b^anāgāmīsu^eb^ ^a^M3.0213^ea^ āyuno majjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarāva kilesaparinibbānaṃ arahattaṃ patto ^b^antarāparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. majjhaṃ upahacca atikkamitvā patto ^b^upahaccaparinibbāyī^eb^ ^a^P3.1030^ea^ nāma. asaṅkhārena appayogena akilamanto sukhena patto ^b^asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto dukkhena patto ^b^sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī^eb^ nāma. ime cattāro pañcasupi suddhāvāsesu labbhanti. ^b^uddhaṃsotoakaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ti ettha pana catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. yo hi avihāto paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo avihāto dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā devalokaṃ gantvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo kāmabhavato akaniṭṭhesu nibbattitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. yo heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva nibbattitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāmāti.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ^b^cetokhilā^eb^ti cittassa thaddhabhāvā. ^b^satthari kaṅkhatī^eb^ti satthu sarīre vā guṇe vā kaṅkhati. sarīre kaṅkhamāno ``dvattiṃsamahāpurisavaralakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nāma sarīraṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. guṇe kaṅkhamāno ``atītānāgatapaccuppannajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^ātappāyā^eb^ti vīriyakaraṇatthāya. ^b^anuyogāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ yogāya. sātaccāyāti ^b^satatakiriyāya. padhānāyā^eb^ti padahanatthāya. ^b^ayaṃ paṭhamo cetokhilo^eb^ti ayaṃ satthari ^a^V3.0195^ea^ vicikicchāsaṅkhāto paṭhamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti pariyattidhamme ca paṭivedhadhamme ca. pariyattidhamme kaṅkhamāno ``tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānīti vadanti, atthi nu kho etaṃ natthī''ti kaṅkhati. paṭivedhadhamme kaṅkhamāno ``vipassanānissando maggo nāma, magganissando phalaṃ nāma, sabbasaṅkhārapaṭinissaggo nibbānaṃ nāmāti vadanti, taṃ atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^saṅghe kaṅkhatī^eb^ti ``ujuppaṭipannotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vasena evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno cattāro maggaṭṭhā cattāro ^a^P3.1031^ea^ phalaṭṭhāti aṭṭhannaṃ puggalānaṃ samūhabhūto saṅgho nāma atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^sikkhāya kaṅkhamāno^eb^ ``adhisīlasikkhā nāma, adhicittādhipaññāsikkhā nāmāti vadanti ^a^M3.0214^ea^, sā atthi nu kho natthī''ti kaṅkhati. ^b^ayaṃ pañcamo^eb^ti ayaṃ sabrahmacārīsu kopasaṅkhāto pañcamo cittassa thaddhabhāvo kacavarabhāvo khāṇukabhāvo.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ^b^cetasovinibandhā^eb^ti cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetasovinibandhā. ^b^kāme^eb^ti vatthukāmepi kilesakāmepi. ^b^kāye^eb^ti attano kāye. ^b^rūpe^eb^ti bahiddhārūpe. ^b^yāvadattha^eb^nti yattakaṃ icchati, tattakaṃ. ^b^udarāvadehaka^eb^nti udarapūraṃ. tañhi udaraṃ avadehanato ``udarāvadehaka''nti vuccati. ^b^seyyasukha^eb^nti mañcapīṭhasukhaṃ. ^b^passasukha^eb^nti yathā samparivattakaṃ sayantassa dakkhiṇapassavāmapassānaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, evaṃ uppannaṃ sukhaṃ. ^b^middhasukha^eb^nti niddāsukhaṃ. ^b^anuyutto^eb^ti yuttappayutto viharati. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti patthayitvā. ^b^brahmacariyenā^eb^ti methunaviratibrahmacariyena. ^b^devo vā bhavissāmī^eb^ti mahesakkhadevo vā bhavissāmi. ^b^devaññataro vā^eb^ti appesakkhadevesu vā aññataro.

[03] ^b^indriyesu^eb^ paṭhamapañcake lokiyāneva kathitāni. dutiyapañcake paṭhamadutiyacatutthāni lokiyāni, tatiyapañcamāni lokiyalokuttarāni. tatiyapañcake samathavipassanāmaggavasena lokiyalokuttarāni.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissaraṇiyā^eb^ti nissaṭā visaññuttā. ^b^dhātuyo^eb^ti attasuññasabhāvā. ^b^kāme manasikaroto^eb^ti kāme manasikarontassa, asubhajjhānato vuṭṭhāya agadaṃ gahetvā visaṃ vīmaṃsanto ^a^V3.0196^ea^ viya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kāmābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassāti attho. ^b^na pakkhandatī^eb^ti na pavisati. ^b^na pasīdatī^eb^ti pasādaṃ nāpajjati. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.1032^ea^ ^b^santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti na patiṭṭhati. ^b^na vimuccatī^eb^ti nādhimuccati. yathā pana kukkuṭapattaṃ vā nhārudaddulaṃ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṃ patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati na sampasāriyati; evaṃ patilīyati na pasāriyati. ^b^nekkhammaṃ kho panā^eb^ti idha nekkhammaṃ nāma dasasu asubhesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tadassa manasikaroto cittaṃ pakkhandati. ^b^tassa taṃ citta^eb^nti tassa taṃ ^a^M3.0215^ea^ asubhajjhānacittaṃ. ^b^sugata^eb^nti gocare gatattā suṭṭhu gataṃ. ^b^subhāvita^eb^nti ahānabhāgiyattā suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ. ^b^suvuṭṭhita^eb^nti kāmato suṭṭhu vuṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^suvimutta^eb^nti kāmehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. kāmapaccayā āsavā nāma kāmahetukā cattāro āsavā. ^b^vighātā^eb^ti dukkhā. ^b^pariḷāhā^eb^ti kāmarāgapariḷāhā. ^b^na so taṃ vedanaṃ vedetī^eb^ti so taṃ kāmavedanaṃ vighātapariḷāhavedanañca na vedayati. ^b^idamakkhātaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ asubhajjhānaṃ kāmehi nissaṭattā kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ. yo pana taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tatiyaṃ maggaṃ patvā anāgāmiphalena nibbānaṃ disvā puna kāmā nāma natthīti jānāti, tassa cittaṃ accantanissaraṇameva. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ayaṃ pana viseso, dutiyavāre mettājhānāni byāpādassa nissaraṇaṃ nāma. tatiyavāre karuṇājhānāni vihiṃsāya nissaraṇaṃ nāma. catutthavāre arūpajjhānāni rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma. accantanissaraṇe cettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabbaṃ.

[03] pañcamavāre ^b^sakkāyaṃ manasikaroto^eb^ti suddhasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ pattassa sukkhavipassakassa phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassa. ^b^idamakkhātaṃ sakkāyanissaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ arahattamaggena ca phalena ca nibbānaṃ disvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno puna sakkāyo natthīti uppannaṃ arahattaphalasamāpatticittaṃ sakkāyassa nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ^b^vimuttāyatanānī^eb^ti vimuccanakāraṇāni. ^b^atthapaṭisaṃvedino^eb^ti pāḷiatthaṃ jānantassa. ^b^dhammapaṭisaṃvedino^eb^ti ^a^P3.1033^ea^ pāḷiṃ jānantassa. ^b^pāmojja^eb^nti taruṇapīti. ^b^pītī^eb^ti tuṭṭhākārabhūtā balavapīti. ^b^kāyo^eb^ti nāmakāyo paṭipassambhati. ^b^sukhaṃ vedayatī^eb^ti sukhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^cittaṃ samādhiyatī^eb^ti arahattaphalasamādhinā samādhiyati. ayañhi taṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto āgatāgataṭṭhāne ^a^V3.0197^ea^ jhānavipassanāmaggaphalāni jānāti, tassa evaṃ jānato pīti uppajjati. so tassā pītiyā antarā osakkituṃ na dento upacārakammaṭṭhāniko hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti. sesesupi eseva nayo ^a^M3.0216^ea^. ayaṃ pana viseso, ^b^samādhinimitta^eb^nti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu aññataro samādhiyeva samādhinimittaṃ. ^b^suggahitaṃ hotī^eb^tiādīsu ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhantena suṭṭhu gahitaṃ hoti. ^b^suṭṭhu manasikata^eb^nti suṭṭhu upadhāritaṃ. ^b^suppaṭividdhaṃ paññāyā^eb^ti paññāya suṭṭhu paccakkhaṃ kataṃ. ^b^tasmiṃ dhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānapāḷidhamme.

[03] ^b^vimuttiparipācanīyā^eb^ti vimutti vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃ paripācentīti ^b^vimuttiparipācanīyā. aniccasaññā^eb^ti aniccānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^anicce dukkhasaññā^eb^ti dukkhānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^dukkhe anattasaññā^eb^ti anattānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^pahānasaññā^eb^ti pahānānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā. ^b^virāgasaññā^eb^ti virāgānupassanāñāṇe uppannasaññā.
[03] ``ime kho āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti chabbīsatiyā pañcakānaṃ vasena tiṃsasatapañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] pañcakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ iti pañcakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni chakkavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^ajjhattikānī^eb^ti ajjhattajjhattikāni. ^b^bāhirānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.1034^ea^ tato ajjhattajjhattato bahibhūtāni. vitthārato pana āyatanakathā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ kathitāva. ^b^viññāṇakāyā^eb^ti viññāṇasamūhā. ^b^cakkhuviññāṇa^eb^nti cakkhupasādanissitaṃ kusalākusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^cakkhusamphasso^eb^ti cakkhunissito samphasso. ^b^sotasamphassā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^manosamphasso^eb^ti ime dasa samphasse ṭhapetvā seso sabbo manosamphasso nāma. vedanāchakkampi eteneva nayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^rūpasaññā^eb^ti rūpaṃ ^a^V3.0198^ea^ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannā saññā. etenupāyena sesāpi veditabbā. cetanāchakkepi eseva nayo. tathā taṇhāchakke.

[03] ^b^agāravo^eb^ti ^a^M3.0217^ea^ gāravavirahito. ^b^appatisso^eb^ti appatissayo anīcavutti. ettha pana yo bhikkhu satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti. satthari anupāhane caṅkamante saupāhano caṅkamati, nīce caṅkamante ucce caṅkamati, heṭṭhā vasante upari vasati, satthudassanaṭṭhāne ubho aṃse pārupati, chattaṃ dhāreti, upāhanaṃ dhāreti, nahāyati, uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti. parinibbute pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ na gacchati, cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ^b^satthari agāravo^eb^ nāma. yo pana dhammassavane saṃghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ na suṇāti, samullapanto nisīdati, sakkaccaṃ na gaṇhāti, na vāceti, ayaṃ ^b^dhamme agāravo^eb^ nāma. yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti, nisīdati, pañhaṃ katheti, vuḍḍhe bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, dussapallatthikaṃ vā hatthapallatthikaṃ vā karoti, saṅghamajjhe ubho aṃse pārupati, chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, ayaṃ ^b^saṅghe agāravo^eb^ nāma. ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate saṅghe agāravo katova hoti. tisso sikkhā pana apūrayamānova ^b^sikkhāya agāravo^eb^ nāma. appamādalakkhaṇaṃ ananubrūhayamāno ^b^appamāde agāravo^eb^ nāma. duvidhampi ^b^paṭisanthāraṃ^eb^ akaronto ^b^paṭisanthāre agāravo^eb^ nāma. cha gāravā vuttappaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā.

[03] ^b^somanassūpavicārā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1035^ea^ somanassasampayuttā vicārā. ^b^somanassaṭṭhāniya^eb^nti somanassakāraṇabhūtaṃ. ^b^upavicaratī^eb^ti vitakkena vitakketvā vicārena paricchindati. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^domanassūpavicārā^eb^pi evameva veditabbā. tathā ^b^upekkhūpavicārā. sāraṇīyadhammā^eb^ heṭṭhā vitthāritā. ^b^diṭṭhisāmaññagato^eb^ti iminā pana padena kosambakasutte paṭhamamaggo kathito. idha cattāropi maggā.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ^b^vivādamūlānī^eb^ti vivādassa mūlāni. ^b^kodhano^eb^ti kujjhanalakkhaṇena kodhena samannāgato. ^b^upanāhī^eb^ti verāppaṭinissaggalakkhaṇena upanāhena samannāgato. ^b^ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussāna^eb^nti dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo kathaṃ devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati. kosambakakkhandhake viya dvīsu bhikkhūsu vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre ^a^M3.0218^ea^ tesaṃ antevāsikā ^a^V3.0199^ea^ vivadanti. tesaṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhunisaṅgho vivadati. tato tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā vivadanti. atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti. tattha dhammavādīnaṃ ārakkhadevatā dhammavādiniyo honti adhammavādīnaṃ adhammavādiniyo. tato ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummā devatā bhijjanti. evaṃ paramparā yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti. dhammavādīhi pana adhammavādinova bahutarā honti. tato ``yaṃ bahukehi gahitaṃ, taṃ taccha''nti dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarāva adhammaṃ gaṇhanti. te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā vadantā apāyesu nibbattanti. evaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti.
[03] ^b^ajjhattaṃ vā^eb^ti tumhākaṃ abbhantaraparisāya. ^b^bahiddhā vā^eb^ti paresaṃ parisāya.

[03] ^b^makkhī^eb^ti paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena samannāgato. ^b^paḷāsī^eb^ti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena paḷāsena samannāgato. ^b^issukī^eb^ti parasakkārādīni issāyanalakkhaṇāya issāya samannāgato. ^b^maccharī^eb^ti āvāsamacchariyādīhi samannāgato. ^b^saṭho^eb^ti kerāṭiko. ^b^māyāvī^eb^ti ^a^P3.1036^ea^ katapāpapaṭicchādako. ^b^pāpiccho^eb^ti asantasambhāvanicchako dussīlo. ^b^micchādiṭṭhī^eb^ti natthikavādī ahetukavādī akiriyavādī. ^b^sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī^eb^ti sayaṃ diṭṭhimeva parāmasati. ^b^ādhānaggāhī^eb^ti daḷhaggāhī. ^b^duppaṭinissaggī^eb^ti na sakkā hoti gahitaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.

[03] ^b^pathavīdhātū^eb^ti patiṭṭhādhātu. ^b^āpodhātū^eb^ti ābandhanadhātu. ^b^tejodhātū^eb^ti paripācanadhātu. ^b^vāyodhātū^eb^ti vitthambhanadhātu. ^b^ākāsadhātū^eb^ti asamphuṭṭhadhātu. ^b^viññāṇadhātū^eb^ti vijānanadhātu.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo^eb^ti nissaṭadhātuyova. ^b^pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pariyādiyitvā hāpetvā tiṭṭhati. ^b^`mā hevantissa vacanīyo'^eb^ti yasmā abhūtaṃ byākaraṇaṃ byākaroti, tasmā mā evaṃ bhaṇīti ^a^M3.0219^ea^ vattabbo. ^b^yadidaṃ mettācetovimuttī^eb^ti yā ayaṃ mettācetovimutti, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ byāpādassa, byāpādato nissaṭāti attho. yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānato vuṭṭhito saṅkhāre sammasitvā tatiyamaggaṃ patvā ``puna byāpādo natthī''ti tatiyaphalena nibbānaṃ passati, tassa cittaṃ accantaṃ nissaraṇaṃ byāpādassa. etenupāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^animittā^eb^ ^a^V3.0200^ea^ ^b^cetovimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalasamāpatti. sā hi rāganimittādīnañceva rūpanimittādīnañca niccanimittādīnañca abhāvā ``animittā''ti vuttā. ^b^nimittānusārī^eb^ti vuttappabhedaṃ nimittaṃ anusaratīti nimittānusārī.

[03] ^b^asmī^eb^ti asmimāno. ^b^ayamahamasmī^eb^ti pañcasu khandhesu ayaṃ nāma ahaṃ asmīti ettāvatā arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti. ^b^vicikicchākathaṃkathāsalla^eb^nti vicikicchābhūtaṃ kathaṃkathāsallaṃ. ^b^`mā hevantissa vacanīyo'^eb^ti sace te paṭhamamaggavajjhā vicikicchā uppajjati, arahattabyākaraṇaṃ micchā hoti, tasmā mā abhūtaṃ bhaṇīti vāretabbo. ^b^asmimānasamugghāto^eb^ti arahattamaggo. arahattamaggaphalavasena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe puna asmimāno natthīti arahattamaggo asmimānasamugghātoti vutto.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ^b^anuttariyānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.1037^ea^ anuttarāni jeṭṭhakāni. dassanesu anuttariyaṃ ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ.^eb^ sesapadesupi eseva nayo. tattha hatthiratanādīnaṃ dassanaṃ na dassanānuttariyaṃ, niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena dasabalassa vā bhikkhusaṅghassa vā kasiṇāsubhanimittādīnaṃ vā aññatarassa dassanaṃ ^b^dassanānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ guṇakathāsavanaṃ na savanānuttariyaṃ, niviṭṭhasaddhassa pana niviṭṭhapemavasena tiṇṇaṃ vā ratanānaṃ guṇakathāsavanaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasavanaṃ vā ^b^savanānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma. maṇiratanādilābho na lābhānuttariyaṃ, sattavidhāriyadhanalābho pana ^b^lābhānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma. hatthisippādisikkhanaṃ na sikkhānuttariyaṃ, sikkhattayapūraṇaṃ pana ^b^sikkhānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ pāricariyā na pāricariyānuttariyaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ pāricariyā ^b^pāricariyānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma. khattiyādīnaṃ guṇānussaraṇaṃ nānussatānuttariyaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ pana ratanānaṃ guṇānussaraṇaṃ ^b^anussatānuttariyaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] anussatiyova ^a^M3.0220^ea^ ^b^anussatiṭṭhānāni^eb^ nāma. ^b^buddhānussatī^eb^ti buddhassa guṇānussaraṇaṃ. evaṃ anussarato hi pīti uppajjati. so taṃ pītiṃ khayato vayato paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. upacārakammaṭṭhānaṃ nāmetaṃ gihīnampi labbhati, esa nayo sabbattha. vitthārakathā panettha visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ^b^satatavihārā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0201^ea^ khīṇāsavassa niccavihārā. ^b^cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti cakkhudvārārammaṇe āpāthagate taṃ rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena disvā javanakkhaṇe iṭṭhe arajjanto ^b^neva sumano hoti,^eb^ aniṭṭhe adussanto ^b^na dummano.^eb^ asamapekkhane mohaṃ anuppādento ^b^upekkhako viharati^eb^ majjhatto, satiyā yuttattā ^b^sato,^eb^ sampajaññena yuttattā ^b^sampajāno. ^eb^ sesapadesupi eseva nayo. iti chasupi dvāresu upekkhako viharatīti iminā chaḷaṅgupekkhā kathitā. ^b^sampajāno^eb^ti vacanato pana cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti. ^b^satatavihārā^eb^ti vacanato aṭṭhapi mahācittāni labbhanti ^b^arajjanto adussanto^eb^ti vacanato dasapi cittāni labbhanti. somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti ce āsevanato labbhati.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhijātiyo^eb^ti ^a^P3.1038^ea^ jātiyo. ^b^kaṇhābhijātiko samāno^eb^ti kaṇhe nīcakule jāto hutvā. ^b^kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatī^eb^ti kāḷakaṃ dasadussīlyadhammaṃ pasavati karoti. so taṃ abhijāyitvā niraye nibbattati. ^b^sukkaṃ dhamma^eb^nti ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīcakule nibbatto. idāni puññaṃ karomīti puññasaṅkhātaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati. so tena sagge nibbattati. ^b^akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbāna^eb^nti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. sace sukkaṃ, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya. dvinnampi appadānato pana ``akaṇhaṃ asukka''nti vuttaṃ. nibbānañca nāma imasmiṃ atthe arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma. taṃ esa abhijāyati pasavati karoti. ^b^sukkābhijātiko samāno^eb^ti sukke uccakule jāto hutvā. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^nibbedhabhāgiyā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0221^ea^ nibbedho vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ bhajanti upagacchantīti ^b^nibbedhabhāgiyā.^eb^ aniccasaññādayo pañcake vuttā. nirodhānupassanāñāṇe saññā ^b^nirodhasaññā^eb^ nāma.
[03] ``ime ^a^V3.0202^ea^ kho, āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti dvāvīsatiyā chakkānaṃ vasena bāttiṃsasatapañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] chakkavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 330^b^.^eb^ iti chakkavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni sattakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha sampattipaṭilābhaṭṭhena saddhāva dhanaṃ ^b^saddhādhanaṃ.^eb^ esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^paññādhanaṃ^eb^ panettha sabbaseṭṭhaṃ. paññāya hi ṭhatvā tīṇi sucaritāni pañcasīlāni dasasīlāni pūretvā saggūpagā honti, sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇañca paṭivijjhanti. imāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ paṭilābhakāraṇato paññā ``dhana''nti vuttā. sattapi cetāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva kathitāni. ^b^bojjhaṅga^eb^kathā kathitāva.
[03] ^b^samādhiparikkhārā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1039^ea^ samādhiparivārā. sammādiṭṭhādīni vuttatthāneva. imepi satta parikkhārā lokiyalokuttarāva kathitā.

[03] asataṃ dhammā asantā vā dhammā lāmakā dhammāti ^b^asaddhammā.^eb^ vipariyāyena ^b^saddhammā^eb^ veditabbā. sesamettha uttānatthameva. ^b^saddhammesu^eb^ pana saddhādayo sabbepi vipassakasseva kathitā. tesupi paññā lokiyalokuttarā. ayaṃ viseso.

[03] sappurisānaṃ dhammāti ^b^sappurisadhammā.^eb^ tattha suttageyyādikaṃ dhammaṃ jānātīti ^b^dhammaññū.^eb^ tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānātīti ^b^atthaññū.^eb^ ``ettakomhi sīlena samādhinā paññāyā''ti evaṃ attānaṃ jānātīti ^b^attaññū.^eb^ paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu mattaṃ jānātīti ^b^mattaññū.^eb^ ayaṃ ^a^M3.0222^ea^ kālo uddesassa, ayaṃ kālo paripucchāya, ayaṃ kālo yogassa adhigamāyāti evaṃ kālaṃ jānātīti ^b^kālaññū.^eb^ ettha ca pañca vassāni uddesassa kālo. dasa ^a^V3.0203^ea^ paripucchāya. idaṃ atisambādhaṃ. dasa vassāni pana uddesassa kālo. vīsati paripucchāya. tato paraṃ yoge kammaṃ kātabbaṃ. aṭṭhavidhaṃ parisaṃ jānātīti ^b^parisaññū.^eb^ sevitabbāsevitabbaṃ puggalaṃ jānātīti ^b^puggalaññū.^eb^

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ ^b^niddasavatthūnī^eb^ti niddasādivatthūni. niddaso bhikkhu, nibbīso, nittiṃso, niccattālīso, nippaññāso bhikkhūti evaṃ vacanakāraṇāni. ayaṃ kira pañho titthiyasamaye uppanno. titthiyā hi dasavassakāle mataṃ nigaṇṭhaṃ niddasoti vadanti. so kira puna dasavasso na hoti. na kevalañca dasavassova. navavassopi...pe0... ekavassopi na hoti. eteneva nayena vīsativassādikālepi mataṃ nibbīso, nittiṃso, niccattālīso, nippaññāsoti vadanti. āyasmā ānando gāme vicaranto taṃ kathaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā āha --

[02] ``na idaṃ, ānanda, titthiyānaṃ adhivacanaṃ mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. khīṇāsavo hi dasavassakāle parinibbuto puna dasavasso na hoti. na kevalañca dasavassova, navavassopi...pe0... ekavassopi. na kevalañca ekavassova, dasamāsikopi...pe0... ekamāsikopi. ekadivasikopi. ekamuhuttopi na hoti eva. kasmā? puna paṭisandhiyā abhāvā. nibbīsādīsupi eseva nayo. iti bhagavā mama sāsane khīṇāsavassetaṃ adhivacana''nti ^a^P3.1040^ea^ --

[03] vatvā yehi kāraṇehi so niddaso hoti, tāni dassetuṃ satta niddasavatthūni deseti. theropi tameva desanaṃ uddharitvā satta niddasavatthūni ^b^idhāvuso, bhikkhu, sikkhāsamādāne^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^sikkhāsamādāne tibbacchando hotī^eb^ti sikkhattayapūraṇe bahalacchando hoti. ^b^āyatiñca sikkhāsamādāne avigatapemo^eb^ti ^a^M3.0223^ea^ anāgate punadivasādīsupi sikkhāpūraṇe avigatapemena samannāgato hoti. ^b^dhammanisantiyā^eb^ti dhammanisāmanāya. vipassanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^icchāvinaye^eb^ti taṇhāvinayane. ^b^paṭisallāne^eb^ti ekībhāve. ^b^vīriyārambhe^eb^ti kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa pūraṇe. ^b^satinepakke^eb^ti satiyañceva nepakkabhāve ca. ^b^diṭṭhipaṭivedhe^eb^ti maggadassane. sesaṃ sabbattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^saññāsu^eb^ asubhānupassanāñāṇe saññā ^b^asubhasaññā.^eb^ ādīnavānupassanāñāṇe saññā ^b^ādīnavasaññā^eb^ nāma. sesā heṭṭhā vuttā eva. balasattakaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattakapuggalasattakāni vuttanayāneva ^a^V3.0204^ea^. appahīnaṭṭhena anusayantīti ^b^anusayā.^eb^ thāmagato kāmarāgo kāmarāgānusayo. esa nayo sabbattha. saṃyojanasattakaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] adhikaraṇasamathesu adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti ^b^adhikaraṇasamathā. uppannuppannāna^eb^nti uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. ^b^adhikaraṇāna^eb^nti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ. ^b^samathāya vūpasamāyā^eb^ti samathatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca. ^b^sammukhāvinayo dātabbo...pe0... tiṇavatthārako^eb^ti ime satta samathā dātabbā.

[03] tatrāyaṃ vinicchayanayo. adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ ^b^vivādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. sīlavipattiyā ^a^P3.1041^ea^ vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṃ ^b^anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. mātikāya āgatā pañca, vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṃ ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ ^b^kiccādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca. sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ tasmiṃyeva vā aññattha vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ tattha saṅghena vā saṅghe vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ^a^M3.0224^ea^ ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati. evaṃ sammamāne ca panetasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā, ayaṃ ^b^sammukhāvinayo^eb^ nāma.

[03] tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo ^b^saṅghasammukhatā.^eb^ sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtatā ^b^dhammasammukhatā.^eb^ yathā taṃ sametabbaṃ, tatheva sammanaṃ ^b^vinayasammukhatā.^eb^ yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ atthapaccatthikānaṃ sammukhībhāvo ^b^puggalasammukhatā.^eb^ ubbāhikāya vūpasame panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. evaṃ tāva sammukhāvinayeneva sammati.

[03] sace ^a^V3.0205^ea^ panevampi na sammati, atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū ``na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu''nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti, tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati. tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhāpetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.

[03] tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva. yaṃ pana yebhuyyasikākammassa karaṇaṃ, ayaṃ ^b^yebhuyyasikā^eb^ nāma. evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati. ^b^anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ catūhi samathehi sammati -- sammukhāvinayena ^a^P3.1042^ea^ ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. ^b^sammukhāvinayeneva^eb^ sammamānaṃ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati, tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi, ayaṃ nāmettha āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati. tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanayameva. yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.

[03] yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena assāmaṇake ajjhācāre ``saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti''nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno ``ummattakena me ^a^M3.0225^ea^, āvuso, etaṃ kataṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī''ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati, saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.

[03] yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa ``sacāyaṃ acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā osāraṇaṃ labhissati. sace chinnamūlo ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī''ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hotīti. evaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati. ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi. yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno ^a^V3.0206^ea^ santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti, tadā ^b^āpattādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
[03] tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṃ sammukhībhāvo puggalasammukhatā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] puggalassa gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. yā panettha ahaṃ, bhante, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ ^a^P3.1043^ea^ āpannoti ca āma, passāmīti ca paṭiññā, tāya paṭiññāya ``āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī''ti karaṇaṃ, taṃ ^b^paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. saṅghādisese hi parivāsādiyācanā paṭiññā. parivāsādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. dve pakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācaritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya saṃvatteyyāti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.

[03] tattha hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā ``na metaṃ khamatī''ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā niddampi okkantā honti, sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca ^a^M3.0226^ea^ sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti, evaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati. ^b^kiccādhikaraṇaṃ^eb^ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva. imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. tena vuttaṃ -- uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo...pe0... tiṇavatthārakoti. ayamettha vinicchayanayo. vitthāro pana samathakkhandhake āgatoyeva. vinicchayopissa samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
[03] ``ime kho, āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti cuddasannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhanavuti pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] sattakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ iti ^a^V3.0207^ea^ sattakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^micchattā^eb^ti ayāthāvā micchāsabhāvā. ^b^sammattā^eb^ti yāthāvā sammāsabhāvā.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ^b^kusītavatthūnī^eb^ti kusītassa alasassa vatthūni patiṭṭhā kosajjakāraṇānīti attho. ^b^kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotī^eb^ti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti. ^b^na vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati. ^b^appattassā^eb^ti jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammassa appattassa pattiyā. ^b^anadhigatassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1044^ea^ tasseva anadhigatassa adhigamatthāya. ^b^asacchikatassā^eb^ti tasseva apaccakkhakatassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. ^b^idaṃ paṭhama^eb^nti idaṃ handāhaṃ nipajjāmīti evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. ``māsācitaṃ maññe''ti ettha pana ^b^māsācitaṃ^eb^ nāma tintamāso. yathā tintamāso garuko hoti, evaṃ garukoti adhippāyo. ^b^gilānā vuṭṭhito hotī^eb^ti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti.
[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ^b^ārambhavatthūnī^eb^ti vīriyakāraṇāni. tesampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ^b^dānavatthūnī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0227^ea^ dānakāraṇāni. ^b^āsajja dānaṃ detī^eb^ti patvā dānaṃ deti. āgataṃ disvāva muhuttaṃyeva nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, dassāmi dassāmīti na kilameti. iti ettha āsādanaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^bhayā dānaṃ detī^eb^tiādīsupi bhayādīni dānakāraṇānīti veditabbāni. tattha ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ nāma ayaṃ adāyako akārakoti garahābhayaṃ vā apāyabhayaṃ vā. ^b^adāsi me^eb^ti mayhaṃ pubbe esa idaṃ nāma adāsīti deti. ^b^dassati me^eb^ti anāgate idaṃ nāma dassatīti deti. ^b^sāhu dāna^eb^nti dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundaraṃ, buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasatthanti deti. ^b^cittālaṅkāracittaparikkhāratthaṃ dānaṃ detī^eb^ti samathavipassanācittassa alaṅkāratthañceva parivāratthañca deti. dānañhi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karoti. yena laddhaṃ hoti, sopi laddhaṃ meti muducitto hoti, yena dinnaṃ, sopi dinnaṃ mayāti muducitto hoti, iti ubhinnampi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karoti, teneva ``adantadamanaṃ dāna''nti vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``adantadamanaṃ dānaṃ, adānaṃ dantadūsakaṃ.
[22] dānena piyavācāya, unnamanti namanti cā''ti..
[03] imesu ^a^V3.0208^ea^ ^a^P3.1045^ea^ pana aṭṭhasu dānesu cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ^b^dānūpapattiyo^eb^ti dānapaccayā upapattiyo. ^b^dahatī^eb^ti ṭhapeti. ^b^adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti vaḍḍheti. ^b^hīne vimutta^eb^nti hīnesu pañcakāmaguṇesu vimuttaṃ. ^b^uttari abhāvita^eb^nti tato uttari maggaphalatthāya abhāvitaṃ. ^b^tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatī^eb^ti yaṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ kataṃ, tattha tattha nibbattanatthāya saṃvattati.

[03] ^b^vītarāgassā^eb^ti maggena vā samucchinnarāgassa samāpattiyā vā vikkhambhitarāgassa. dānamatteneva hi brahmaloke nibbattituṃ na sakkā. dānaṃ pana samādhivipassanācittassa alaṅkāro parivāro hoti. tato dānena muducitto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattati. tena vuttaṃ ``vītarāgassa no sarāgassā''ti.
[03] khattiyānaṃ parisā ^b^khattiyaparisā,^eb^ samūhoti attho. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] lokassa ^a^M3.0228^ea^ dhammā ^b^lokadhammā.^eb^ etehi mutto nāma natthi, buddhānampi hontiyeva. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā lokaṃ anuparivattanti, loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatī''ti (a0 ni0 8.5). ^b^lābho alābho^eb^ti lābhe āgate alābho āgato evāti veditabbo. ^b^yasā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo.
[03] 338^b^.^eb^ abhibhāyatanavimokkhakathā heṭṭhā kathitā eva.
[03] ``ime kho, āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti ekādasannaṃ aṭṭhakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhāsīti pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] aṭṭhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ iti ^a^V3.0209^ea^ aṭṭhakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni navakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^āghātavatthūnī^eb^ti āghātakāraṇāni. ^b^āghātaṃ bandhatī^eb^ti kopaṃ bandhati karoti uppādeti.

[03] ^b^taṃ kutettha labbhā^eb^ti taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosīti etasmiṃ puggale kuto labbhā, kena kāraṇena sakkā laddhuṃ ^a^P3.1046^ea^? paro nāma parassa attano cittaruciyā anatthaṃ karotīti evaṃ cintetvā āghātaṃ paṭivinodeti. atha vā sacāhaṃ paṭikopaṃ kareyyaṃ, taṃ kopakaraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā, kena kāraṇena laddhabbanti attho. kuto lābhātipi pāṭho, sacāhaṃ ettha kopaṃ kareyyaṃ, tasmiṃ me kopakaraṇe kuto lābhā, lābhā nāma ke siyunti attho. imasmiñca atthe ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattameva hoti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattāvāsā^eb^ti sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti attho. tattha suddhāvāsāpi sattāvāsova, asabbakālikattā pana na gahitā. suddhāvāsā hi buddhānaṃ khandhāvārasadisā. asaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhesu anibbattantesu ^a^M3.0229^ea^ taṃ ṭhānaṃ suññaṃ hotīti asabbakālikattā na gahitā. sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ akkhaṇesu ^b^dhammo ca desiyatī^eb^ti catusaccadhammo desiyati. ^b^opasamiko^eb^ti kilesūpasamakaro. ^b^parinibbāniko^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbānāvaho. ^b^sambodhagāmī^eb^ti catumaggañāṇapaṭivedhagāmī. ^b^aññatara^eb^nti asaññabhavaṃ vā arūpabhavaṃ vā.
[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ^b^anupubbavihārā^eb^ti anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbavihārā.
[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ^b^anupubbanirodhā^eb^ti anupaṭipāṭiyā nirodhā.
[03] ``ime, kho āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti channaṃ navakānaṃ vasena catupaṇṇāsa pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] navakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ iti ^a^V3.0210^ea^ navakavasena sāmaggirasaṃ dassetvā idāni dasakavasena dassetuṃ puna desanaṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^nāthakaraṇā^eb^ti ``sanāthā, bhikkhave, viharatha mā anāthā, dasa ime, bhikkhave, dhammā nāthakaraṇā''ti (a0 ni0 10.18) evaṃ akkhātā attano patiṭṭhākarā dhammā.

[03] ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^tiādīsu sīlādiguṇasampannā kalyāṇā assa mittāti ^b^kalyāṇamitto.^eb^ te cassa ṭhānanisajjādīsu saha ayanato sahāyāti ^b^kalyāṇasahāyo.^eb^ cittena ceva kāyena ca kalyāṇamittesu eva sampavaṅko onatoti ^b^kalyāṇasampavaṅko. suvaco^eb^ ^a^P3.1047^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti sukhena vattabbo hoti sukhena anusāsitabbo. ^b^khamo^eb^ti gāḷhena pharusena kakkhaḷena vuccamāno khamati, na kuppati. ^b^padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsani^eb^nti yathā ekacco ovadiyamāno vāmato gaṇhāti, paṭippharati vā asuṇanto vā gacchati, evaṃ akatvā ``ovadatha, bhante ^a^M3.0230^ea^, anusāsatha, tumhesu anovadantesu ko añño ovadissatī''ti padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti.

[03] ^b^uccāvacānī^eb^ti uccāni ca avacāni ca. ^b^kiṃ karaṇīyānī^eb^ti kiṃ karomīti evaṃ vatvā kattabbakammāni. tattha ^b^uccakammāni^eb^ nāma cīvarassa karaṇaṃ rajanaṃ cetiye sudhākammaṃ uposathāgāracetiyagharabodhiyagharesu kattabbanti evamādi. ^b^avacakammaṃ^eb^ nāma pādadhovanamakkhanādikhuddakakammaṃ. ^b^tatrupāyāyā^eb^ti tatrupagamanīyā. ^b^alaṃ kātu^eb^nti kātuṃ samattho hoti. ^b^alaṃ saṃvidhātu^eb^nti vicāretuṃ samattho.

[03] dhamme assa kāmo sinehoti ^b^dhammakāmo,^eb^ tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho. ^b^piyasamudāhāro^eb^ti parasmiṃ kathente sakkaccaṃ suṇāti, sayañca paresaṃ desetukāmo hotīti attho. ``abhidhamme abhivinaye''ti ettha dhammo abhidhammo, vinayo abhivinayoti catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti suttantapiṭakaṃ. ^b^abhidhammo^eb^ti satta pakaraṇāni. ^b^vinayo^eb^ti ubhatovibhaṅgā. ^b^abhivinayo^eb^ti khandhakaparivārā. atha vā suttantapiṭakampi abhidhammapiṭakampi ^b^dhammo^eb^ eva. maggaphalāni ^b^abhidhammo.^eb^ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ ^b^vinayo.^eb^ kilesavūpasamakāraṇaṃ ^b^abhivinayo.^eb^ iti sabbasmimpi ettha dhamme abhidhamme vinaye abhivinaye ca. ^b^uḷārapāmojjo^eb^ti bahulapāmojjo hotīti attho.
[03] ^b^kusalesu^eb^ ^a^V3.0211^ea^ ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti kāraṇatthe bhummaṃ, catubhūmakakusaladhammakāraṇā, tesaṃ adhigamatthāya anikkhittadhuro hotīti attho.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ kasiṇadasake sakalaṭṭhena ^b^kasiṇāni.^eb^ tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ khettaṭṭhena vā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā ^b^āyatanāni. uddha^eb^nti upari gaganatalābhimukhaṃ. ^b^adho^eb^ti ^a^P3.1048^ea^ heṭṭhā bhūmitalābhimukhaṃ. ^b^tiriya^eb^nti khettamaṇḍalamiva samantā paricchinditvā. ekacco hi uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍheti, ekacco adho, ekacco samantato. tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo. tena vuttaṃ ``pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti uddhaṃ adho tiriya''nti. ^b^advaya^eb^nti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti, na aññaṃ, evameva pathavīkasiṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇameva hoti ^a^M3.0231^ea^, natthi tassa añño kasiṇasambhedoti. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti idaṃ tassa tassa pharaṇāppamāṇavasena vuttaṃ. tañhi cetasā pharanto sakalameva pharati, na ``ayamassa ādi, idaṃ majjha''nti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhātīti. ^b^viññāṇakasiṇa^eb^nti cettha kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaviññāṇaṃ. tattha kasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃ adho tiriyatā veditabbā. ayamettha saṅkhepo. kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayena panetāni pathavīkasiṇādīni vitthārato visuddhimagge vuttāneva.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ kammapathesu kammāneva sugatiduggatīnaṃ pathabhūtattā ^b^kammapathā^eb^ nāma. tesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ musāvādādayo ca cattāro brahmajāle vitthāritā eva. ^b^kāmesumicchācāro^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti methunasamācāresu methunavatthūsu vā. ^b^micchācāro^eb^ti ekantanindito lāmakācāro. lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā ^b^kāmesumicchācāro.^eb^

[03] tattha ^b^agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā, piturakkhitā, mātāpiturakkhitā, bhāturakkhitā, bhaginirakkhitā, ñātirakkhitā, gottarakkhitā, dhammarakkhitā, sārakkhā, saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa. dhanakkītā, chandavāsinī, bhogavāsinī, paṭavāsinī, odapattakinī, obhatacumbaṭā, dāsī ca bhariyā ca, kammakārī ca bhariyā ca, dhajāhaṭā, muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati. itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ ^a^V3.0212^ea^ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā. idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. so panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo. sīlādiguṇasampanne ^a^P3.1049^ea^ mahāsāvajjo. tassa cattāro sambhārā agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanappayogo, maggenamaggappaṭipattiadhivāsananti. eko payogo sāhatthiko eva.

[03] abhijjhāyatīti ^b^abhijjhā,^eb^ parabhaṇḍābhimukhī hutvā tanninnatāya pavattatīti attho. sā ``aho vata idaṃ mamassā''ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. tassā dve sambhārā parabhaṇḍaṃ, attano pariṇāmanañca. parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi ^a^M3.0232^ea^ lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva ``aho vatīdaṃ mamassā''ti attano na pariṇāmeti.

[03] hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti ^b^byāpādo.^eb^ so paraṃ vināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo pharusāvācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. tassa dve sambhārā parasatto ca, tassa vināsacintā ca. parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva ``aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjheyya vinasseyyā''ti tassa vināsaṃ na cinteti.

[03] yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena micchā passatīti ^b^micchādiṭṭhi.^eb^ sā ``natthi dinna''ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. apica aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. tassā dve sambhārā vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā, yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti, tathābhāvena tassūpaṭṭhānanti.
[03] imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
[03] tattha ^b^dhammato^eb^ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti. abhijjhādayo tayo cetanāsampayuttā.

[03] ^b^koṭṭhāsato^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā satta, micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti, no ^a^V3.0213^ea^ mūlāni. abhijjhābyāpādā kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca. abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti. byāpādo doso akusalamūlaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ti pāṇātipāto jīvitindriyārammaṇato saṅkhārārammaṇo hoti. adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇaṃ vā saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā, micchācāro phoṭṭhabbavasena saṅkhārārammaṇo. ``sattārammaṇo''tipi eke. musāvādo sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā, tathā pisuṇavācā. pharusavācā sattārammaṇāva. samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo ^a^P3.1050^ea^ vā. tathā abhijjhā. byāpādo sattārammaṇova. micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavasena saṅkhārārammaṇā.

[03] ^b^vedanāto^eb^ti ^a^M3.0233^ea^ pāṇātipāto dukkhavedano hoti. kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi ``gacchatha naṃ ghātethā''ti vadanti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana dukkhasampayuttāva hoti. adinnādānaṃ tivedanaṃ. micchācāro sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedano. sanniṭṭhāpakacitte pana majjhattavedano na hoti. musāvādo tivedano. tathā pisuṇavācā. pharusavācā dukkhavedanā. samphappalāpo tivedano. abhijjhā sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedanā tathā micchādiṭṭhi. byāpādo dukkhavedano.

[03] ^b^mūlato^eb^ti pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako hoti. adinnādānaṃ dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena vā. micchācāro lobhamohavasena. musāvādo dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena vā tathā pisuṇavācā samphappalāpo ca. pharusavācā dosamohavasena. abhijjhā mohavasena ekamūlā. tathā byāpādo. micchādiṭṭhi lobhamohavasena dvimūlāti.
[03] ^b^pāṇātipātā veramaṇi^eb^ādīni samādānasampattasamucchedavirativasena veditabbāni.
[03] ^b^dhammato^eb^ pana etesupi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vattanti viratiyopi. ante tayo cetanāsampayuttāva.

[03] ^b^koṭṭhāsato^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā satta kammapathā eva, no mūlāni. ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ^a^V3.0214^ea^ ca. anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti. abyāpādo adoso kusalamūlaṃ. sammādiṭṭhi amoho kusalamūlaṃ.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ ārammaṇāneva etesaṃ ārammaṇāni. vītikkamitabbatoyeva hi veramaṇī nāma hoti. yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati, evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
[03] ^b^vedanāto^eb^ti ^a^M3.0234^ea^ sabbe sukhavedanā honti majjhattavedanā vā. kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.

[03] ^b^mūlato^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhādosāmohavasena timūlāni honti, ñāṇavippayuttacittena viramantassa dvimūlāni. anabhijjhā ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa dvimūlā, ñāṇavippayuttacittena ekamūlā. alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti. abyāpādepi ^a^P3.1051^ea^ eseva nayo. sammādiṭṭhi alobhādosavasena dvimūlā evāti.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyavāsā^eb^ti ariyā eva vasiṃsu vasanti vasissanti etesūti ariyavāsā. ^b^pañcaṅgavippahīno^eb^ti pañcahi aṅgehi vippayuttova hutvā khīṇāsavo avasi vasati vasissatīti tasmā ayaṃ pañcaṅgavippahīnatā, ariyassa vāsattā ariyavāsoti vutto. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] ^b^evaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hotī^eb^ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti. chaḷaṅgupekkhā nāma keti? ñāṇādayo. ``ñāṇa''nti vutte kiriyato cattāri ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti. ``satatavihāro''ti vutte aṭṭha mahācittāni. ``rajjanadussanaṃ natthī''ti vutte dasa cittāni labbhanti. somanassaṃ āsevanavasena labbhati.

[03] ^b^satārakkhena cetasā^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa hi tīsu dvāresu sabbakālaṃ sati ārakkhakiccaṃ sādheti ^a^V3.0215^ea^. tenevassa ``carato ca tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṃ samitaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hotī''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇāna^eb^nti bahūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ. ettha ca ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti pabbajjupagatā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti bhovādino. ^b^puthupaccekasaccānī^eb^ti bahūni pāṭekkasaccāni, idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva dassanaṃ saccanti evaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni bahūni saccānīti attho. ^b^nunnānī^eb^ti nihatāni. ^b^paṇunnānī^eb^ti suṭṭhu nihatāni. ^b^cattānī^eb^ti vissaṭṭhāni. ^b^vantānī^eb^ti vamitāni. ^b^muttānī^eb^ti chinnabandhanāni ^a^M3.0235^ea^ katāni. ^b^pahīnānī^eb^ti pajahitāni. ^b^paṭinissaṭṭhānī^eb^ti yathā na puna cittaṃ āruhanti, evaṃ paṭinissajjitāni. sabbāneva tāni gahitaggahaṇassa vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanāni.

[03] ^b^samavayasaṭṭhesano^eb^ti ettha ^b^avayā^eb^ti anūnā. ^b^saṭṭhā^eb^ti vissaṭṭhā. sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti ^b^samavayasaṭṭhesano.^eb^ sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. ^b^rāgā cittaṃ vimutta^eb^ntiādīhi maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā.
[03] ^b^rāgo^eb^ ^a^P3.1052^ea^ ^b^me pahīno^eb^tiādīhi paccavekkhaṇāya phalaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] ^b^asekkhā sammādiṭṭhī^eb^tiādayo sabbepi phalasampayuttadhammā eva. ettha ca sammādiṭṭhi, sammāñāṇanti dvīsu ṭhānesu paññāva kathitā. ^b^sammāvimuttī^eb^ti iminā padena vuttāvasesā. phalasamāpattidhammā saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
[03] ``ime kho, āvuso''tiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. iti channaṃ dasakānaṃ vasena samasaṭṭhi pañhe kathento thero sāmaggirasaṃ dassesīti.
[06] dasakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ idha ^a^V3.0216^ea^ pana ṭhatvā pañhā samodhānetabbā. imasmiñhi sutte ekakavasena dve pañhā kathitā. dukavasena sattati. tikavasena asītisataṃ. catukkavasena dvesatāni. pañcakavasena tiṃsasataṃ. chakkavasena bāttiṃsasataṃ. sattakavasena aṭṭhanavuti. aṭṭhakavasena aṭṭhāsīti. navakavasena catupaṇṇāsa. dasakavasena samasaṭṭhīti evaṃ sahassaṃ cuddasa pañhā kathitā.

[03] imañhi suttantaṃ ṭhapetvā tepiṭake buddhavacane añño suttanto evaṃ bahupañhapaṭimaṇḍito natthi. bhagavā imaṃ suttantaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya sakalaṃ ^a^M3.0236^ea^ sutvā cintesi -- ``dhammasenāpati sāriputto buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadati. sāvakabhāsitoti vutte okappanā na hoti, jinabhāsitoti vutte hoti, tasmā jinabhāsitaṃ katvā devamanussānaṃ okappanaṃ imasmiṃ suttante uppādessāmī''ti. tato vuṭṭhāya sādhukāraṃ adāsi. tena vuttaṃ ``atha kho bhagavā vuṭṭhahitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi, sādhu, sādhu, sāriputta, sādhu kho tvaṃ sāriputta, bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgītipariyāyaṃ abhāsī''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^saṅgītipariyāya^eb^nti sāmaggiyā kāraṇaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ``sādhu, kho tvaṃ, sāriputta, mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsanditvā bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaggirasaṃ abhāsī''ti. ^b^samanuñño satthā ahosī^eb^ti anumodanena samanuñño ahosi. ettakena ayaṃ suttanto jinabhāsito nāma jāto. desanāpariyosāne imaṃ suttantaṃ manasikarontā te bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V3.0217^ea^ ^a^M3.0237^ea^ ^a^P3.1053^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti dasuttarasuttaṃ. tatrāyaṃ apubbapadavaṇṇanā -- ^b^āvuso bhikkhave^eb^ti sāvakānaṃ ālapanametaṃ. buddhā hi parisaṃ āmantayamānā `bhikkhave'ti vadanti. sāvakā satthāraṃ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapessāmāti satthu ālapanena anālapitvā āvusoti ālapanti. ^b^te bhikkhū^eb^ti te dhammasenāpatiṃ parivāretvā nisinnā bhikkhū. ke pana te bhikkhūti? anibaddhavāsā disāgamanīyā bhikkhū. buddhakāle dve vāre bhikkhū sannipatanti -- upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikakāle ca pavāraṇakāle ca. upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikāya dasapi vīsatipi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi bhikkhū vaggā vaggā kammaṭṭhānatthāya āgacchanti. bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ sammoditvā kasmā, bhikkhave, upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vicarathāti pucchati. atha te ``bhagavā kammaṭṭhānatthaṃ āgatamha, kammaṭṭhānaṃ no dethā''ti yācanti.

[03] satthā tesaṃ cariyavasena rāgacaritassa asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. dosacaritassa mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ, mohacaritassa uddeso paripucchā -- `kālena dhammassavanaṃ, kālena dhammasākacchā, idaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāya'nti ācikkhati. vitakkacaritassa ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ deti. saddhācaritassa pasādanīyasuttante buddhasubodhiṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca pakāseti. ñāṇacaritassa aniccatādipaṭisaṃyutte gambhīre suttante katheti. te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sace sappāyaṃ hoti, tattheva vasanti. no ce hoti, sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ pucchitvā gacchanti. te tattha vasantā temāsikaṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā ghaṭetvā vāyamantā sotāpannāpi honti sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi arahantopi.

[03] tato vutthavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā ``bhagavā ^a^P3.1054^ea^ ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patto...pe0... ahaṃ aggaphalaṃ arahatta''nti paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocenti. tattha ime bhikkhū upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya āgatā. evaṃ āgantvā gacchante pana ^a^V3.0218^ea^ bhikkhū ^a^M3.0238^ea^ bhagavā aggasāvakānaṃ santikaṃ peseti, yathāha ``apaloketha pana, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne''ti. bhikkhū ca vadanti ``kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ, bhante, apalokema sāriputtamoggallāne''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.2). atha ne bhagavā tesaṃ dassane uyyojesi. ``sevatha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne; bhajatha, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallāne. paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā sabrahmacārīnaṃ. seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, janetā evaṃ sāriputto. seyyathāpi jātassa āpādetā evaṃ moggallāno. sāriputto, bhikkhave, sotāpattiphale vineti, moggallāno uttamatthe''ti (ma0 ni0 3.371).

[03] tadāpi bhagavā imehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsayaṃ upaparikkhanto ``ime bhikkhū sāvakavineyyā''ti addasa. ^b^sāvakavineyyā^eb^ nāma ye buddhānampi dhammadesanāya bujjhanti sāvakānampi. ^b^buddhavineyyā^eb^ pana sāvakā bodhetuṃ na sakkonti. sāvakavineyyabhāvaṃ pana etesaṃ ñatvā katarassa bhikkhuno desanāya bujjhissantīti olokento sāriputtassāti disvā therassa santikaṃ pesesi. thero te bhikkhū pucchi ``satthu santikaṃ gatattha āvuso''ti. ``āma, gatamha satthārā pana amhe tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pesitā''ti. tato thero ``ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ desanāya bujjhissanti, kīdisī nu kho tesaṃ desanā vaṭṭatī''ti cintento ``ime bhikkhū samaggārāmā, sāmaggirasassa dīpikā nesaṃ desanā vaṭṭatī''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ desetukāmo ^b^dasuttaraṃ pavakkhāmī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vibhattoti dasuttaro, ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā gatotipi dasuttaro, ekekasmiṃ pabbe dasa dasa pañhā visesitātipi dasuttaro, taṃ ^b^dasuttaraṃ. pavakkhāmī^eb^ti kathessāmi. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti suttaṃ. ^b^nibbānapattiyā^eb^ti nibbānapaṭilābhatthāya. ^b^dukkhassantakiriyāyā^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantakaraṇatthaṃ. ^b^sabbaganthappamocana^eb^nti abhijjhākāyaganthādīnaṃ sabbaganthānaṃ pamocanaṃ.

[03] iti thero desanaṃ uccaṃ karonto ^a^P3.1055^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ tattha pemaṃ janento evametaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ dhāretabbaṃ vācetabbaṃ maññissantīti catūhi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, ``ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo''tiādinā nayena tesaṃ tesaṃ suttānaṃ bhagavā viya.
[03] 351^b^.^eb^ (ka) tattha ^a^M3.0239^ea^ ^b^bahukāro^eb^ti bahūpakāro.
[03] (kha) ^b^bhāvetabbo^eb^ti ^a^V3.0219^ea^ vaḍḍhetabbo.
[03] (ga) ^b^pariññeyyo^eb^ti tīhi pariññāhi parijānitabbo.
[03] (gha) ^b^pahātabbo^eb^ti pahānānupassanāya pajahitabbo.
[03] (ṅa) ^b^hānabhāgiyo^eb^ti apāyagāmiparihānāya saṃvattanako.
[03] (ca) ^b^visesabhāgiyo^eb^ti visesagāmivisesāya saṃvattanako.
[03] (cha) ^b^duppaṭivijjho^eb^ti duppaccakkhakaro.
[03] (ja) ^b^uppādetabbo^eb^ti nipphādetabbo.
[03] (jha) ^b^abhiññeyyo^eb^ti ñātapariññāya abhijānitabbo.
[03] (ña) ^b^sacchikātabbo^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ kātabbo.

[03] evaṃ sabbattha mātikāsu attho veditabbo. iti āyasmā sāriputto yathā nāma dakkho veḷukāro sammukhībhūtaṃ veḷuṃ chetvā niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā dasadhā khaṇḍe katvā ekamekaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hīraṃ hīraṃ karonto phāleti, evameva tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyaṃ desanaṃ upaparikkhitvā dasadhā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ekekakoṭṭhāse ekekapadaṃ vibhajanto ``katamo eko dhammo bahukāro, appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti''tiādinā nayena desanaṃ vitthāretuṃ āraddho.

[01] tattha ^b^appamādo kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti sabbatthakaṃ upakārakaṃ appamādaṃ kathesi. ayañhi appamādo nāma sīlapūraṇe, indriyasaṃvare, bhojane mattaññutāya, jāgariyānuyoge, sattasu saddhammesu, vipassanāgabbhaṃ gaṇhāpane, atthapaṭisambhidādīsu, sīlakkhandhādipañcadhammakkhandhesu, ṭhānāṭṭhānesu, mahāvihārasamāpattiyaṃ, ariyasaccesu, satipaṭṭhānādīsu, bodhipakkhiyesu, vipassanāñāṇādīsu aṭṭhasu vijjāsūti sabbesu anavajjaṭṭhena kusalesu dhammesu bahūpakāro.

[03] teneva ^a^V3.0220^ea^ ^a^M3.0240^ea^ naṃ bhagavā ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā...pe0... tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbete appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā, appamādo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.139) nayena hatthipadādīhi opammehi opamento ^b^saṃyuttanikāye^eb^ ^a^P3.1056^ea^ ^b^appamādavagge^eb^ nānappakāraṃ thometi. taṃ sabbaṃ ekapadeneva saṅgahetvā thero appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti āha. ^b^dhammapade^eb^ appamādavaggenāpissa bahūpakāratā dīpetabbā. asokavatthunāpi dīpetabbā --

[03] (ka) asokarājā hi nigrodhasāmaṇerassa ``appamādo amatapada''nti gāthaṃ sutvā eva ``tiṭṭha, tāta, mayhaṃ tayā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kathita''nti sāmaṇere pasīditvā caturāsītivihārasahassāni kāresi. iti thāmasampannena bhikkhunā appamādassa bahūpakāratā tīhi piṭakehi dīpetvā kathetabbā. yaṃkiñci suttaṃ vā gāthaṃ vā appamādadīpanatthaṃ āharanto ``aṭṭhāne ṭhatvā āharasi, atitthena pakkhando''ti na vattabbo. dhammakathikassevettha thāmo ca balañca pamāṇaṃ.

[03] (kha) ^b^kāyagatāsatī^eb^ti ānāpānaṃ catuiriyāpatho satisampajaññaṃ dvattiṃsākāro catudhātuvavatthānaṃ dasa asubhā nava sivathikā cuṇṇikamanasikāro kesādīsu cattāri rūpajjhānānīti ettha uppannasatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sātasahagatā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā catutthajjhānaṃ aññattha sātasahagatā hoti sukhasampayuttā, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03] (ga) ^b^sāsavo upādāniyo^eb^ti āsavānañceva upādānānañca paccayabhūto. iti tebhūmakadhammameva niyameti.
[03] (gha) ^b^asmimāno^eb^ti rūpādīsu asmīti māno.
[03] (ṅa) ^b^ayoniso manasikāro^eb^ti anicce niccantiādinā nayena pavatto uppathamanasikāro.
[03] (ca) vipariyāyena ^b^yoniso manasikāro^eb^ veditabbo.

[03] (cha) ^b^ānantariko^eb^ ^a^M3.0241^ea^ ^b^cetosamādhī^eb^ti aññattha maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ ānantariko cetosamādhi nāma ^a^V3.0221^ea^. idha pana vipassanānantaro maggo vipassanāya vā anantarattā attano vā anantaraṃ phaladāyakattā ānantariko cetosamādhīti adhippeto.
[03] (ja) ^b^akuppaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti aññattha phalapaññā akuppañāṇaṃ nāma. idha paccavekkhaṇapaññā adhippetā.
[03] (jha) ^b^āhāraṭṭhitikā^eb^ti paccayaṭṭhitikā. ^b^ayaṃ eko dhammo^eb^ti yena paccayena tiṭṭhanti, ayaṃ eko dhammo ñātapariññāya abhiññeyyo.
[03] (ña) ^b^akuppā^eb^ ^a^P3.1057^ea^ ^b^cetovimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimutti.

[03] imasmiṃ vāre abhiññāya ñātapariññā kathitā. pariññāya tīraṇapariññā. pahātabbasacchikātabbehi pahānapariññā. ^b^duppaṭivijjho^eb^ti ettha pana maggo kathito. ^b^sacchikātabbo^eb^ti phalaṃ kathitaṃ, maggo ekasmiṃyeva pade labbhati. phalaṃ pana anekesupi labbhatiyeva.

[03] ^b^bhūtā^eb^ti sabhāvato vijjamānā. ^b^tacchā^eb^ti yāthāvā. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā vuttā tathāsabhāvā. ^b^avitathā^eb^ti yathā vuttā na tathā na honti. ^b^anaññathā^eb^ti vuttappakārato na aññathā. ^b^sammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā^eb^ti tathāgatena bodhipallaṅke nisīditvā hetunā kāraṇena sayameva abhisambuddhā ñātā viditā sacchikatā. iminā thero ``ime dhammā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ rañño lekhavācakasadiso''ti jinasuttaṃ dassento okappanaṃ janesi.
[06] ekadhammavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 352^b^.^eb^ (ka) ^b^ime dve dhammā bahukārā^eb^ti ime dve satisampajaññā dhammā sīlapūraṇādīsu appamādo viya sabbattha upakārakā hitāvahā.
[03] (kha) ^b^samatho^eb^ ^a^V3.0222^ea^ ^a^M3.0242^ea^ ^b^ca vipassanā cā^eb^ti ime dve saṅgītisutte lokiyalokuttarā kathitā. imasmiṃ dasuttarasutte pubbabhāgā kathitā.

[03] (cha) ^b^sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya sattānaṃ visuddhiyā^eb^ti ayoniso manasikāro hetu ceva paccayo ca sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya, yoniso manasikāro visuddhiyā. tathā dovacassatā pāpamittatā saṃkilesāya; sovacassatā kalyāṇamittatā visuddhiyā. tathā tīṇi akusalamūlāni; tīṇi kusalamūlāni. cattāro yogā cattāro visaṃyogā. pañca cetokhilā pañcindriyāni. cha agāravā cha gāravā. satta asaddhammā satta saddhammā. aṭṭha kusītavatthūni aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni. nava āghātavatthūni nava āghātappaṭivinayā. dasa akusalakammapathā dasa kusalakammapathāti evaṃ pabhedā ime dve dhammā duppaṭivijjhāti veditabbā.
[03] (jha) ^b^saṅkhatā dhātū^eb^ti paccayehi katā pañcakkhandhā. asaṅkhatā dhātūti paccayehi akataṃ nibbānaṃ.
[03] (ña) ^b^vijjā ca vimutti cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vijjā^eb^ti tisso vijjā. ^b^vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalaṃ.
[03] imasmiṃ vāre abhiññādīni ekakasadisāneva, uppādetabbapade ^a^P3.1058^ea^ pana maggo kathito, sacchikātabbapade phalaṃ.
[06] dvedhammavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ (cha) ^b^kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhamma^eb^nti ettha ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti anāgāmimaggo adhippeto. so hi sabbaso kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ. ^b^rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ āruppa^eb^nti ettha āruppepi arahattamaggo. puna uppattinivāraṇato sabbaso rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma. ^b^nirodho tassa^eb^ ^a^V3.0223^ea^ ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti idha arahattaphalaṃ nirodhoti ^a^M3.0243^ea^ adhippetaṃ. arahattaphalena hi nibbāne diṭṭhe puna āyatiṃ sabbasaṅkhārā na hontīti arahattaṃ saṅkhatanirodhassa paccayattā nirodhoti vuttaṃ.
[03] (ja) ^b^atītaṃse ñāṇa^eb^nti atītaṃsārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ itaresupi eseva nayo.
[03] imasmimpi vāre abhiññādayo ekakasadisāva. duppaṭivijjhapade pana maggo kathito, sacchikātabbe phalaṃ.
[06] tayodhammavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ (ka) ^b^cattāri cakkānī^eb^ti ettha ^b^cakkaṃ^eb^ nāma dārucakkaṃ, ratanacakkaṃ, dhammacakkaṃ, iriyāpathacakkaṃ, sampatticakkanti pañcavidhaṃ. tattha ``yaṃ panidaṃ samma, rathakāra, cakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ, chārattūnehī''ti (a0 ni0 3.15) idaṃ dārucakkaṃ. ``pitarā pavattitaṃ cakkaṃ anuppavattetī''ti (a0 ni0 5.132) idaṃ ratanacakkaṃ. ``pavattitaṃ cakka''nti (ma0 ni0 2.399) idaṃ dhammacakkaṃ. ``catucakkaṃ navadvāra''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.29) idaṃ iriyāpathacakkaṃ. ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī''ti (a0 ni0 4.31) idaṃ sampatticakkaṃ. idhāpi etadeva adhippetaṃ.

[03] ^b^patirūpadesavāso^eb^ti yattha catasso parisā sandissanti, evarūpe anucchavike dese vāso. ^b^sappurisūpanissayo^eb^ti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ avassayanaṃ sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ. ^b^attasammāpaṇidhī^eb^ti attano sammā ṭhapanaṃ, sace pana pubbe assaddhādīhi samannāgato hoti, tāni pahāya saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. ^b^pubbe ca katapuññatā^eb^ti pubbe upacitakusalatā. idamevettha pamāṇaṃ. yena hi ñāṇasampayuttacittena kusalaṃ kataṃ hoti, tadeva kusalaṃ taṃ purisaṃ patirūpadese ^a^P3.1059^ea^ upaneti, sappurise bhajāpesi ^a^M3.0244^ea^. so eva ca puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti. catūsu ^a^V3.0224^ea^ āhāresu paṭhamo lokiyova. sesā pana tayo saṅgītisutte lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā. idha pubbabhāge lokiyā.
[03] (ca) ^b^kāmayogavisaṃyogā^eb^dayo anāgāmimaggādivasena veditabbā.

[03] (cha) ^b^hānabhāgiyā^eb^dīsu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti ^b^hānabhāgiyo^eb^ samādhi. tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ^b^ṭhitibhāgiyo^eb^ samādhi. vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti ^b^visesabhāgiyo^eb^ samādhi. nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhito ^b^nibbedhabhāgiyo^eb^ samādhīti iminā nayena sabbasamāpattiyo vitthāretvā attho veditabbo. visuddhimagge panassa vinicchayakathā kathitāva.
[03] imasmimpi vāre abhiññādīni ekakasadisāneva. abhiññāpade panettha maggo kathito. sacchikātabbapade phalaṃ.
[06] cattārodhammavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ (kha) pītipharaṇatādīsu pītiṃ pharamānā uppajjatīti dvīsu jhānesu paññā ^b^pītipharaṇatā^eb^ nāma. sukhaṃ pharamānaṃ uppajjatīti tīsu jhānesu paññā ^b^sukhapharaṇatā^eb^ nāma. paresaṃ ceto pharamānā uppajjatīti cetopariyapaññā ^b^cetopharaṇatā^eb^ nāma. ālokapharaṇe uppajjatīti dibbacakkhupaññā ^b^ālokapharaṇatā^eb^ nāma. paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ ^b^paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ^eb^ nāma. vuttampi cetaṃ ``dvīsu jhānesu paññā pītipharaṇatā, tīsu jhānesu paññā sukhapharaṇatā. paracitte paññā cetopharaṇatā, dibbacakkhu ālokapharaṇatā. tamhā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇanimitta''nti (vibha0 804).

[03] tattha pītipharaṇatā sukhapharaṇatā dve pādā viya. cetopharaṇatā ālokapharaṇatā dve hatthā ^a^V3.0225^ea^ viya. abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ majjhimakāyo viya ^a^M3.0245^ea^. paccavekkhaṇanimittaṃ sīsaṃ viya. iti āyasmā sāriputtatthero pañcaṅgikaṃ sammāsamādhiṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasampannaṃ purisaṃ katvā dassesi.

[03] (ja) ^b^ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ce vā^eb^tiādīsu arahattaphalasamādhi adhippeto. so hi appitappitakkhaṇe sukhattā ^b^paccuppannasukho.^eb^ purimo purimo pacchimassa ^a^P3.1060^ea^ pacchimassa samādhisukhassa paccayattā āyatiṃ ^b^sukhavipāko.^eb^

[03] kilesehi ārakattā ^b^ariyo.^eb^ kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisalokāmisānaṃ abhāvā ^b^nirāmiso.^eb^ buddhādīhi mahāpurisehi sevitattā ^b^akāpurisasevito.^eb^ aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya sabbakilesadarathasantatāya ca ^b^santo.^eb^ atappanīyaṭṭhena ^b^paṇīto.^eb^ kilesapaṭippassaddhiyā laddhattā kilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvaṃ vā laddhattā ^b^paṭippassaddhaladdho.^eb^ paṭippassaddhaṃ paṭippassaddhīti hi idaṃ atthato ekaṃ. paṭippassaddhakilesena vā arahatā laddhattā paṭippassaddhaladdho. ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvameva vā adhigatattā ^b^ekodibhāvādhigato.^eb^ appaguṇasāsavasamādhi viya sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme niggayha kilese vāretvā anadhigatattā ^b^nasasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.^eb^ tañca samādhiṃ samāpajjanto tato vā vuṭṭhahanto sativepullapattattā. ^b^satova samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati.^eb^ yathāparicchinnakālavasena vā sato samāpajjati sato vuṭṭhahati. tasmā yadettha ``ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko''ti evaṃ paccavekkhamānassa paccattaṃyeva aparappaccayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ ekamaṅgaṃ. esa nayo sesesupi. evamimehi pañcahi paccavekkhaṇañāṇehi ayaṃ samādhi ``pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhī''ti vutto.
[03] imasmiṃ vāre visesabhāgiyapade maggo kathito. sacchikātabbapade phalaṃ. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
[03] 356^b^.^eb^ chakkesu sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. duppaṭivijjhapade panettha maggo kathito. sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ (ña) ^b^sammappaññāya^eb^ ^a^V3.0226^ea^ ^a^M3.0246^ea^ ^b^sudiṭṭhā hontī^eb^ti hetunā nayena vipassanāñāṇena sudiṭṭhā honti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca, dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viya sudiṭṭhā honti. ^b^vivekaninna^eb^nti nibbānaninnaṃ. ^b^poṇaṃ pabbhāra^eb^nti ninnassetaṃ vevacanaṃ. ^b^byantībhūta^eb^nti niyatibhūtaṃ. nittaṇhanti attho. kuto? sabbaso āsavaṭṭhānīyehi dhammehi tebhūmakadhammehīti attho. idha bhāvetabbapade maggo kathito. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ (ka) ^b^ādibrahmacariyikāya paññāyā^eb^ti sikkhattayasaṅgahassa maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāya pubbabhāge taruṇasamathavipassanāpaññāya ^a^P3.1061^ea^. aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā maggassa ādibhūtāya sammādiṭṭhipaññāya. ^b^tibba^eb^nti balavaṃ. ^b^hirottappa^eb^nti hirī ca ottappañca. ^b^pema^eb^nti gehassitapemaṃ. ^b^gāravo^eb^ti garucittabhāvo. garubhāvanīyañhi upanissāya viharato kilesā nuppajjanti ovādānusāsaniṃ labhati. tasmā taṃ nissāya vihāro paññāpaṭilābhassa paccayo hoti.
[03] (cha) akkhaṇesu yasmā petā asurānaṃ āvāhanaṃ gacchanti, vivāhanaṃ gacchanti, tasmā pettivisayeneva asurakāyo gahitoti veditabbo.

[03] (ja) ^b^appicchassā^eb^ti ettha paccayāppiccho, adhigamāppiccho, pariyattiappiccho, dhutaṅgāppicchoti cattāro appicchā. tattha paccayāppiccho bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhāti, appaṃ dente appataraṃ vā gaṇhāti, na vā gaṇhāti, na anavasesagāhī hoti. adhigamāppiccho majjhantikatthero viya attano adhigamaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti. pariyattiappiccho tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti sāketatissatthero viya. dhutaṅgāppiccho dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti dvebhātikattheresu jeṭṭhakatthero viya. vatthu visuddhimagge kathitaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ dhammo^eb^ti evaṃ santaguṇanigūhanena ca paccayapaṭiggahaṇe ^a^M3.0247^ea^ mattaññutāya ca appicchassa puggalassa ayaṃ navalokuttaradhammo sampajjati, no mahicchassa. evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^santuṭṭhassā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0227^ea^ catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭhassa. ^b^pavivittassā^eb^ti kāyacittaupadhivivekehi vivittassa. tattha ^b^kāyaviveko^eb^ nāma gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā aṭṭhāarambhavatthuvasena ekībhāvo. ekībhāvamattena pana kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti, ayaṃ ^b^cittaviveko^eb^ nāma. samāpattimatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ ^b^upadhiviveko^eb^ nāma. tenāha bhagavā -- ``kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ. cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ. upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna''nti (mahāni0 49).

[03] ^b^saṅgaṇikārāmassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.1062^ea^ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca ratassa. ^b^āraddhavīriyassā^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyavasena āraddhavīriyassa. ^b^upaṭṭhitasatissā^eb^ti catusatipaṭṭhānavasena upaṭṭhitasatissa. ^b^samāhitassā^eb^ti ekaggacittassa. ^b^paññavato^eb^ti kammassakatapaññāya paññavato. ^b^nippapañcassā^eb^ti vigatamānataṇhādiṭṭhipapañcassa.
[03] idha bhāvetabbapade maggo kathito. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ (kha) ^b^sīlavisuddhī^eb^ti visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. ^b^pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅga^eb^nti parisuddhabhāvassa padhānaṅgaṃ. ^b^cittavisuddhī^eb^ti vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtā aṭṭha paguṇasamāpattiyo. ^b^diṭṭhivisuddhī^eb^ti sapaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ. ^b^kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhī^eb^ti paccayākārañāṇaṃ. addhattayepi hi paccayavaseneva dhammā pavattantīti passato kaṅkhaṃ vitarati. ^b^maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhī^eb^ti obhāsādayo na maggo, vīthippaṭipannaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ maggoti evaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇaṃ. ^b^paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhī^eb^ti rathavinīte vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā kathitā, idha taruṇavipassanā. ^b^ñāṇadassanavisuddhī^eb^ti rathavinīte maggo kathito, idha vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā. etā pana sattapi visuddhiyo vitthārena ^a^M3.0248^ea^ visuddhimagge kathitā. ^b^paññā^eb^ti arahattaphalapaññā. ^b^vimuttipi^eb^ arahattaphalavimuttiyeva.

[03] (cha) ^b^dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānatta^eb^nti cakkhādidhātunānattaṃ paṭicca cakkhusamphassādinānattaṃ uppajjatīti attho. ^b^phassanānattaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti cakkhusamphassādinānattaṃ paṭicca ^a^V3.0228^ea^. ^b^vedanānānatta^eb^nti ^a^P3.1063^ea^ cakkhusamphassajādivedanānānattaṃ. ^b^saññānānattaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti kāmasaññādinānattaṃ paṭicca. ^b^saṅkappanānatta^eb^nti kāmasaṅkappādinānattaṃ. ^b^saṅkappanānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati chandanānatta^eb^nti saṅkappanānattatāya rūpe chando sadde chandoti evaṃ chandanānattaṃ uppajjati. ^b^pariḷāhanānatta^eb^nti chandanānattatāya rūpapariḷāho saddapariḷāhoti evaṃ pariḷāhanānattaṃ uppajjati. ^b^pariyesanānānatta^eb^nti pariḷāhanānattatāya rūpapariyesanādinānattaṃ uppajjati. ^b^lābhanānatta^eb^nti pariyesanānānattatāya rūpapaṭilābhādinānattaṃ uppajjati.

[03] (ja) saññāsu ^b^maraṇasaññā^eb^ti maraṇānupassanāñāṇe saññā. ^b^āhārepaṭikūlasaññā^eb^ti āhāraṃ pariggaṇhantassa uppannasaññā. ^b^sabbalokeanabhiratisaññā^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhantassa uppannasaññā. sesā heṭṭhā kathitā eva. idha bahukārapade maggo kathito. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ (jha) ^b^nijjaravatthūnī^eb^ti nijjarakāraṇāni. ^b^micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāyapi nijjiṇṇā eva pahīnā. kasmā puna gahitāti asamucchinnattā. vipassanāya hi kiñcāpi jiṇṇā, na pana samucchinnā, maggo pana uppajjitvā taṃ samucchindati, na puna vuṭṭhātuṃ deti. tasmā puna gahitā. evaṃ sabbapadesu nayo netabbo.

[03] ettha ca sammādiṭṭhipaccayā catusaṭṭhi dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. katame catusaṭṭhi? sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ paripūreti, paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṃ paripūreti, anussaraṇaṭṭhena satindriyaṃ paripūreti, avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhindriyaṃ paripūreti, dassanaṭṭhena paññindriyaṃ paripūreti, vijānanaṭṭhena ^a^M3.0249^ea^ manindriyaṃ, abhinandanaṭṭhena somanassindriyaṃ, pavattasantatiadhipateyyaṭṭhena jīvitindriyaṃ paripūreti...pe0... arahattaphalakkhaṇe adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ, pavattasantatiadhipateyyaṭṭhena jīvitindriyaṃ paripūretīti evaṃ catūsu ^a^P3.1064^ea^ maggesu catūsu phalesu aṭṭha aṭṭha hutvā catusaṭṭhi dhammā pāripūriṃ gacchanti. idha abhiññeyyapade maggo kathito. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.

[03] idha ṭhatvā pañhā samodhānetabbā. dasake sataṃ pañhā kathitā. ekake ca navake ca sataṃ ^a^V3.0229^ea^, duke ca aṭṭhake ca sataṃ, tike ca sattake ca sataṃ, catukke ca chakke ca sataṃ, pañcake paññāsāti aḍḍhachaṭṭhāni pañhasatāni kathitāni honti.

[03] ``idamavoca āyasmā sāriputto, attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandu''nti sādhu, sādhūti abhinandantā sirasā sampaṭicchiṃsu. tāya ca pana attamanatāya imameva suttaṃ āvajjamānā pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
[06] sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
[06] dasuttarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhitā ca pāthikavaggassa vaṇṇanāti.
[06] pāthikavaggaṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
[03] ettāvatā ^a^V3.0230^ea^ ^a^M3.0250^ea^ ca --
[21] āyācito ^b^sumaṅgala, pariveṇa^eb^nivāsinā thiraguṇena.
[22] ^b^dāṭhānāgasaṅghattherena,^eb^ theravaṃsanvayena..
[21] ^b^dīghāgamavarassa^eb^ dasabala, guṇagaṇaparidīpanassa aṭṭhakathaṃ.
[22] yaṃ ārabhiṃ ^b^sumaṅgala, vilāsiniṃ^eb^ nāma nāmena..
[21] sā hi mahāṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā.
[22] esā ekāsītipamāṇāya, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārehi..
[21] ekūnasaṭṭhimatto, ^b^visuddhimaggopi^eb^ bhāṇavārehi.
[22] atthappakāsanatthāya, āgamānaṃ kato yasmā..
[21] tasmā tena sahā'yaṃ, aṭṭhakathā bhāṇavāragaṇanāya.
[22] suparimitaparicchinnaṃ, cattālīsasataṃ hoti..
[21] sabbaṃ cattālīsādhikasata, parimāṇaṃ bhāṇavārato evaṃ.
[22] samayaṃ pakāsayantiṃ, mahāvihāre nivāsinaṃ..
[21] mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāra, mādāya mayā imaṃ karontena.
[22] yaṃ puññamupacitaṃ tena, hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti..
